atk-s0507a0:12_0: Petehi ca kataṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ yaṃ purimajātisu;
atk-s0507a0:23_0: Sakkaccaṃ bhāsato taṃ me, nisāmayatha sādhavoti.
atk-s0507a0:24_0: Tattha petavatthūti seṭṭhiputtādikassa tassa tassa sattassa petabhāvahetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:24_1: tassa pana pakāsanavasena pavatto “khettūpamā arahanto”tiādikā pariyattidhammo idha “petavatthū”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0507a0:25_8: itaraṃ nāradattherādīhi pucchitaṃ tehi tehi petehi bhāsitaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:25_9: Satthā pana yasmā nāradattherādīhi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pucchāvissajjane ārocite taṃ taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:25_10: tasmā sabbampetaṃ petavatthu satthārā bhāsitameva nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:25_11: Pavattitavaradhammacakke hi satthari tattha tattha rājagahādīsu viharante yebhuyyena tāya tāya aṭṭhuppattiyā
atk-s0507a0:25_12: pucchāvissajjanavasena sattānaṃ kammaphalapaccakkhakaraṇāya taṃ taṃ petavatthu desanāruḷhanti ayaṃ tāvettha
atk-s0507a0:25_14: Asādhāraṇato pana tassa tassa vatthussa atthavaṇṇanāyameva āgamissati.
atk-s0507a0:26_0: Taṃ panetaṃ petavatthu vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:26_1: dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:26_2: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallanti navasu sāsanaṅgesu gāthāsaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:28_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:29_0: Evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:32_0: Taṃ panetaṃ vatthuṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharanto veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe aññataraṃ seṭṭhiputtapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:32_1: Rājagahe kira aññataro aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo pahūtavittūpakaraṇo anekakoṭidhanasannicayo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:32_5: Tasmiṃ viññutaṃ patte mātāpitaro evaṃ cintesuṃ –
atk-s0507a0:32_6: “amhākaṃ puttassa divase divase sahassaṃ sahassaṃ paribbayaṃ karontassa vassasatenāpi ayaṃ dhanasannicayo parikkhayaṃ na gamissati,
atk-s0507a0:32_8: akilantakāyacitto yathāsukhaṃ bhoge paribhuñjatū”ti sippaṃ na sikkhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:32_9: Vayappatte pana kularūpayobbanavilāsasampannaṃ kāmābhimukhaṃ dhammasaññāvimukhaṃ kaññaṃ ānesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:32_10: So tāya saddhiṃ abhiramanto dhamme cittamattampi anuppādetvā,
atk-s0507a0:32_12: dhuttajanaparivuto rajjamāno pañcakāmaguṇe rato giddho mohena andho hutvā kālaṃ vītināmetvā,
atk-s0507a0:32_13: mātāpitūsu kālakatesu naṭanāṭakagāyakādīnaṃ yathicchitaṃ dento dhanaṃ vināsetvā nacirasseva pārijuññappatto hutvā,
atk-s0507a0:32_14: iṇaṃ gahetvā jīvikaṃ kappento puna iṇampi alabhitvā iṇāyikehi codiyamāno tesaṃ attano khettavatthugharādīni datvā,
atk-s0507a0:32_15: kapālahattho bhikkhaṃ caritvā bhuñjanto tasmiṃyeva nagare anāthasālāyaṃ vasati.
atk-s0507a0:33_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ corā samāgatā evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0507a0:33_5: Ehi amhehi saha corikāya paresaṃ santakaṃ gahetvā sukhena jīvikaṃ kappehī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:33_8: kevalaṃ tvaṃ amhākaṃ vacanaṃ karohī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:33_10: Atha te corā tassa hatthe mahantaṃ muggaraṃ datvā sandhiṃ chinditvā gharaṃ pavisanto taṃ sandhimukhe ṭhapetvā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0507a0:33_12: taṃ iminā muggarena paharitvā ekappahāreneva mārehī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:33_13: So andhabālo hitāhitaṃ ajānanto paresaṃ āgamanameva olokento tattha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:33_14: Corā pana gharaṃ pavisitvā gayhūpagaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā gharamanussehi ñātamattāva ito cito ca palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:33_15: Gharamanussā uṭṭhahitvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ dhāvantā ito cito ca olokentā taṃ purisaṃ sandhidvāre ṭhitaṃ disvā
atk-s0507a0:33_16: “hare duṭṭhacorā”ti gahetvā hatthapāde muggarādīhi pothetvā rañño dassesuṃ – “ayaṃ, deva,
atk-s0507a0:33_19: devā”ti nagaraguttiko taṃ gāhāpetvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhāpetvā rattavaṇṇaviraḷamālābandhakaṇṭhaṃ
atk-s0507a0:33_20: iṭṭhakacuṇṇamakkhitasīsaṃ vajjhapahaṭabheridesitamaggaṃ rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ vicarāpetvā
atk-s0507a0:33_22: “Ayaṃ imasmiṃ nagare vilumpamānakacoro gahito”ti kolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:34_0: Tena ca samayena tasmiṃ nagare sulasā nāma nagarasobhinī pāsāde ṭhitā vātapānantarena olokentī taṃ tathā
atk-s0507a0:34_1: nīyamānaṃ disvā pubbe tena kataparicayā “ayaṃ puriso imasmiṃyeva nagare mahatiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0507a0:34_2: idāni evarūpaṃ anatthaṃ anayabyasanaṃ patto”ti tassa kāruññaṃ uppādetvā cattāro modake pānīyañca pesesi.
atk-s0507a0:34_5: yāvāyaṃ puriso ime modake khāditvā pānīyaṃ pivissatī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:35_0: Athetasmiṃ antare āyasmā mahāmoggallāno dibbena cakkhunā olokento tassa byasanappattiṃ disvā karuṇāya sañcoditamānaso –
atk-s0507a0:35_3: mayi pana gate modake ca pānīyañca datvā bhummadevesu uppajjissati,
atk-s0507a0:35_4: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imassa avassayo bhaveyya”nti cintetvā pānīyamodakesu upanīyamānesu tassa purisassa purato pāturahosi.
atk-s0507a0:35_5: So theraṃ disvā pasannamānaso “kiṃ me idāneva imehi māriyamānassa modakehi khāditehi,
atk-s0507a0:35_6: idaṃ pana paralokaṃ gacchantassa pātheyyaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā modake ca pānīyañca therassa dāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:35_7: Thero tassa pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ tassa passantasseva tathārūpe ṭhāne nisīditvā modake paribhuñjitvā pānīyañca pivitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0507a0:35_8: So pana puriso coraghātakehi āghātanaṃ netvā sīsacchedaṃ pāpito anuttare puññakkhette mahāmoggallānatthere
atk-s0507a0:35_9: katena puññena uḷāre devaloke nibbattanārahopi yasmā “sulasaṃ āgamma mayā ayaṃ deyyadhammo laddho”ti
atk-s0507a0:35_10: sulasāya gatena sinehena maraṇakāle cittaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:35_11: Tasmā hīnakāyaṃ upapajjanto pabbatagahanasambhūte sandacchāye mahānigrodharukkhe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:36_0: So kira sace paṭhamavaye kulavaṃsaṭṭhapane ussukkaṃ akarissa,
atk-s0507a0:36_8: Pāpamittasaṃsaggena pana itthidhutto surādhutto duccaritanirato anādariko hutvā anukkamena sabbasampattito parihāyitvā mahābyasanaṃ pattoti vadanti.
atk-s0507a0:37_0: Atha so aparena samayena sulasaṃ uyyānagataṃ disvā sañjātakāmarāgo andhakāraṃ māpetvā taṃ attano bhavanaṃ
atk-s0507a0:37_1: netvā sattāhaṃ tāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0507a0:37_3: Tassā mātā taṃ apassantī rodamānā ito cito ca paribbhamati.
atk-s0507a0:37_4: Taṃ disvā mahājano “ayyo mahāmoggallāno mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo tassā gatiṃ jāneyya,
atk-s0507a0:37_6: Sā “sādhu ayyo”ti theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0507a0:37_7: Thero “ito sattame divase veḷuvanamahāvihāre bhagavati dhammaṃ desente parisapariyante passissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:37_11: mama mātā maṃ apassantī paridevasokasamāpannā bhavissati,
atk-s0507a0:37_14: So taṃ netvā veḷuvane bhagavati dhammaṃ desente parisapariyante ṭhapentvā adissamānarūpo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:38_3: Tava mātā tvaṃ apassantī paridevasokasamāpannā ummādappattā viya jātā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:38_5: Mahājanena ca “kathaṃ so puriso tathāpāpapasuto akatakusalo devūpapattiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti vutte sulasā
atk-s0507a0:38_6: “mayā dāpite modake pānīyañca ayyassa mahāmoggallānattherassa datvā tena puññena devūpapattiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:38_9: yesu appakopi kato kāro sattānaṃ devūpapattiṃ āvahatī”ti uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi.
atk-s0507a0:43_0: “Etaṃ bījaṃ kasī khettaṃ, petānaṃ dāyakassa ca;
atk-s0507a0:44_0: Taṃ petā paribhuñjanti, dātā puññena vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0507a0:47_0: Saggañca kamatiṭṭhānaṃ, kammaṃ katvāna bhaddaka”nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0507a0:48_1: Tattha khettūpamāti khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ tāyati mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena rakkhatīti khettaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:48_6: Te hi kilesārīnaṃ saṃsāracakkassa arānañca hatattā,
atk-s0507a0:48_10: Tattha yathā khetañhi tiṇādidosarahitaṃ svābhisaṅkhatabījamhi vutte utusalilādipaccayantarūpetaṃ kassakassa mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0507a0:48_11: evaṃ khīṇāsavasantāno lobhādidosarahito svābhisaṅkhate deyyadhammabīje vutte kālādipaccayantarasahito dāyakassa mahapphalo hoti.
atk-s0507a0:49_1: tesaṃ pariccāgena attano santāne lobhādīnaṃ pariccajanakā chedanakā,
atk-s0507a0:49_5: Yathā kassako sālikhettādīni kasitvā yathākālañca vuttudakadānanīharaṇanidhānarakkhaṇādīhi appamajjanto uḷāraṃ vipulañca sassaphalaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0507a0:49_6: evaṃ dāyakopi arahantesu deyyadhammapariccāgena pāricariyāya ca appamajjanto uḷāraṃ vipulañca dānaphalaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0507a0:50_2: Annapānādikassa hi dasavidhassa dātabbavatthuno etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:50_3: Etto nibbattate phalanti etasmā dāyakapaṭiggāhakadeyyadhammapariccāgato dānaphalaṃ nibbattati ceva uppajjati ca,
atk-s0507a0:50_5: Ettha ca yasmā pariccāgacetanābhisaṅkhatassa annapānādivatthuno bhāvo,
atk-s0507a0:50_8: Tena deyyadhammāpadesena deyyadhammavatthuvisayāya pariccāgacetanāyayeva bījabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0507a0:50_9: Sā hi paṭisandhiādippabhedassa tassa nissayārammaṇappabhedassa ca phalassa nipphādikā,
atk-s0507a0:51_1: Etaṃ bījaṃ kasī khettanti yathāvuttaṃ bījaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:51_3: tassa bījassa tasmiṃ khette vapanapayogasaṅkhātā kasi cāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:51_4: Etaṃ tayaṃ kesaṃ icchitabbanti āha “petānaṃ dāyakassa cā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:51_5: Yadi dāyako pete uddissa dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0507a0:51_7: yadi na pete uddissa dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0507a0:51_8: dāyakasseva etaṃ bījaṃ esā kasi etaṃ khettaṃ upakārāya hotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:51_9: Idāni taṃ upakāraṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ petā paribhuñjanti,
atk-s0507a0:51_11: Tattha taṃ petā paribhuñjantīti dāyakena pete uddissa dāne dinne yathāvuttakhettakasibījasampattiyā anumodanāya ca yaṃ petānaṃ upakappati,
atk-s0507a0:51_13: Dātā puññena vaḍḍhatīti dātā pana attano dānamayapuññanimittaṃ devamanussesu bhogasampattiādinā puññaphalena abhivaḍḍhati.
atk-s0507a0:51_16: dhammānaṃ samādānahetu evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu puññanti vuccati.
atk-s0507a0:52_1: Idheva kusalaṃ katvāti anavajjasukhavipākaṭṭhena kusalaṃ petānaṃ uddisanavasena dānamayaṃ puññaṃ upacinitvā idheva imasmiṃyeva attabhāve.
atk-s0507a0:52_2: Pete ca paṭipūjiyāti pete uddissa dānena sammānetvā anubhuyyamānadukkhato te mocetvā.
atk-s0507a0:52_3: Pete hi uddissa diyyamānaṃ dānaṃ tesaṃ pūjā nāma hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0507a0:52_10: pāsaṃso ca hoti kittanīyo viññūna”nti evamādike diṭṭhadhammike dānānisaṃse saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0507a0:52_12: kammaṃ katvāna bhaddakanti kalyāṇaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā dibbehi āyuādīhi dasahi ṭhānehi suṭṭhu aggattā
atk-s0507a0:52_13: “sagga”nti laddhanāmaṃ katapuññānaṃ nibbattanaṭṭhānaṃ devalokaṃ kamati upapajjanavasena upagacchati.
atk-s0507a0:53_0: Ettha ca “kusalaṃ katvā”ti vatvā puna “kammaṃ katvāna bhaddaka”nti vacanaṃ “deyyadhammapariccāgo viya
atk-s0507a0:53_3: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ “petā”ti khīṇāsavānaṃ āgataṭṭhānasseva abhāvato,
atk-s0507a0:53_4: bījādibhāvassa ca dāyakassa viya tesaṃ ayujjamānattā,
atk-s0507a0:53_6: Desanāpariyosāne devaputtaṃ sulasañca ādiṃ katvā caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:56_0: Kāyo te sabbasovaṇṇoti idaṃ satthari rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe viharante aññataraṃ sūkaramukhapetaṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:56_1: Atīte kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane eko bhikkhu kāyena saññato ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:56_5: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tattha paccitvā tato cavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahasamīpe gijjhakūṭapabbatapāde
atk-s0507a0:56_6: tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena khuppipāsābhibhūto peto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:56_9: Athāyasmā nārado gijjhakūṭe pabbate vasanto pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ
atk-s0507a0:56_10: piṇḍāya gacchanto antarāmagge taṃ petaṃ disvā tena katakammaṃ pucchanto –
atk-s0507a0:59_0: Mukhaṃ te sūkarasseva, kiṃ kammamakarī pure”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:60_1: Tattha kāyo te sabbasovaṇṇoti tava kāyo deho sabbo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo uttattakanakasannibho.
atk-s0507a0:60_2: Sabbā obhāsate disāti tassa pabhāya sabbāpi disā samantanto obhāsati vijjotati.
atk-s0507a0:60_3: Obhāsateti vā antogadhahotuatthamidaṃ padanti “te kāyo sabbasovaṇṇo sabbā disā obhāseti vijjotetī”ti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0507a0:60_4: Mukhaṃ te sūkarassevāti mukhaṃ pana te sūkarassa viya,
atk-s0507a0:60_6: Kiṃ kammamakarī pureti “tvaṃ pubbe atītajātiyaṃ kīdisaṃ kammaṃ akāsī”ti pucchati.
atk-s0507a0:61_0: Evaṃ therena so peto katakammaṃ puṭṭho gāthāya vissajjento –
atk-s0507a0:64_0: Tena metādiso vaṇṇo, yathā passasi nāradā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:65_1: Tattha kāyena saññato āsinti kāyikena saṃyamena saṃyato kāyadvārikena saṃvarena saṃvuto ahosiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:65_2: Vācāyāsimasaññatoti vācāya asaññato vācasikena asaṃvarena samannāgato ahosiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:65_3: Tenāti tena ubhayena saṃyamena asaṃyamena ca.
atk-s0507a0:65_10: Vaṇṇasaddo hi idha chaviyaṃ saṇṭhāne ca daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0507a0:66_0: Evaṃ peto therena pucchito tamatthaṃ vissajjetvā tameva kāraṇaṃ katvā therassa ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0507a0:68_0: “Taṃ tyāhaṃ nārada brūmi, sāmaṃ diṭṭhamidaṃ tayā;
atk-s0507a0:69_0: Mākāsi mukhasā pāpaṃ, mā kho sūkaramukho ahū”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:70_9: idaṃ mama sarīraṃ galato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā manussasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:70_19: Mā kho sūkaramukho ahūti ahaṃ viya sūkaramukho mā ahosiyeva.
atk-s0507a0:70_20: Sace pana tvaṃ mukharo hutvā vācāya pāpaṃ kareyyāsi,
atk-s0507a0:70_22: tasmā mākāsi mukhasā pāpanti phalapaṭisedhanamukhenapi hetumeva paṭisedheti.
atk-s0507a0:71_0: Athāyasmā nārado rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto catuparisamajjhe nisinnassa satthuno tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Satthā, “nārada,
atk-s0507a0:71_1: pubbeva mayā so sattho diṭṭho”ti vatvā anekākāravokāraṃ vacīduccaritasannissitaṃ ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:74_0: Dibbaṃ subhaṃ dhāresi vaṇṇadhātunti idaṃ satthari veḷuvane viharante kalandakanivāpe aññataraṃ pūtimukhapetaṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:74_1: Atīte kira kassapassa bhagavato kāle dve kulaputtā tassa sāsane pabbajitvā sīlācārasampannā sallekhavuttino
atk-s0507a0:74_3: Atha aññataro pāpajjhāsayo pesuññābhirato bhikkhu tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0507a0:74_4: Therā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ datvā dutiyadivase taṃ gahetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:74_5: Manussā te disvā tesu theresu ativiya paramanipaccakāraṃ katvā yāgubhattādīhi paṭimānesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:74_12: Imesu pana bhikkhūsu idha vasantesu mayhaṃ phāsuvihāro na bhavissati,
atk-s0507a0:74_14: Handāhaṃ ime aññamaññaṃ bhinditvā yathā na puna idha vasissanti,
atk-s0507a0:75_0: Athekadivasaṃ mahāthere dvinnampi ovādaṃ datvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhe pesuṇiko bhikkhu thokaṃ
atk-s0507a0:75_1: kālaṃ vītināmetvā mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā therena “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0507a0:75_5: tumhākaṃ sahāyakatthero sammukhā mitto viya attānaṃ dassetvā parammukhā sapatto viya upavadatī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:75_7: ‘eso mahāthero saṭho māyāvī kuhako micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappetī’ti tumhākaṃ aguṇaṃ kathetī”ti āha. “Mā, āvuso,
atk-s0507a0:75_9: na so bhikkhu evaṃ maṃ upavadissati,
atk-s0507a0:75_10: gihikālato paṭṭhāya mama sabhāvaṃ jānāti ‘pesalo kalyāṇasīlo”’ti. “Sace, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:75_13: mayhaṃ pana tena saddhiṃ veraṃ natthi,
atk-s0507a0:75_14: kasmā ahaṃ tena avuttaṃ ‘vutta’nti vadāmi. Hotu,
atk-s0507a0:75_16: Theropi puthujjanabhāvadosena dveḷhakacitto “evampi siyā”ti sāsaṅkahadayo hutvā thokaṃ sithilavissāso ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:75_17: So bālo paṭhamaṃ mahātheraṃ paribhinditvā itarampi thenaṃ vuttanayeneva paribhindi.
atk-s0507a0:75_18: Atha te ubhopi therā dutiyadivase aññamaññaṃ anālapitvā pattacīvaramādāya gāme piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātamādāya
atk-s0507a0:75_19: attano vasanaṭṭhāneyeva paribhuñjitvā sāmīcimattampi akatvā taṃ divasaṃ tattheva vasitvā vibhātāya ca
atk-s0507a0:76_0: Pesuṇikaṃ pana bhikkhuṃ paripuṇṇamanorathaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ manussā disvā āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0507a0:76_2: “sabbarattiṃ aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ katvā mayā ‘mā kalahaṃ karotha,
atk-s0507a0:76_5: purimakāpi kalahena mahatā hitā paribhaṭṭhā’tiādīni vuccamānāpi mama vacanaṃ anādiyitvā pakkantā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:76_7: tumhe pana amhākaṃ anukampāya idheva anukkaṇṭhitvā vasathā”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:76_8: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā tattheva vasanto katipāhena cintesi –
atk-s0507a0:76_10: bahuṃ vata mayā pāpakammaṃ pasuta”nti balavavippaṭisārābhibhūto sokavegena gilāno hutvā nacireneva kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:77_0: Itare dve sahāyakattherā janapadacārikaṃ carantā aññatarasmiṃ āvāse samāgantvā aññamaññaṃ sammoditvā
atk-s0507a0:77_1: tena bhikkhunā vuttaṃ bhedavacanaṃ aññamaññassa ārocetvā tassa abhūtabhāvaṃ ñatvā samaggā hutvā anukkamena
atk-s0507a0:77_3: Manussā dve there disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sañjātasomanassā hutvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:77_4: Therā ca tattheva vasantā sappāyaāhāralābhena samāhitacittā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:78_0: Pesuṇiko bhikkhu ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahassa avidūre pūtimukhapeto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:78_2: mukhato pana puḷavakā nikkhamitvā ito cito ca mukhaṃ khādanti,
atk-s0507a0:78_3: tassa dūrampi okāsaṃ pharitvā duggandhaṃ vāyati.
atk-s0507a0:78_4: Athāyasmā nārado gijjhakūṭapabbatā orohanto taṃ disvā –
atk-s0507a0:80_0: “Dibbaṃ subhaṃ dhāresi vaṇṇadhātuṃ, vehāyasaṃ tiṭṭhasi antalikkhe;
atk-s0507a0:81_0: Mukhañca te kimayo pūtigandhaṃ, khādanti kiṃ kammamakāsi pubbe”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:82_7: Vehāyasaṃ tiṭṭhasi antalikkheti vehāyasasaññite antalikkhe tiṭṭhasi.
atk-s0507a0:82_8: Keci pana “vihāyasaṃ tiṭṭhasi antalikkhe”ti pāṭhaṃ vatvā vihāyasaṃ obhāsento antalikkhe tiṭṭhasīti vacanasesena atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0507a0:82_11: Kiṃ kammamakāsi pubbeti paramaduggandhaṃ te mukhaṃ kimayo khādanti,
atk-s0507a0:82_13: kīdisaṃ nāma kammaṃ evarūpassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ pubbe tvaṃ akāsīti pucchi.
atk-s0507a0:83_0: Evaṃ therena so peto attanā katakammaṃ puṭṭho tamatthaṃ vissajjento –
atk-s0507a0:86_0: Laddhā ca me tamasā vaṇṇadhātu, mukhañca me pesuṇiyena pūtī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:87_1: Tattha samaṇo ahaṃ pāpoti ahaṃ lāmako samaṇo pāpabhikkhu ahosiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:88_0: Evaṃ so peto attanā katakammaṃ ācikkhitvā idāni therassa ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0507a0:92_0: Mā pesuṇaṃ mā ca musā abhāṇi,
atk-s0507a0:94_1: Tattha tayidanti taṃ idaṃ mama rūpaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:94_2: Anukampakā ye kusalā vadeyyunti ye anukampanasīlā kāruṇikā parahitapaṭipattiyaṃ kusalā nipuṇā buddhādayo yaṃ vadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0507a0:94_4: Idāni taṃ ovādaṃ dassento “mā pesuṇaṃ mā ca musā abhāṇi,
atk-s0507a0:94_7: pesuṇaṃ pisuṇavacanaṃ musā ca mā abhāṇi mā kathehi.
atk-s0507a0:94_8: Yadi hi tvaṃ musāvādaṃ pisuṇavācañca pahāya vācāya saññato bhaveyyāsi,
atk-s0507a0:94_9: yakkho vā devo vā devaññataro vā tvaṃ bhavissasi,
atk-s0507a0:94_10: kāmaṃ kāmitabbaṃ uḷāraṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhitvā tattha kāmanasīlo yathāsukhaṃ indriyānaṃ paricaraṇena abhiramaṇasīloti.
atk-s0507a0:95_0: Taṃ sutvā thero tato rājagahaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto satthu tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:95_1: Satthā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:98_0: Yaṃ kiñcārammaṇaṃ katvāti idaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatino dānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:98_1: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira gahapatino dhītu dhītāya dārikāya dhāti piṭṭhadhītalikaṃ adāsi “ayaṃ te dhītā,
atk-s0507a0:98_4: Athassā ekadivasaṃ taṃ gahetvā kīḷantiyā pamādena patitvā bhijji.
atk-s0507a0:98_6: Taṃ rodantiṃ kocipi gehajano saññāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0507a0:98_7: Tasmiñca samaye satthā anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatino gehe paññatte āsane nisinno hoti,
atk-s0507a0:98_8: mahāseṭṭhi ca bhagavato samīpe nisinno ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:98_9: Dhāti taṃ dārikaṃ gahetvā seṭṭhissa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:98_10: Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā “kissāyaṃ dārikā rodatī”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:98_12: Seṭṭhi taṃ dārikaṃ aṅke nisīdāpetvā “tava dhītudānaṃ dassāmī”ti saññāpetvā satthu ārocesi – “bhante,
atk-s0507a0:98_13: mama nattudhītaraṃ piṭṭhadhītalikaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dātukāmo,
atk-s0507a0:98_14: taṃ me pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ svātanāya adhivāsethā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:99_0: Atha bhagavā dutiyadivase pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ seṭṭhissa gharaṃ gantvā bhattakiccaṃ katvā anumodanaṃ karonto –
atk-s0507a0:102_0: Pubbapete ca ārabbha, atha vā vatthudevatā.
atk-s0507a0:106_0: Te ceva pūjitā honti, dāyakā ca anipphalā.
atk-s0507a0:108_0: “Na hi ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā, yā caññā paridevanā;
atk-s0507a0:109_0: Na taṃ petassa atthāya, evaṃ tiṭṭhanti ñātayo.
atk-s0507a0:112_0: Dīgharattaṃ hitāyassa, ṭhānaso upakappatī”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0507a0:113_1: Tattha yaṃ kiñcārammaṇaṃ katvāti maṅgalādīsu aññataraṃ yaṃ kiñci ārabbha uddissa.
atk-s0507a0:113_3: Amaccharīti attano sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanalakkhaṇassa maccherassa abhāvato amaccharī,
atk-s0507a0:113_4: pariccāgasīlo macchariyalobhādicittamalaṃ dūrato katvā dānaṃ dadeyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:113_5: Pubbapete ca ārabbhāti pubbakepi pete uddissa.
atk-s0507a0:113_6: Vatthudevatāti gharavatthuādīsu adhivatthā devatā ārabbhāti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:113_7: Atha vāti iminā aññepi devamanussādike ye keci ārabbha dānaṃ dadeyyāti dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:114_1: Tattha devesu tāva ekacce pākaṭe deve dassento “cattāro ca mahārāje”ti vatvā puna te nāmato gaṇhanto “kuvera”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:114_4: Te ceva pūjitā hontīti te ca mahārājāno pubbapetavatthudevatāyo ca uddisanakiriyāya paṭimānikā honti.
atk-s0507a0:114_5: Dāyakā ca anipphalāti ye dānaṃ denti,
atk-s0507a0:114_6: te dāyakā ca paresaṃ uddisanamattena na nipphalā,
atk-s0507a0:115_1: Idāni “ye attano ñātīnaṃ maraṇena rodanti paridevanti socanti,
atk-s0507a0:115_3: attaparitāpanamattamevā”ti dassetuṃ “na hi ruṇṇaṃ vā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0507a0:115_4: Tattha ruṇṇanti ruditaṃ assumocanaṃ na hi kātabbanti vacanaseso.
atk-s0507a0:115_7: Yā caññā paridevanāti yā ca ruṇṇasokato aññā paridevanā,
atk-s0507a0:115_12: Na taṃ petassa atthāyāti yasmā ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā paridevanā vāti sabbampi taṃ petassa kālakatassa atthāya upakārāya na hoti,
atk-s0507a0:115_14: tathāpi evaṃ tiṭṭhanti ñātayo aviddasunoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:116_1: Evaṃ ruṇṇādīnaṃ niratthakabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni yā pubbapetādike ārabbha dāyakena saṅghassa dakkhiṇā dinnā,
atk-s0507a0:116_2: tassā sātthakabhāvaṃ dassento “ayañca kho dakkhiṇā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0507a0:116_3: Tattha ayanti dāyakena taṃ dinnaṃ dānaṃ paccakkhato dassento vadati. Ca-
atk-s0507a0:116_5: tena yathā ruṇṇādi petassa na kassaci atthāya hoti,
atk-s0507a0:116_7: ayaṃ pana dakkhiṇā dīgharattaṃ hitāyassa hotīti vakkhamānameva visesaṃ joteti.
atk-s0507a0:116_10: Saṅghamhi suppatiṭṭhitāti anuttare puññakkhette saṅghe suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0507a0:116_11: Dīgharattaṃ hitāyassāti assa petassa cirakālaṃ hitāya atthāya.
atk-s0507a0:116_15: yaṃ pete uddissa dāne dinne petā ce anumodanti,
atk-s0507a0:117_0: Evaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ pete uddissa dānābhiratamānasaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0507a0:117_1: Punadivase seṭṭhibhariyā avasesā ca ñātakā seṭṭhiṃ anuvattantā evaṃ temāsamattaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:117_2: Atha rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:117_3: bhikkhū māsamattaṃ mama gharaṃ nāgamiṃsū”ti pucchi.
atk-s0507a0:117_4: Satthārā tasmiṃ kāraṇe kathite rājāpi seṭṭhiṃ anuvattanto buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0507a0:117_5: taṃ disvā nāgarā rājānaṃ anuvattantā māsamattaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:120_0: Tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantīti idaṃ satthā rājagahe viharanto sambahule pete ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:121_1: ito dvānavutikappe kāsi nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:121_2: Tattha jayaseno nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0507a0:121_4: Tassā kucchiyaṃ phusso nāma bodhisatto nibbattitvā anupubbena sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi.
atk-s0507a0:121_5: Jayaseno rājā “mama putto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā buddho jāto,
atk-s0507a0:121_8: mayhaṃ saṅgho”ti mamattaṃ uppādetvā sabbakālaṃ sayameva upaṭṭhahati,
atk-s0507a0:122_0: Bhagavato kaniṭṭhabhātaro vemātikā tayo bhātaro cintesuṃ –
atk-s0507a0:122_3: Amhākañca pitā aññesaṃ okāsaṃ na deti.
atk-s0507a0:122_4: Kathaṃ nu kho mayaṃ labheyyāma bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti?
atk-s0507a0:122_8: Tato rājā “paccanto kupito”ti sutvā tayopi putte paccantaṃ vūpasametuṃ pesesi.
atk-s0507a0:122_18: Evaṃ “cha, pañca, cattāri, tīṇi, dve, ekaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:123_6: Te tayo attano janapade niyuttakapurisassa lekhaṃ pesesuṃ “imaṃ temāsaṃ amhehi bhagavā upaṭṭhātabbo,
atk-s0507a0:123_7: vihāraṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānasambhāraṃ sampādehī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:123_9: Te kāsāyavatthanivatthā hutvā purisasahassehi veyyāvaccakarehi bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0507a0:123_10: upaṭṭhahamānā janapadaṃ netvā vihāraṃ niyyātetvā vassaṃ vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:124_0: Tesaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko eko gahapatiputto sapajāpatiko saddho ahosi pasanno.
atk-s0507a0:124_1: So buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānavattaṃ sakkaccaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:124_2: Janapade niyuttakapuriso taṃ gahetvā jānapadehi ekādasamattehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ sakkaccameva dānaṃ pavattāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:124_4: Te dānassa antarāyaṃ katvā deyyadhammaṃ attanā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0507a0:124_6: Pavāritā rājaputtā bhagavato sakkāraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ purakkhatvā pitu santikameva paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:124_8: Rājaputtā ca janapade niyuttakapuriso ca bhaṇḍāgāriko ca anupubbena kālaṃ katvā saddhiṃ parisāya sagge uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0507a0:124_10: Evaṃ tesaṃ ubhayesaṃ janānaṃ saggato saggaṃ nirayato nirayaṃ upapajjantānaṃ dvānavutikappā vītivattā.
atk-s0507a0:125_0: Atha imasmiṃ bhaddakappe kassapassa bhagavato kāle te paṭihatacittā janā petesu uppannā.
atk-s0507a0:125_1: Tadā manussā attano attano ñātakānaṃ petānaṃ atthāya dānaṃ datvā uddisanti “idaṃ no ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti,
atk-s0507a0:125_3: Atha imepi petā taṃ disvā kassapaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0507a0:125_8: anāgate pana gotamo nāma sammāsambuddho bhavissati,
atk-s0507a0:125_9: tassa bhagavato kāle bimbisāro nāma rājā bhavissati,
atk-s0507a0:125_10: so tumhākaṃ ito dvānavutikappe ñāti ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:125_11: so buddhassa dānaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ uddisissati,
atk-s0507a0:125_13: Evaṃ vutte kira tesaṃ petānaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ “sve labhissathā”ti vuttaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:126_0: Tato ekasmiṃ buddhantare vītivatte amhākaṃ bhagavā uppajji.
atk-s0507a0:126_1: Tepi tayo rājaputtā purisasahassena saddhiṃ devalokato cavitvā magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uppajjitvā
atk-s0507a0:126_2: anupubbena tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā gayāsīse tayo jaṭilā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0507a0:126_4: bhaṇḍāgāriko gahapatiputto visākho nāma seṭṭhi ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:126_5: tassa pajāpati dhammadinnā nāma seṭṭhidhītā ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:126_6: avasesā pana parisā rañño eva parivārā hutvā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:127_0: Amhākampi bhagavā loke uppajjitvā sattasattāhaṃ atikkamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ āgamma dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0507a0:127_1: pavattetvā pañcavaggiye ādiṃ katvā yāva sahassaparivāre tayo jaṭile vinetvā rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:127_2: Tattha ca tadahupasaṅkamantaṃyeva rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi saddhiṃ ekādasanahutehi aṅgamagadhavāsīhi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi.
atk-s0507a0:127_3: Atha raññā svātanāya bhattena nimantito adhivāsetvā dutiyadivase māṇavakavaṇṇena sakkena devānamindena purato gacchantena –
atk-s0507a0:130_0: Evamādīhi gāthāhi abhitthaviyamāno rājagahaṃ pavisitvā rañño nivesane mahādānaṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0507a0:130_1: Te pana petā “idāni rājā dānaṃ amhākaṃ uddisissati,
atk-s0507a0:131_0: Rājā dānaṃ datvā “kattha nu kho bhagavā vihareyyā”ti bhagavato vihāraṭṭhānameva cintesi,
atk-s0507a0:131_2: Tathā taṃ dānaṃ alabhantā petā chinnāsā hutvā rattiyaṃ rañño nivesane ativiya bhiṃsanakaṃ vissaramakaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:131_3: Rājā bhayasantāsasaṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā vibhātāya rattiyā bhagavato ārocehi –
atk-s0507a0:131_9: apica kho santi te purāṇañātakā petesu uppannā.
atk-s0507a0:131_10: Te ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tameva paccāsīsantā ‘buddhassa dānaṃ datvā amhākaṃ uddisissatī’ti vicarantā tayā
atk-s0507a0:131_11: hiyyo dānaṃ datvā na uddisitattā chinnāsā hutvā tathārūpaṃ vissaramakaṃsū”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:132_0: Rājā nivesanaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:132_1: Bhagavā rājantepuraṃ gantvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0507a0:132_2: Te petā “api nāma ajja labheyyāmā”ti gantvā tirokuṭṭādīsu aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:132_4: yathā te sabbeva rañño āpāthaṃ gatā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:132_5: Rājā dakkhiṇodakaṃ dento “idaṃ me ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti uddisi.
atk-s0507a0:132_7: Te tattha nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paṭippassaddhadarathakilamathapipāsā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:132_13: Sā ca tesaṃ sampatti sabbāpi yathā rañño pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0507a0:132_15: Rājā taṃ disvā ativiya attamano ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:132_16: Tato bhagavā bhuttāvī pavārito rañño bimbisārassa anumodanatthaṃ tirokuṭṭapetavatthuṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0507a0:138_0: Na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammapaccayā.
atk-s0507a0:143_0: “Idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo;
atk-s0507a0:144_0: Te ca tattha samāgantvā, ñātipetā samāgatā;
atk-s0507a0:147_0: “Ciraṃ jīvantu no ñātī, yesaṃ hetu labhāmase;
atk-s0507a0:148_0: Amhākañca katā pūjā, dāyakā ca anipphalā.
atk-s0507a0:150_0: “Na hi tattha kasi atthi, gorakkhettha na vijjati;
atk-s0507a0:152_0: Ito dinnena yāpenti, petā kālagatā tahiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:160_0: “Adāsi me akāsi me, ñātimittā sakhā ca me;
atk-s0507a0:163_0: “Na hi ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā, yā caññā paridevanā;
atk-s0507a0:164_0: Na taṃ petānamatthāya, evaṃ tiṭṭhanti ñātayo.
atk-s0507a0:169_0: “So ñātidhammo ca ayaṃ nidassito, petāna pūjā ca katā uḷārā;
atk-s0507a0:170_0: Balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṃ, tumhehi puññaṃ pahutaṃ anappaka”nti.
atk-s0507a0:171_3: gehapākārakuṭṭānaṃ dvārato bahi eva tiṭṭhantīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:171_4: Sandhisiṅghāṭakesu cāti sandhīsu ca siṅghāṭakesu ca.
atk-s0507a0:171_8: Dvārabāhāsu tiṭṭhantīti nagaradvāragharadvārānaṃ bāhā nissāya tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0507a0:171_9: Āgantvāna sakaṃ gharanti sakagharaṃ nāma pubbañātigharampi attanā sāmibhāvena ajjhāvutthagharampi,
atk-s0507a0:172_1: Evaṃ bhagavā pubbe anajjhāvutthapubbampi pubbañātigharattā bimbisāranivesanaṃ sakagharasaññāya āgantvā
atk-s0507a0:172_2: tirokuṭṭādīsu ṭhite issāmacchariyaphalaṃ anubhavante ativiya duddasikavirūpabhayānakadassane bahū pete
atk-s0507a0:172_3: rañño dassento “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”ti gāthaṃ vatvā puna tehi katassa kammassa dāruṇabhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0507a0:173_3: kāro labbhati “pahu santo na bharatī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0507a0:173_11: Na tesaṃ koci sarati sattānanti tesaṃ pettivisaye uppannānaṃ sattānaṃ koci mātā vā pitā vā putto vā nattā vā na sarati.
atk-s0507a0:173_15: Tañhi kammaṃ tesaṃ ñātīnaṃ sarituṃ na deti.
atk-s0507a0:174_1: Evaṃ bhagavā anappakepi annapānādimhi vijjamāne ñātīnaṃ paccāsīsantānaṃ petānaṃ kammaphalena ñātakānaṃ
atk-s0507a0:174_2: anussaraṇamattassāpi abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni pettivisayupapanne ñātake uddissa raññā dinnadānaṃ pasaṃsanto
atk-s0507a0:175_2: tesaṃ sattānaṃ kammapaccayā asarantesupi kesuci keci dadanti ñātīnaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:175_3: ye evaṃ anukampakā hontīti ca, mahārāja,
atk-s0507a0:175_5: evaṃ suciṃ paṇītaṃ kālena kappiyaṃ pānabhojanaṃ dadanti ñātīnaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:175_8: Ñātīnanti mātito ca pitito ca sambandhānaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:176_1: Idāni yena pakārena tesaṃ petānaṃ dinnaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0507a0:176_3: sukhitā hontu ñātayo”ti catutthagāthāya pubbaḍḍhaṃ āha.
atk-s0507a0:178_0: Idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo”ti.
atk-s0507a0:179_0: Tena “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotūti evaṃ pakārena dadanti,
atk-s0507a0:179_1: no aññathā”ti ākāratthena evaṃsaddena dātabbākāranidassanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0507a0:180_2: Ñātīnaṃ hotūti pettivisaye uppannānaṃ ñātakānaṃ hotu.
atk-s0507a0:180_5: Sukhitā hontu ñātayoti te pettivisayūpapannā ñātayo idaṃ phalaṃ paccanubhavantā sukhitā sukhappattā hontu.
atk-s0507a0:181_0: Yasmā “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti vuttepi aññena katakammaṃ na aññassa phaladaṃ hoti,
atk-s0507a0:181_1: kevalaṃ pana tathā uddissa dīyamānaṃ taṃ vatthu ñātipetānaṃ kusalakammassa paccayo hoti,
atk-s0507a0:181_2: tasmā yathā tesaṃ tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe phalanibbattakaṃ kusalakammaṃ hoti,
atk-s0507a0:182_2: Samāgantvāti “ime no ñātayo amhākaṃ atthāya dānaṃ uddisantī”ti anumodanatthaṃ tattha samāgatā hutvā.
atk-s0507a0:182_3: Pahūte annapānamhīti attano uddissa dīyamāne tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:182_4: Sakkaccaṃ anumodareti kammaphalaṃ abhisaddahantā cittīkāraṃ avijahantā avikkhittacittā hutvā “idaṃ no
atk-s0507a0:182_5: dānaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotū”ti modanti anumodanti pītisomanassajātā honti.
atk-s0507a0:183_1: Ciraṃ jīvantūti ciraṃ jīvino dīghāyukā hontu.
atk-s0507a0:183_3: Yesaṃ hetūti yesaṃ kāraṇā ye nissāya.
atk-s0507a0:183_5: Idañhi uddisanena laddhasampattiṃ anubhavantānaṃ petānaṃ attano ñātīnaṃ thomanākāradassanaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:183_8: ukkhiṇeyyasampattiyā cāti tīhi aṅgehi dakkhiṇā taṅkhaṇaññeva phalanibbattikā hoti.
atk-s0507a0:183_11: Amhākañca katā pūjāti “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ uddisantehi dāyakehi amhākañca pūjā katā,
atk-s0507a0:183_12: te dāyakā ca anipphalā yasmiṃ santāne pariccāgamayaṃ kammaṃ nibbattaṃ tassa tattheva phaladānato.
atk-s0507a0:184_1: “kiṃ pana pettivisayūpapannā eva ñātī hetusampattiyo labhanti,
atk-s0507a0:185_3: puññāni karoma ‘idaṃ dānaṃ petānaṃ ñātisālohitānaṃ upakappatu,
atk-s0507a0:185_8: kacci te petā ñātisālohitā taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjantīti?
atk-s0507a0:186_5: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nirayaṃ upapajjati.
atk-s0507a0:186_8: tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:186_9: yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0507a0:187_3: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjati.
atk-s0507a0:187_8: yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0507a0:188_3: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati…pe…
atk-s0507a0:188_9: yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0507a0:189_3: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisayaṃ upapajjati.
atk-s0507a0:189_7: Yaṃ vā panassa ito anupavecchenti mittāmaccā vā ñātisālohitā vā,
atk-s0507a0:189_9: tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:190_2: so peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti,
atk-s0507a0:190_5: petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ upapannā honti,
atk-s0507a0:191_2: so ceva peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti,
atk-s0507a0:191_3: aññepissa petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapannā honti,
atk-s0507a0:191_7: yaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vivittaṃ assa iminā dīghena addhunā yadidaṃ petehi ñātisālohitehi, apica, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0507a0:192_1: Idāni pettivisayūpapannānaṃ tattha aññassa kasigorakkhādino sampattipaṭilābhakāraṇassa abhāvaṃ ito dinnena yāpanañca dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:193_0: Tattha na hi tattha kasi atthīti tasmiṃ pettivisaye kasi na hi atthi,
atk-s0507a0:193_2: Gorakkhettha na vijjatīti ettha pettivisaye na kevalaṃ kasiyeva natthi,
atk-s0507a0:193_5: Vaṇijjā tādisī natthīti vaṇijjāpi tādisī natthi,
atk-s0507a0:193_7: Hiraññena kayākayanti hiraññena kayavikkayampi tattha tādisaṃ natthi,
atk-s0507a0:193_10: petā kālagatā tahinti kevalaṃ pana ito ñātīhi vā mittāmaccehi vā dinnena yāpenti,
atk-s0507a0:194_1: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāhi pakāsetuṃ “unname udakaṃ vuṭṭha”nti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0507a0:194_3: yathā unname thale unnatappadese meghehi abhivuṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ yathā ninnaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0507a0:194_6: evameva ito dinnaṃ dānaṃ petānaṃ upakappati,
atk-s0507a0:194_8: Ninnamiva hi udakappavattiyā ṭhānaṃ petaloko dānūpakappanāya. Yathāha –
atk-s0507a0:194_11: Yathā ca kandarapadarasākhapasākhakusobbhamahāsobbhe hi ogalitena udakena vārivahā mahānajjo pūrā hutvā sāgaraṃ paripūrenti,
atk-s0507a0:194_12: evaṃ ito dinnadānaṃ pubbe vuttanayena petānaṃ upakappatīti.
atk-s0507a0:195_1: Yasmā petā “ito kiñci labhāmā”ti āsābhibhūtā ñātigharaṃ āgantvāpi “idaṃ nāma no dethā”ti yācituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0507a0:195_2: tasmā tesaṃ imāni anussaraṇavatthūni anussaranto kulaputto dakkhiṇaṃ dajjāti dassento “adāsi me”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0507a0:196_1: idaṃ nāma me dhanaṃ vā dhaññaṃ vā adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:196_2: idaṃ nāma me kiccaṃ attanāyeva yogaṃ āpajjanto akāsi,
atk-s0507a0:196_3: “asuko me mātito vā pitito vā sambandhattā ñāti,
atk-s0507a0:196_5: asuko me sahapaṃsukīḷakasahāyo sakhā”ti ca etaṃ sabbamanussaranto petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā dānaṃ niyyāteyya.
atk-s0507a0:196_8: tena “adāsi me”tiādinā nayena pubbe katamanussaraṃ anussaratāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0507a0:197_1: Ye pana sattā ñātimaraṇena ruṇṇasokādiparā eva hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0507a0:197_3: tesaṃ taṃ ruṇṇasokādi kevalaṃ attaparitāpanamattameva hoti,
atk-s0507a0:197_4: taṃ na petānaṃ kañci atthaṃ sādhetīti dassento “na hi ruṇṇaṃ vā”ti gāthaṃ vatvā puna magadharājena dinnadakkhiṇāya
atk-s0507a0:198_1: Idāni yasmā imaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dentena raññā ñātīnaṃ ñātīhi kattabbakiccakaraṇena ñātidhammo nidassito,
atk-s0507a0:198_3: nidassanaṃ pākaṭaṃ kataṃ “tumhehipi evameva ñātīsu ñātidhammo paripūretabbo”ti.
atk-s0507a0:198_4: Te ca pete dibbasampattiṃ adhigamentena petānaṃ pūjā katā uḷārā,
atk-s0507a0:198_5: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ annapānādīhi santappentena bhikkhūnaṃ balaṃ anuppadinnaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:198_6: anukampādiguṇaparivārañca cāgacetanaṃ nibbattentena anappakaṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:198_7: tasmā bhagavā imehi yathābhuccaguṇehi rājānaṃ sampahaṃsento “so ñātidhammo”ti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0507a0:199_4: Ettha ca “so ñātidhammo ca ayaṃ nidassito”ti etena bhagavā rājānaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi.
atk-s0507a0:199_6: “Petāna pūjā ca katā uḷārā”ti iminā samādapesi.
atk-s0507a0:199_9: Bhikkhūnaṃ balānuppadānañhettha evaṃvidhānaṃ balānuppadāne ussāhavaḍḍhanena samuttejanaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:199_11: Puññapasavanakittanañhettha tassa yathābhuccaguṇasaṃvaṇṇanabhāvena sampahaṃsananti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0507a0:200_0: Desanāpariyosāne ca pettivisayūpapattiādīnavasaṃvaṇṇanena saṃviggahadayānaṃ yoniso padahataṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:200_2: Evaṃ yāva satta divasā tādisova dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:203_0: Naggā dubbaṇṇarūpāsīti idaṃ satthari sāvatthiyaṃ viharante pañcaputtakhādakapetiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:203_1: Sāvatthiyā kira avidūre gāmake aññatarassa kuṭumbikassa bhariyā vañjhā ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:203_5: So tasso bhariyāya sinehena na icchi.
atk-s0507a0:203_6: Athassa bhariyā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā sāmikaṃ evamāha – “sāmi,
atk-s0507a0:203_10: So tāya nippīḷiyamāno aññaṃ kaññaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0507a0:203_13: “ayaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā imassa gehassa issarā bhavissatī”ti issāpakatā tassā gabbhapātanūpāyaṃ pariyesantī
atk-s0507a0:203_14: aññataraṃ paribbājikaṃ annapānādīhi saṅgaṇhitvā tāya tassā gabbhapātanaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:203_15: Sā gabbhe patite attano mātuyā ārocesi,
atk-s0507a0:203_16: mātā attano ñātake samodhānetvā tamatthaṃ nivedesi.
atk-s0507a0:203_23: duggatiparāyaṇā khuppipāsābhibhūtā sāyaṃ pātaṃ pañca pañca putte vijāyitvā khāditvā tittiṃ na gaccheyyaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:203_24: niccaṃ duggandhā makkhikāparikiṇṇā ca bhaveyya”nti musā vatvā sapathaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0507a0:203_25: Sā nacirasseva kālaṃ katvā tasseva gāmassa avidūre dubbaṇṇarūpā petī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:204_0: Tadā janapade vutthavassā aṭṭha therā satthu dassanatthaṃ sāvatthiṃ āgacchantā tassa gāmassa avidūre
atk-s0507a0:204_2: Atha sā petī therānaṃ attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:207_0: Makkhikāhi parikiṇṇā, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:208_2: Dubbaṇṇarūpāsīti ṇavirūpā ativiya bībhaccharūpena samannāgatā asi.
atk-s0507a0:208_6: Kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasīti kā nāma evarūpā imasmiṃ ṭhāne tiṭṭhasi,
atk-s0507a0:209_0: Atha sā petī mahātherena evaṃ puṭṭhā attānaṃ pakāsentī sattānaṃ saṃvegaṃ janentī –
atk-s0507a0:215_0: Vijāyitvāna khādāmi, tepi nā honti me alaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:218_0: Pānīyaṃ na labhe pātuṃ, passa maṃ byasanaṃ gata”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:220_3: Yamalokikāti “yamaloko”ti laddhanāme petaloke tattha pariyāpannabhāvena viditā.
atk-s0507a0:220_4: Ito gatāti ito manussalokato petalokaṃ upapajjanavasena gatā,
atk-s0507a0:221_5: Sāyaṃ pañca punāpareti sāyanhakāle puna apare pañca putte khādāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:221_6: Vijāyitvānāti divase divase dasa dasa putte vijāyitvā.
atk-s0507a0:221_7: Tepi nā honti me alanti tepi dasaputtā ekadivasaṃ mayhaṃ khudāya paṭighātāya ahaṃ pariyattā na honti.
atk-s0507a0:222_1: Pariḍayhati dhūmāyati khudāya hadayaṃ mamāti khudāya jighacchāya bādhiyamānāya mama hadayapadeso udaragginā
atk-s0507a0:222_3: Pānīyaṃ na labhe pātunti pipāsābhibhūtā tattha tattha vicarantī pānīyampi pātuṃ na labhāmi.
atk-s0507a0:222_4: Passa maṃ byasanaṃ gatanti petūpapattiyā sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇañca imaṃ īdisaṃ byasanaṃ upagataṃ maṃ passa,
atk-s0507a0:222_5: bhanteti attanā anubhaviyamānaṃ dukkhaṃ therassa pavedesi.
atk-s0507a0:223_0: Taṃ sutvā thero tāya katakammaṃ pucchanto –
atk-s0507a0:225_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:228_0: Atha sā petī attanā katakammaṃ therassa kathentī –
atk-s0507a0:230_0: “Sapatī me gabbhinī āsi, tassā pāpaṃ acetayiṃ;
atk-s0507a0:234_0: Tadassā mātā kupitā, mayhaṃ ñātī samānayi;
atk-s0507a0:235_0: Sapathañca maṃ akāresi, paribhāsāpayī ca maṃ.
atk-s0507a0:242_2: Tassā pāpaṃ acetayinti tassa sapatiyā pāpaṃ luddakaṃ kammaṃ acetayiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:242_6: Lohitaññeva paggharīti vipajjamāno ruhiraññeva hutvā vissandi.
atk-s0507a0:242_8: mayhaṃ ñātī samānayīti tadā assā sapatiyā mātā mayhaṃ kupitā attano ñātake samodhānesi.
atk-s0507a0:243_3: Sapathaṃ musāvādaṃ abhāsisanti “sace taṃ mayā kataṃ,
atk-s0507a0:243_4: īdisī bhaveyya”nti katameva pāpaṃ akataṃ katvā dassentī musāvādaṃ abhūtaṃ sapathaṃ abhāsiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:243_6: sacetaṃ pakataṃ mayāti idaṃ tadā sapathassa katākāradassanaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:243_8: āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyaṃ mayhaṃ puttamaṃsāniyeva khādeyyanti attho.
atk-s0507a0:243_9: Tassa kammassāti tassa gabbhapātanavasena pakatassa pāṇātipātakammassa.
atk-s0507a0:243_13: Pubbalohitamakkhitāti pasavanavasena paribhijjanavasena ca pubbena ca lohitena ca makkhitā hutvā puttamaṃsāni khādāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:244_0: Evaṃ sā petī attano kammavipākaṃ pavedetvā puna there evamāha – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:244_1: imasmiṃyeva gāme asukassa kuṭumbikassa bhariyā issāpakatā hutvā pāpakammaṃ katvā evaṃ petayoniyaṃ nibbattā. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:244_5: evaṃ me ito petalokato mutti bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:244_6: Therā taṃ sutvā taṃ anukampamānā ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitā tassa kuṭumbikassa gehaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:244_7: Kuṭambiko there disvā sañjātappasādo paccuggantvā pattāni gahetvā there āsanesu nisīdāpetvā paṇītena āhārena bhojetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0507a0:244_8: Therā taṃ pavattiṃ kuṭumbikassa ārocetvā taṃ dānaṃ tassā petiyā uddisāpesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:244_9: Taṅkhaṇaññeva ca sā petī tato dukkhato apetā uḷārasampattiṃ paṭilabhitvā rattiyaṃ kuṭumbikassa attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:244_10: Atha therā anukkamena sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:244_11: Bhagavā ca tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:244_13: Evaṃ sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:247_0: Naggā dubbaṇṇarūpāsīti idaṃ satthari sāvatthiyaṃ viharante sattaputtakhādakapetiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:247_1: Sāvatthiyā kira avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmake aññatarassa upāsakassa dve puttā ahesuṃ –
atk-s0507a0:247_3: Tesaṃ mātā “puttavatī aha”nti puttabalena bhattāraṃ atimaññati.
atk-s0507a0:247_4: So bhariyāya avamānito nibbinnamānaso aññaṃ kaññaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0507a0:247_6: Athassa jeṭṭhabhariyā issāpakatā aññataraṃ vejjaṃ āmisena upalāpetvā tena tassā temāsikaṃ gabbhaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0507a0:247_7: Atha sā ñātīhi ca bhattārā ca “tayā imissā gabbho pātito”ti puṭṭhā “nāhaṃ pātemī”ti musā vatvā tehi asaddahantehi
atk-s0507a0:247_8: “sapathaṃ karohī”ti vuttā “sāyaṃ pātaṃ satta satta putte vijāyitvā puttamaṃsāni khādāmi,
atk-s0507a0:247_9: niccaṃ duggandhā ca makkhikāparikiṇṇā ca bhaveyya”nti sapathaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0507a0:248_0: Sā aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tassa gabbhapātanassa musāvādassa ca phaleneva petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0507a0:248_1: puttanayena puttamaṃsāni khādantī tasseva gāmassa avidūre vicarati.
atk-s0507a0:248_2: Tena ca samayena sambahulā therā gāmakāvāse vutthavassā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya sāvatthiṃ āgacchantā tassa
atk-s0507a0:248_3: gāmassa avidūre ekasmiṃ padese rattiyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:248_4: Atha sā petī tesaṃ therānaṃ attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:251_0: Makkhikāhi parikiṇṇā, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:252_0: Sā therena puṭṭhā tīhi gāthāhi paṭivacanaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0507a0:258_0: Vijāyitvāna khādāmi, tepi nā honti me alaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:262_3: Aggidaḍḍhāva ātapeti atiuṇhaātape agginā ḍayhamānā viya nibbutiṃ nādhigacchāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:263_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāthero tāya katakammaṃ pucchanto –
atk-s0507a0:265_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:267_0: Atha sā petī attano petalokūpapattiñca puttamaṃsakhādanakāraṇañca kathentī –
atk-s0507a0:273_0: Sā ca gabbhaṃ alabhittha, tassā pāpaṃ acetayiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:279_0: Sapathañca maṃ kāresi, paribhāsāpayī ca maṃ.
atk-s0507a0:285_0: Puttamaṃsāni khādāmi, pubbalohitamakkhitā”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0507a0:286_4: Pūtilohitako patīti kuṇapalohitaṃ hutvā gabbho paripati.
atk-s0507a0:289_0: Kiṃ nu ummattarūpo vāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ matapitikaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:289_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññatarassa kuṭumbikassa pitā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0507a0:289_2: So pitu maraṇena sokasantattahadayo rodamāno ummattako piya vicaranto yaṃ yaṃ passati,
atk-s0507a0:289_5: Na koci tassa sokaṃ vinodetuṃ asakkhi.
atk-s0507a0:289_6: Tassa pana hadaye ghaṭe padīpo viya sotāpattiphalassa upanissayo pajjalati.
atk-s0507a0:290_0: Satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento tassa sotāpattiphalassa upanissayaṃ disvā “imassa atītakāraṇaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0507a0:290_1: sokaṃ vūpasametvā sotāpattiphalaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā punadivase pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0507a0:290_3: So “satthā āgato”ti sutvā paccuggantvā satthāraṃ gehaṃ pavesetvā satthari paññatte āsane nisinne sayaṃ bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:290_8: So taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “bahū kira mayhaṃ pitaro”ti tanubhūtasoko thokaṃ majjhattataṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0507a0:290_9: Athassa satthā sokavinodanaṃ dhammakathaṃ katvā apagatasokaṃ kallacittaṃ viditvā sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya
atk-s0507a0:291_3: tathā sokaparidevasamāpanno upāsako khaṇeneva bhagavatā sotāpattiphale vinīto”ti.
atk-s0507a0:291_4: Satthā tattha gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0507a0:291_11: pubbepi apanītoyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0507a0:292_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ aññatarassa gahapatikassa pitā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0507a0:292_1: So pitu maraṇena sokaparidevasamāpanno assumukho rattakkho kandanto citakaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0507a0:292_2: Tassa putto sujāto nāma kumāro paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno pitusokavinayanūpāyaṃ cintento ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0507a0:292_3: bahinagare ekaṃ matagoṇaṃ disvā tiṇañca pānīyañca āharitvā tassa purato ṭhapetvā “khāda, khāda, piva,
atk-s0507a0:292_7: yo tvaṃ matassa goṇassa tiṇodakaṃ upanesī”ti vadanti?
atk-s0507a0:292_9: Manussā tassa pitu santikaṃ gantvā “putto te ummattako jāto,
atk-s0507a0:292_11: Taṃ sutvā ca kuṭumbikassa pitaraṃ ārabbha ṭhito soko apagato.
atk-s0507a0:292_12: So “mayhaṃ kira putto ummattako jāto”ti saṃvegappatto vegena gantvā “nanu tvaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:297_0: “Na hi annena pānena, mato goṇo samuṭṭhahe;
atk-s0507a0:298_0: Tvaṃsi bālo ca dummedho, yathā taññova dummatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:299_2: Ummattarūpovāti ummattakasabhāvo viya cittakkhepaṃ patto viya.
atk-s0507a0:299_8: Annena pānenāti tayā dinnena haritatiṇena vā pānīyena vā.
atk-s0507a0:299_9: Mato goṇo samuṭṭhaheti kālakato goṇo laddhajīvito hutvā na hi samuṭṭhaheyya.
atk-s0507a0:299_10: Tvaṃsi bālo ca dummedhoti tvaṃ bālyayogato bālo,
atk-s0507a0:299_12: Yathā taññova dummatīti yathā taṃ aññopi nippañño vippalapeyya,
atk-s0507a0:300_0: Taṃ sutvā sujāto pitaraṃ saññāpetuṃ attano adhippāyaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0507a0:302_0: “Ime pādā idaṃ sīsaṃ, ayaṃ kāyo savāladhi;
atk-s0507a0:303_0: Nettā tatheva tiṭṭhanti, ayaṃ goṇo samuṭṭhahe.
atk-s0507a0:307_4: saha vāladhinā vattatīti savāladhi ayaṃ kāyo.
atk-s0507a0:307_5: Imāni ca nettā nayanāni yathā maraṇato pubbe,
atk-s0507a0:307_7: Ayaṃ goṇo samuṭṭhaheti imasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ goṇo samuṭṭhaheyya samuttiṭṭheyyāti mama cittaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0507a0:307_9: tena kāraṇena ayaṃ goṇo sahasāpi kāyaṃ samuṭṭhaheyyāti ahaṃ maññeyyaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:307_11: Ayyakassa pana mayhaṃ pitāmahassa na hatthapādā kāyo sīsaṃ dissati,
atk-s0507a0:307_12: kevalaṃ pana tassa aṭṭhikāni pakkhipitvā kate mattikāmaye thūpe rudanto sataguṇena sahassaguṇena, tāta,
atk-s0507a0:307_15: tattha vijānataṃ kā paridevanāti pitu dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:308_0: Taṃ sutvā bodhisattassa pitā “mama mutto paṇḍito maṃ saññāpetuṃ imaṃ kammaṃ akāsī”ti cintetvā “tāta sujāta,
atk-s0507a0:308_3: sokaharaṇasamatthena nāma medhāvinā tādiseneva bhavitabba”nti puttaṃ pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0507a0:311_0: Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
atk-s0507a0:317_0: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇava.
atk-s0507a0:321_4: Vārinā viya osiñcanti udakena avasiñcanto viya.
atk-s0507a0:321_5: Sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daranti sabbaṃ me cittadarathaṃ nibbāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:321_13: tava vacanaṃ sutvā idāni pana na socāmi na rodāmi.
atk-s0507a0:321_14: Sujāto pitaraṃ yathāti yathā ayaṃ sujāto attano pitaraṃ sokato vinivattesi,
atk-s0507a0:321_15: evaṃ aññepi ye anukampakā anuggaṇhasīlā honti,
atk-s0507a0:321_16: te sappaññā evaṃ karonti pitūnaṃ aññesañca upakāraṃ karontīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:322_0: Māṇavassa vacanaṃ sutvā pitā apagatasoko hutvā sīsaṃ nahāyitvā bhuñjitvā kammante pavattetvā kālaṃ katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:322_1: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0507a0:325_0: Gūthañca muttaṃ ruhirañca pubbanti idaṃ satthari sāvatthiyaṃ viharante aññataraṃ pesakārapetiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:325_1: Dvādasamattā kira bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vasanayoggaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsantā upakaṭṭhāya
atk-s0507a0:325_2: vassūpanāyikāya aññataraṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ araññāyatanaṃ tassa ca nātidūre nāccāsanne gocaragāmaṃ
atk-s0507a0:325_3: disvā tattha ekarattiṃ vasitvā dutiyadivase gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:325_5: te te bhikkhū disvā sañjātasomanassā hutvā attano attano gehaṃ netvā paṇītena āhārena parivisitvā āhaṃsu “kuhiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:325_12: Upāsakā tesaṃ tattha araññakuṭikāyo kāretvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:326_0: Tattha jeṭṭhakapesakāro dve bhikkhū catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi,
atk-s0507a0:326_2: Jeṭṭhakapesakārassa bhariyā assaddhā appasannā micchādiṭṭhikā maccharinī bhikkhū na sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0507a0:326_3: So taṃ disvā tassāyeva kaniṭṭhabhaginiṃ ānetvā attano gehe issariyaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0507a0:326_4: Sā saddhā pasannā hutvā sakkaccaṃ bhikkhū paṭijaggi.
atk-s0507a0:326_5: Te sabbe pesakāro vassaṃ vutthānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekekassa ekekaṃ sāṭakamadaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:326_6: Tattha maccharinī jeṭṭhapesakārassa bhariyā paduṭṭhacittā attano sāmikaṃ paribhāsi –
atk-s0507a0:326_7: “yaṃ tayā samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ dānaṃ dinnaṃ annapānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:326_8: taṃ te paraloke gūthamuttaṃ pubbalohitañca hutvā nibbattatu,
atk-s0507a0:327_0: Tattha jeṭṭhapesakāro aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā viñjhāṭaviyaṃ ānubhāvasampannā rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:327_1: Tassa pana kadariyā bhariyā kālaṃ katvā tasseva vasanaṭṭhānassa avidūre petī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:327_2: Sā naggā dubbaṇṇarūpā jighacchāpipāsābhibhūtā tassa bhūmadevassa santikaṃ gantvā āha – “ahaṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0507a0:327_5: So tassā dibbaṃ uḷāraṃ annapānaṃ upanesi.
atk-s0507a0:327_6: Taṃ tāya gahitamattameva gūthamuttaṃ pubbalohitañca sampajjati,
atk-s0507a0:327_7: sāṭakañca dinnaṃ tāya paridahitaṃ pajjalitaṃ ayomayapaṭṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0507a0:327_8: Sā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantī taṃ chaḍḍetvā kandantī vicarati.
atk-s0507a0:328_0: Tena ca samayena aññataro bhikkhu vutthavasso satthāraṃ vandituṃ gacchanto mahatā satthena saddhiṃ viñjhāṭaviṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0507a0:328_1: Satthikā rattiṃ maggaṃ gantvā divā vane sandacchāyūdakasampannaṃ padesaṃ disvā yānāni muñcitvā muhuttaṃ vissamiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:328_2: Bhikkhu pana vivekakāmatāya thokaṃ apakkamitvā aññatarassa sandacchāyassa vanagahanapaṭicchannassa rukkhassa
atk-s0507a0:328_3: mūle saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā nipanno rattiyaṃ maggagamanaparissamena kilantakāyo niddaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0507a0:328_6: Atha sāyanhasamaye uṭṭhahitvā te apassanto aññataraṃ kummaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā anukkamena tassā devatāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0507a0:328_7: Atha naṃ so devaputto disvā manussarūpena upagantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā attano vimānaṃ pavesetvā pādabbhañjanādīni datvā payirupāsanto nisīdi.
atk-s0507a0:328_8: Tasmiñca samaye sā petī āgantvā “dehi me, sāmi,
atk-s0507a0:328_12: So bhikkhu taṃ disvā sañjātasaṃvego taṃ devaputtaṃ –
atk-s0507a0:330_0: “Gūthañca muttaṃ ruhirañca pubbaṃ, paribhuñjati kissa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0507a0:331_0: Ayaṃ nu kiṃ kammamakāsi nārī, yā sabbadā lohitapubbabhakkhā.
atk-s0507a0:333_0: “Navāni vatthāni subhāni ceva, mudūni suddhāni ca lomasāni;
atk-s0507a0:334_0: Dinnāni missā kitakā bhavanti, ayaṃ nu kiṃ kammamakāsi nārī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:335_1: Tattha kissa ayaṃ vipākoti kīdisassa kammassa ayaṃ vipāko,
atk-s0507a0:335_3: Ayaṃ nu kiṃ kammamakāsi nārīti ayaṃ itthī kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ pubbe akāsi.
atk-s0507a0:335_4: Yā sabbadā lohitapubbabhakkhāti yā sabbakālaṃ ruhirapubbameva bhakkhati paribhuñjati.
atk-s0507a0:335_11: Dinnāni missā kitakā bhavantīti kitakakaṇṭakasadisāni lohapaṭṭasadisāni bhavanti.
atk-s0507a0:336_0: Evaṃ so devaputto tena bhikkhunā puṭṭho tāya purimajātiyā katakammaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0507a0:338_0: “Bhariyā mamesā ahu bhadante, adāyikā maccharinī kadariyā;
atk-s0507a0:339_0: Sā maṃ dadantaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ, akkosati ca paribhāsati ca.
atk-s0507a0:341_0: “Gūthañca muttaṃ ruhirañca pubbaṃ, paribhuñja tvaṃ asuciṃ sabbakālaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:342_0: Etaṃ te paralokasmiṃ hotu, vatthā ca te kitakasamā bhavantu;
atk-s0507a0:343_0: Etādisaṃ duccaritaṃ caritvā, idhāgatā cirarattāya khādatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:344_2: Maccharinī kadariyāti paṭhamaṃ maccheramalassa sabhāvena maccharinī,
atk-s0507a0:344_5: Idāni tassā tameva kadariyataṃ dassento “sā maṃ dadanta”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:344_13: tato aññattha pathaviyaṃ kamantakasaṅkhāte matthake asanipāto viya attano upari patati.
atk-s0507a0:345_0: Evaṃ so devaputto tāya pubbe katakammaṃ kathetvā puna taṃ bhikkhuṃ āha –
atk-s0507a0:345_5: Yadi bhagavato ariyasaṅghassa ca ekasseva vā bhikkhuno dānaṃ datvā imissā uddisiyati,
atk-s0507a0:345_8: Taṃ sutvā devaputto tassa bhikkhuno paṇītaṃ annapānaṃ datvā taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ tassā petiyā ādisi.
atk-s0507a0:345_9: Tāvadeva sā petī suhitā pīṇindriyā dibbāhārassa tittā ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:345_10: Puna tasseva bhikkhuno hatthe dibbasāṭakayugaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa datvā tañca dakkhiṇaṃ petiyā ādisi.
atk-s0507a0:345_11: Tāvadeva ca sā dibbavatthanivatthā dibbālaṅkāravibhūsitā sabbakāmasamiddhā devaccharāpaṭibhāgā ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:345_12: So ca bhikkhu tassa devaputtassa iddhiyā tadaheva sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā bhagavato santikaṃ
atk-s0507a0:345_13: upagantvā vanditvā taṃ sāṭakayugaṃ datvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:345_14: Bhagavāpi tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:348_0: Kā nu antovimānasminti idaṃ satthari sāvatthiyaṃ viharante aññataraṃ khallāṭiyapetiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:348_1: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ aññatarā rūpūpajīvinī itthī abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā atimanoharakesakalāpī ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:348_2: Tassā hi kesā nīlā dīghā tanū mudū siniddhā vellitaggā dvihatthagayhā visaṭṭhā yāva mekhalā kalāpā olambanti.
atk-s0507a0:348_3: Taṃ tassā kesasobhaṃ disvā taruṇajano yebhuyyena tassaṃ paṭibaddhacitto ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:348_4: Athassā taṃ kesasobhaṃ asahamānā issāpakatā katipayā itthiyo mantetvā tassā eva paricārikadāsiṃ āmisena
atk-s0507a0:348_5: upalāpetvā tāya tassā kesūpapātanaṃ bhesajjaṃ dāpesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:348_6: Sā kira dāsī taṃ bhesajjaṃ nhāniyacuṇṇena saddhiṃ payojetvā gaṅgāya nadiyā nhānakāle tassā adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:348_7: Sā tena kesamūlesu temetvā udake nimujji,
atk-s0507a0:348_10: Atha sā sabbaso vilūnakesā luñcitamatthakā kapotī viya virūpā hutvā lajjāya antonagaraṃ pavisituṃ asakkontī
atk-s0507a0:348_11: vatthena sīsaṃ veṭhetvā bahinagare aññatarasmiṃ padese vāsaṃ kappentī katipāhaccayena apagatalajjā tato
atk-s0507a0:348_12: nivattetvā tilāni pīḷetvā telavaṇijjaṃ surāvaṇijjañca karontī jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0507a0:348_13: Sā ekadivasaṃ dvīsu tīsu manussesu surāmattesu mahāniddaṃ okkamantesu sithilabhūtāni tesaṃ nivatthavatthāni avahari.
atk-s0507a0:349_0: Athekadivasaṃ sā ekaṃ khīṇāsavattheraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannacittā attano gharaṃ netvā paññatte
atk-s0507a0:349_2: So tassā anukampāya taṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñji.
atk-s0507a0:349_3: Sā pasannamānasā upari chattaṃ dhārayamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:349_4: So ca thero tassā cittaṃ pahaṃsento anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0507a0:349_5: Sā ca itthī anumodanakāleyeva “mayhaṃ kesā dīghā tanū siniddhā mudū vellitaggā hontū”ti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0507a0:350_0: Sā aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā missakakammassa phalena samuddamajjhe kanakavimāne ekikā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:350_3: Sā tasmiṃ kanakavimāne punappunaṃ uppajjitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ naggāva hutvā vītināmesi.
atk-s0507a0:350_4: Atha amhākaṃ bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena sāvatthiyaṃ viharante sāvatthivāsino
atk-s0507a0:350_5: sattasatā vāṇijā suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ uddissa nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ otariṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:350_6: Tehi āruḷhā nāvā visamavātavegukkhittā ito cito ca paribbhamantī taṃ padesaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:350_7: Atha sā vimānapetī saha vimānena tesaṃ attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:354_1: Tattha kā nu antovimānasmiṃ tiṭṭhantīti vimānassa anto abbhantare tiṭṭhantī kā nu tvaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:354_7: taṃ mayaṃ bahi ṭhitaṃ passāma daṭṭhukāmamhā,
atk-s0507a0:355_0: Athassa sā attano bahi nikkhamisuṃ asakkuṇeyyataṃ pakāsentī –
atk-s0507a0:358_0: Kesehamhi paṭicchannā, puññaṃ me appakaṃ kata”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:359_1: Tattha aṭṭīyāmīti naggā hutvā bahi nikkhamituṃ aṭṭikā dukkhitā amhi.
atk-s0507a0:359_3: Kesehamhi paṭicchannāti kesehi amhi ahaṃ paṭicchāditā pārutasarīrā.
atk-s0507a0:359_4: Puññaṃ me appakaṃ katanti appakaṃ parittaṃ mayā kusalakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0507a0:363_0: Idaṃ dussaṃ nivāsetvā, ehi nikkhama sobhane;
atk-s0507a0:365_4: Idaṃ dussaṃ nivāsayāti idaṃ mama uttarisāṭakaṃ tvaṃ nivāsehi.
atk-s0507a0:366_0: Evañca pana vatvā attano uttarisāṭakaṃ tassā upanesi,
atk-s0507a0:368_0: “Hatthena hatthe te dinnaṃ, na mayhaṃ upakappati;
atk-s0507a0:373_3: tava hatthena mama hatthe tayā dinnaṃ na mayhaṃ upakappati na viniyujjati,
atk-s0507a0:373_5: Esetthupāsako saddhoti eso ratanattayaṃ uddissa saraṇagamanena upāsako kammaphalasaddhāya ca samannāgatattā saddho ettha etasmiṃ janasamūhe atthi.
atk-s0507a0:373_7: mama dakkhiṇamādisāti etaṃ upāsakaṃ mama diyyamānaṃ sāṭakaṃ paridahāpetvā taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ mayhaṃ ādisa pattidānaṃ dehi.
atk-s0507a0:373_8: Tathāhaṃ sukhitā hessanti tathā kate ahaṃ sukhitā dibbavatthanivatthā sukhappattā bhavissāmīti.
atk-s0507a0:374_0: Taṃ sutvā vāṇijā taṃ upāsakaṃ nhāpetvā vilimpetvā vatthayugena acchādesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:383_0: Hasantī vimānā nikkhami, dakkhiṇāya idaṃ phala”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:385_5: Vatthehacchādayitvānāti vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ sabyañjanaṃ bhojanaṃ bhojetvā nivāsanaṃ uttarīyanti dvīhi vatthehi acchādesuṃ,
atk-s0507a0:385_7: Tassā dakkhiṇamādisunti tassā petiyā taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ ādisiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:386_4: Vipāko udapajjathāti tassā petiyā vipāko dakkhiṇāya phalaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0507a0:386_6: Nānappakāraṃ dibbabhojanasadisaṃ bhojanañca nānāvirāgavaṇṇasamujjalaṃ dibbavatthasadisaṃ vatthañca anekavidhaṃ
atk-s0507a0:386_7: pānakañca dakkhiṇāya idaṃ īdisaṃ phalaṃ udapajjathāti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:387_5: Hasantīti “passatha tāva tumhākaṃ dakkhiṇāya idaṃ phalavisesa”nti pakāsanavasena hasamānā vimānato nikkhami.
atk-s0507a0:388_0: Atha te vāṇijā evaṃ paccakkhato puññaphalaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā tasmiṃ upāsake sañjātagāravabahumānā katañjalī taṃ payirupāsiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:388_1: Sopi te dhammakathāya bhiyyosomattāya pasādetvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:392_1: Tattha sucittarūpanti hatthiassaitthipurisādivasena ceva mālākammalatākammādivasena ca suṭṭhu vihitacittarūpaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:392_4: kiṃ dānamayassa udāhu sīlamayassa idaṃ phalanti attho.
atk-s0507a0:393_0: Sā tehi evaṃ puṭṭhā “mayā katassa parittakassa kusalakammassa tāva idaṃ phalaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:393_1: akusalakammassa pana āyatiṃ niraye edisaṃ bhavissatī”ti tadubhayaṃ ācikkhantī –
atk-s0507a0:411_0: Phalañca pāpakammassa, tasmā socāmahaṃ bhusa”nti. – gāthāyo abhāsi;
atk-s0507a0:412_1: Tattha bhikkhuno caramānassāti aññatarassa bhinnakilesassa bhikkhuno bhikkhāya carantassa.
atk-s0507a0:412_4: Vippasannena cetasāti kammaphalasaddhāya suṭṭhu pasannena cittena.
atk-s0507a0:413_4: Tañca dāni parittakanti tañca puññaphalaṃ vipakkavipākattā kammassa idāni parittakaṃ appāvasesaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:413_7: kālaṃkiriyā bhavissatī”ti catūhi māsehi uddhaṃ catunnaṃ māsānaṃ upari pañcame māse mama kālaṃkiriyā bhavissatīti dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:413_10: Nirayanti natthi ettha ayo sukhanti katvā “niraya”nti laddhanāmaṃ narakaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:414_1: “Niraya”nti cettha avīcimahānirayassa adhippetattā taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “catukkaṇṇa”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:414_3: Catudvāranti catūsu disāsu catūhi dvārehi yuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:416_1: Tejasā yutāti samantato samuṭṭhitajālena mahatā agginā nirantaraṃ samāyutajālā.
atk-s0507a0:416_2: Samantā yojanasatanti evaṃ pana samantā bahi sabbadisāsu yojanasataṃ yojanānaṃ sataṃ.
atk-s0507a0:416_7: Phalañca pāpakammassāti idaṃ īdisaṃ dukkhānubhavanaṃ mahā evaṃ katassa pāpassa kammassa phalanti attho.
atk-s0507a0:417_0: Evaṃ tāya attanā katakammaphale āyatiṃ nerayikabhaye ca pakāsite so upāsako karuṇāsañcoditamānaso “handassāhaṃ patiṭṭhā bhaveyya”nti cintetvā āha – “devate,
atk-s0507a0:417_1: tvaṃ mayhaṃ ekassa dānavasena sabbakāmasamiddhā uṭṭhārasampattiyuttā jātā,
atk-s0507a0:417_2: idāni pana imesaṃ upāsakānaṃ dānaṃ datvā satthu ca guṇe anussaritvā nirayūpapattito muccissasī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:417_3: Sā petī haṭṭhatuṭṭhā “sādhū”ti vatvā te dibbena annapānena santappetvā dibbāni vatthāni nānāvidhāni ratanāni ca adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:417_4: bhagavantañca uddissa dibbaṃ dussayugaṃ tesaṃ hatthe datvā “aññatarā, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:417_5: vimānapetī bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatīti sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ mama vacanena vandathā”ti vandanañca pesesi,
atk-s0507a0:417_6: tañca nāvaṃ attano iddhānubhāvena tehi icchitapaṭṭanaṃ taṃ divasameva upanesi.
atk-s0507a0:418_0: Atha te vāṇijā tato paṭṭanato anukkamena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā satthu taṃ dussayugaṃ datvā
atk-s0507a0:418_1: vandanañca nivedetvā ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:418_2: Satthā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:418_4: Te pana upāsakā dutiyadivase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tassā dakkhiṇamādisiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:418_5: Sā ca tato petalokato cavitvā vividharatanavijjotite tāvatiṃsabhavane kanakavimāne accharāsahassaparivārā nibbattīti.
atk-s0507a0:421_0: Puratova setena paleti hatthināti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante dve brāhmaṇapete ārambha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:421_1: Āyasmā kira saṃkicco sattavassiko khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhito tiṃsamattehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0507a0:421_2: saddhiṃ araññāyatane vasanto tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañcannaṃ corasatānaṃ hatthato āgataṃ maraṇampi bāhitvā
atk-s0507a0:421_3: te ca core dametvā pabbājetvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:421_6: Athāyasmā saṃkicco paripuṇṇavasso laddhūpasampado tehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ bārāṇasiṃ gantvā isipatane vihāsi.
atk-s0507a0:421_7: Manussā therassa santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānasā vīthipaṭipāṭiyā vaggavaggā hutvā āgantukadānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:421_8: Tattha aññataro upāsako manusse niccabhatte samādapesi,
atk-s0507a0:422_0: Tena ca samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ aññatarassa micchādiṭṭhikassa brāhmaṇassa dve puttā ekā ca dhītā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:422_1: Tesu jeṭṭhaputto tassa upāsakassa mitto ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:422_2: So taṃ gahetvā āyasmato saṃkiccassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:422_13: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā dutiyadivase pātova vihāraṃ gantvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ānetvā bhojesi.
atk-s0507a0:423_0: Evaṃ gacchante kāle bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā dhammañca suṇitvā tassa kaniṭṭhabhātā ca bhaginī ca sāsane abhippasannā puññakammaratā ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:423_1: Evaṃ te tayo janā yathāvibhavaṃ dānāni dentā samaṇabrāhmaṇe sakkariṃsu garuṃ kariṃsu mānesuṃ pūjesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:423_2: Mātāpitaro pana nesaṃ assaddhā appasannā samaṇabrāhmaṇesu agāravā puññakiriyāya anādarā acchandikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:423_3: Tesaṃ dhītaraṃ dārikaṃ mātulaputtassatthāya ñātakā vāresuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:423_4: So ca āyasmato saṃkiccassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā niccaṃ attano mātu-
atk-s0507a0:423_8: Tena so ukkaṇṭhito hutvā upajjhāyaṃ upasaṅgamitvā āha –
atk-s0507a0:423_14: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā māse atikkante tatheva ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:423_16: Aḍḍhamāse atikkante tatheva vutte puna “sattāhaṃ āgamehī”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:423_18: Atha tasmiṃ antosattāhe sāmaṇerassa mātulāniyā gehaṃ vinaṭṭhacchadanaṃ jiṇṇaṃ dubbalakuṭṭaṃ vātavassābhihataṃ paripati.
atk-s0507a0:423_19: Tattha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇī dve puttā ghītā ca gehena ajjhotthaṭā kālamakaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:423_20: Tesu brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇī ca petayoniyaṃ nibbattiṃsu,
atk-s0507a0:423_25: Brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca mahante mahante ayomuggare gahetvā aññamaññaṃ ākoṭenti,
atk-s0507a0:423_26: abhihataṭṭhānesu mahantā mahantā ghaṭappamāṇā gaṇḍā uṭṭhahitvā muhutteneva pacitvā paribhedappattā honti.
atk-s0507a0:423_27: Te aññamaññassa gaṇḍe phāletvā kodhābhibhūtā nikkaruṇā pharusavacanehi tajjentā pubbalohitaṃ pivanti,
atk-s0507a0:424_0: Atha sāmaṇero ukkaṇṭhābhibhūto upajjhāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0507a0:424_4: Atha naṃ upajjhāyo “atthaṅgate sūriye kālapakkhacātuddasiyā pavattamānāya ehī”ti vatvā isipatanavihārassa piṭṭhipassena thokaṃ gantvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:424_5: Tena ca samayena te dve devaputtā saddhiṃ bhaginiyā teneva maggena yakkhasamāgamaṃ sambhāvetuṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0507a0:424_6: tesaṃ pana mātāpitaro muggarahatthā pharusavācā kāḷarūpā ākulākulalūkhapatitakesabhārā aggidaḍḍhatālakkhandhasadisā
atk-s0507a0:424_7: vigalitapubbalohitā valitagattā ativiya jegucchabībhacchadassanā te anubandhanti.
atk-s0507a0:425_0: Athāyasmā saṃkicco yathā so sāmaṇero te sabbe gacchante passati,
atk-s0507a0:427_0: “Puratova setena paleti hatthinā, majjhe pana assatarīrathena;
atk-s0507a0:428_0: Pacchā ca kaññā sivikāya nīyati, obhāsayantī dasa sabbaso disā.
atk-s0507a0:431_0: Manussabhūtā kimakattha pāpaṃ, yenaññamaññassa pivātha lohita”nti.
atk-s0507a0:432_3: Majjhe panāti hatthiṃ āruḷhassa sivikaṃ āruḷhāya ca antare.
atk-s0507a0:432_6: Obhāsayantī dasa sabbaso disāti sabbato samantato sabbā dasa disā attano sarīrappabhāhi vatthābharaṇādippabhāhi ca vijjotayamānā.
atk-s0507a0:432_7: Muggarahatthapāṇinoti muggarā hatthasaṅkhātesu pāṇīsu yesaṃ te muggarahatthapāṇino,
atk-s0507a0:432_8: bhūmisaṇhakaraṇīyādīsu pāṇivohārassa labbhamānattā hatthasaddena pāṇi eva visesito.
atk-s0507a0:433_0: Evaṃ sāmaṇerena puṭṭhā te petā sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0507a0:436_0: “Puratova yo gacchati kuñjarena, setena nāgena catukkamena;
atk-s0507a0:437_0: Amhāka putto ahu jeṭṭhako so, dānāni datvāna sukhī pamodati.
atk-s0507a0:439_0: “Yo yo majjhe assatarīrathena, catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena;
atk-s0507a0:440_0: Amhāka putto ahu majjhimo so, amaccharī dānapatī virocati.
atk-s0507a0:442_0: “Yā sā ca pacchā sivikāya nīyati, nārī sapaññā migamandalocanā;
atk-s0507a0:443_0: Amhāka dhītā ahu sā kaniṭṭhikā, bhāgaḍḍhabhāgena sukhī pamodati.
atk-s0507a0:445_0: “Ete ca dānāni adaṃsu pubbe, pasannacittā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:446_0: Mayaṃ pana maccharīno ahumha, paribhāsakā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:447_0: Ete ca datvā paricārayanti, mayañca sussāma naḷova chinno”ti.
atk-s0507a0:448_1: Tattha puratova yo gacchatīti imesaṃ gacchantānaṃ yo purato gacchati.
atk-s0507a0:448_3: tassa yo eso purato gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:448_5: kuñjesu vā ramati caratīti “kuñjaro”ti laddhanāmena hatthinā. Nāgenāti,
atk-s0507a0:450_2: Paricārayantīti dibbesu kāmaguṇesu attano indriyāni ito cito ca yathāsukhaṃ cārenti,
atk-s0507a0:450_3: parijanehi vā attano puññānubhāvanissandena paricariyaṃ kārenti.
atk-s0507a0:450_4: Mayañca sussāma naḷova chinnoti mayaṃ pana chinno ātape khitto naḷo viya sussāma,
atk-s0507a0:450_5: khuppipāsāhi aññamaññaṃ daṇḍābhighātehi ca sukkhā visukkhā bhavāmāti.
atk-s0507a0:451_0: Evaṃ attano pāpaṃ sampavedetvā “mayaṃ tuyhaṃ mātulamātulāniyo”ti ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:451_1: Taṃ sutvā sāmaṇero sañjātasaṃvego “evarūpānaṃ kibbisakārīnaṃ kathaṃ nu kho bhojanāni sijjhantī”ti pucchanto –
atk-s0507a0:453_0: “Kiṃ tumhākaṃ bhojanaṃ kiṃ sayānaṃ, kathañca yāpetha supāpadhammino;
atk-s0507a0:454_0: Pahūtabhogesu anappakesu, sukhaṃ virādhāya dukkhajja pattā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:455_1: Tattha kiṃ tumhākaṃ bhojananti kīdisaṃ tumhākaṃ bhojanaṃ?
atk-s0507a0:455_12: Sukhaṃ virādhāyāti sukhahetuno puññassa akaraṇena sukhaṃ virajjhitvā virādhetvā.
atk-s0507a0:455_14: Dukkhajja pattāti ajja idāni idaṃ petayonipariyāpannaṃ dukkhaṃ anuppattāti.
atk-s0507a0:456_0: Evaṃ sāmaṇerena puṭṭhā petā tena pucchitamatthaṃ vissajjentā –
atk-s0507a0:459_0: Bahuṃ vitvā na dhātā homa, nacchādimhase mayaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:461_0: “Icceva maccā paridevayanti, adāyakā pecca yamassa ṭhāyino;
atk-s0507a0:462_0: Ye te vidicca adhigamma bhoge, na bhuñjare nāpi karonti puññaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:464_0: “Te khuppipāsūpagatā parattha, pacchā ciraṃ jhāyare ḍayhamānā;
atk-s0507a0:465_0: Kammāni katvāna dukhudrāni, anubhonti dukkhaṃ kaṭukapphalāni.
atk-s0507a0:468_0: Ittaraṃ ittarato ñatvā, dīpaṃ kayirātha paṇḍito.
atk-s0507a0:470_0: “Ye te evaṃ pajānanti, narā dhammassa kovidā;
atk-s0507a0:471_0: Te dāne nappamajjanti, sutvā arahataṃ vaco”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:473_1: Tattha na dhātā homāti dhātā suhitā tittā na homa.
atk-s0507a0:473_4: na taṃ mayaṃ attano ruciyā pivissāmāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:473_6: Maccā paridevayantīti mayaṃ viya aññepi manussā katakibbisā paridevanti kandanti.
atk-s0507a0:473_8: Yamassa ṭhāyinoti yamalokasaññite yamassa ṭhāne pettivisaye ṭhānasīlā.
atk-s0507a0:473_9: Ye te vidicca adhigammabhogeti ye te sampati āyatiñca sukhavisesavidhāyake bhoge vinditvā paṭilabhitvā.
atk-s0507a0:473_10: Na bhuñjare nāpi karonti puññanti amhe viya sayampi na bhuñjanti,
atk-s0507a0:473_11: paresaṃ dentā dānamayaṃ puññampi na karonti.
atk-s0507a0:474_1: Te khuppipāsūpagatā paratthāti te sattā parattha paraloke pettivisaye jighacchāpipāsābhibhūtā hutvā.
atk-s0507a0:474_2: Ciraṃ jhāyare ḍayhamānāti khudādihetukena dukkhagginā “akataṃ vata amhehi kusalaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:474_3: kataṃ pāpa”ntiādinā vattamānena vippaṭisāragginā pariḍayhamānā jhāyanti,
atk-s0507a0:474_6: Anubhonti dukkhaṃ kaṭukapphalānīti aniṭṭhaphalāni pāpakammāni katvā cirakālaṃ dukkhaṃ āpāyikadukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
atk-s0507a0:475_3: Ittaraṃ idha jīvitanti idha manussaloke sattānaṃ jīvitampi ittaraṃ parittaṃ appakaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:475_7: Ittaraṃ ittarato ñatvāti dhanadhaññādiupakaraṇaṃ manussānaṃ jīvitañca ittaraṃ parittaṃ khaṇikaṃ na cirassanti paññāya upaparikkhitvā.
atk-s0507a0:475_8: Dīpaṃ kayirātha paṇḍitoti sapañño puriso dīpaṃ attano patiṭṭhaṃ paraloke hitasukhādhiṭṭhānaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0507a0:475_9: Ye te evaṃ pajānantīti ye te manussā manussānaṃ bhogānaṃ jīvitassa ca ittarabhāvaṃ yāthāvato jānanti,
atk-s0507a0:475_11: Sutvā arahataṃ vacoti arahataṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0507a0:476_0: Evaṃ te petā sāmaṇerena puṭṭhā tamatthaṃ ācikkhitvā “mayaṃ tuyhaṃ mātulamātulāniyo”ti pavedesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:476_1: Taṃ sutvā sāmaṇero sañjātasaṃvego ukkaṇṭhaṃ paṭivinodetvā upajjhāyassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā evamāha – “yaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:476_7: Athāyasmā saṃkicco tassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0507a0:476_8: So kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0507a0:476_9: Āyasmā pana saṃkicco taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:476_10: Satthā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:479_0: Uragova tacaṃ jiṇṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:479_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññatarassa upāsakassa putto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0507a0:479_2: So puttamaraṇahetu paridevasokasamāpanno bahi nikkhamitvā kiñci kammaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto geheyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:479_3: Atha satthā paccūsavelāyaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento taṃ upāsakaṃ
atk-s0507a0:479_4: disvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tassa gehaṃ gantvā dvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:479_5: Upāsako ca satthu āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā sīghaṃ uṭṭhāya gantvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gehaṃ pavesetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:479_12: Athassa bhagavā sokavinodanaṃ karonto uragajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:480_0: Atīte kira kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ dhammapālaṃ nāma brāhmaṇakulaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:480_1: Tattha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇī putto dhītā suṇisā dāsīti ime sabbepi maraṇānussatibhāvanābhiratā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:480_4: Athekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇo puttena saddhiṃ gharato nikkhamitvā khettaṃ gantvā kasati.
atk-s0507a0:480_6: Tattheko kaṇhasappo ḍāhabhayena rukkhasusirato nikkhamitvā imaṃ brāhmaṇassa puttaṃ ḍaṃsi.
atk-s0507a0:480_7: So visavegena mucchito tattheva paripatitvā kālakato,
atk-s0507a0:480_9: Brāhmaṇo puttaṃ mataṃ disvā kammantasamīpena gacchantaṃ ekaṃ purisaṃ evamāha – “samma,
atk-s0507a0:480_10: mama gharaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇiṃ evaṃ vadehi ‘nhāyitvā suddhavatthanivatthā ekassa bhattaṃ mālāgandhādīni ca gahetvā turitaṃ āgacchatū’ti”.
atk-s0507a0:480_13: Brāhmaṇo nhatvā bhuñjitvā vilimpitvā parijanaparivuto puttassa sarīraṃ citakaṃ āropetvā aggiṃ datvā dārukkhandhaṃ
atk-s0507a0:480_14: ḍahanto viya nissoko nissantāpo aniccasaññaṃ manasi karonto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:481_0: Atha brāhmaṇassa putto sakko hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0507a0:481_2: So attano purimajātiṃ katapuññañca paccavekkhitvā pitaraṃ ñātake ca anukampamāno brāhmaṇavesena tattha āgantvā ñātake asocante disvā “ambho,
atk-s0507a0:481_9: ure jāto oraso mahāguṇavanto taruṇaputto”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:481_10: “Kimatthaṃ tumhe tathārūpe guṇavati taruṇaputte mate na socathā”ti?
atk-s0507a0:483_0: “Uragova tacaṃ jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tanuṃ;
atk-s0507a0:484_0: Evaṃ sarīre nibbhoge, pete kālakate sati.
atk-s0507a0:487_0: Tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:489_3: Tacaṃ jiṇṇanti jajjarabhāvena jiṇṇaṃ purāṇaṃ attano tacaṃ nimmokaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:489_4: Hitvā gacchati saṃ tanunti yathā urago attano jiṇṇatacaṃ rukkhantare vā kaṭṭhantare vā mūlantare vā pāsāṇantare
atk-s0507a0:489_5: vā kañcukaṃ omuñcanto viya sarīrato omuñcitvā pahāya chaḍḍetvā yathākāmaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0507a0:489_6: evameva saṃsāre paribbhamanto satto porāṇassa kammassa parikkhīṇattā jajjarībhūtaṃ saṃ tanuṃ attano sarīraṃ hitvā gacchati,
atk-s0507a0:489_9: Evanti ḍayhamānaṃ puttassa sarīraṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0507a0:489_10: Sarīre nibbhogeti assa viya aññesampi kāye evaṃ bhogavirahite niratthake jāte.
atk-s0507a0:489_13: Tasmāti yasmā ḍayhamāno kāyo apetaviññāṇattā ḍāhadukkhaṃ viya ñātīnaṃ ruditaṃ paridevitampi na jānāti,
atk-s0507a0:489_14: tasmā etaṃ mama puttaṃ nimittaṃ katvā na rodāmi.
atk-s0507a0:489_15: Gato so tassa yā gatīti yadi matasattā na ucchijjanti,
atk-s0507a0:489_16: matassa pana katokāsassa kammassa vasena yā gati pāṭikaṅkhā,
atk-s0507a0:489_18: so na purimañātīnaṃ ruditaṃ paridevitaṃ vā paccāsīsati,
atk-s0507a0:489_19: nāpi yebhuyyena purimañātīnaṃ ruditena kāci atthasiddhīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:490_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇena attano asocanakāraṇe kathite pariyāyamanasikārakosalle pakāsite brāhmaṇarūpo sakko brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “amma,
atk-s0507a0:490_2: “Dasa māse kucchinā pariharitvā thaññaṃ pāyetvā hatthapāde saṇṭhapetvā saṃvaḍḍhito putto me, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:490_3: “Yadi evaṃ pitā tāva purisabhāvena mā rodatu,
atk-s0507a0:493_0: Yathāgato tathā gato, tattha kā paridevanā.
atk-s0507a0:496_0: Tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:497_16: Tattha kā paridevanāti evaṃ avasavattike saṃsārapavatte maraṇaṃ paṭicca kā nāma paridevanā,
atk-s0507a0:498_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇiyā vacanaṃ sutvā tassa bhaginiṃ pucchi – “amma,
atk-s0507a0:500_0: “Sace rode kissa assaṃ, tattha me kiṃ phalaṃ siyā;
atk-s0507a0:504_0: Tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:505_1: Tattha sace rode kisā assanti yadi ahaṃ rodeyyaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:505_3: Tattha me kiṃ phalaṃ siyāti tasmiṃ mayhaṃ bhātu maraṇanimitte rodane kiṃ nāma phalaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:505_6: nāpi so tena sugatiṃ gaccheyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:505_8: bhiyyo no aratī siyāti amhākaṃ ñātīnaṃ mittānaṃ suhadayānañca mama socanena bhātumaraṇadukkhato bhiyyopi arati dukkhameva siyāti.
atk-s0507a0:506_0: Evaṃ bhaginiyā vacanaṃ sutvā tassa bhariyaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0507a0:512_0: Tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī”ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0507a0:513_6: ākāsena gacchantassa candassa gahetukāmatāsadisaṃ alabbhaneyyavatthusmiṃ icchābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:514_0: Evaṃ tassa bhariyāya vacanaṃ sutvā dāsiṃ pucchi – “amma,
atk-s0507a0:514_1: tuyhaṃ so kiṃ hotī”ti? “Ayyo me, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:514_2: “Yadi evaṃ tena tvaṃ pothetvā veyyāvaccaṃ kāritā bhavissasi,
atk-s0507a0:514_6: ativiya khantimettānuddayāsampanno yuttavādī mayhaṃ ayyaputto ure saṃvaḍḍhaputto viya ahosī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:520_0: Tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:521_2: bhinno appaṭisandhiyoti brāhmaṇa seyyathāpi udakaghaṭo muggarappahārādinā bhinno appaṭisandhiyo puna pākatiko na hoti.
atk-s0507a0:522_0: Sakko tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso “sammadeva tumhehi maraṇassati bhāvitā,
atk-s0507a0:522_1: ito paṭṭhāya na tumhehi kasiādikaraṇakiccaṃ atthī”ti tesaṃ gehaṃ sattaratanabharitaṃ katvā “appamattā dānaṃ detha,
atk-s0507a0:522_3: uposathakammaṃ karothā”ti ovaditvā attānañca tesaṃ nivedetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0507a0:522_4: Tepi brāhmaṇādayo dānādīni puññāni karontā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devaloke uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:523_0: Satthā imaṃ jātakaṃ āharitvā tassa upāsakassa sokasallaṃ samuddharitvā upari saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0507a0:530_0: Naggā dubbaṇṇarūpāsīti idaṃ satthari veḷuvane viharante magadharaṭṭhe iṭṭhakavatīnāmake gāme aññataraṃ petiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:530_1: Magadharaṭṭhe kira iṭṭhakavatī ca dīgharāji cāti dve gāmakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0507a0:530_3: Atīte ca kāle pañcannaṃ vassasatānaṃ matthake aññatarā itthī tattheva iṭṭhakavatiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ saṃsāramocakakule
atk-s0507a0:530_4: nibbattitvā micchādiṭṭhivasena bahū kīṭapaṭaṅge jīvitā voropetvā petesu nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:531_0: Sā pañca vassasatāni khuppipāsādidukkhaṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakke
atk-s0507a0:531_1: anukkamena rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante punapi iṭṭhakavatiyaṃyeva aññatarasmiṃ saṃsāramocakakuleyeva
atk-s0507a0:531_2: nibbattitvā yadā sattaṭṭhavassuddesikakāle aññāhi dārikāhi saddhiṃ rathikāya kīḷanasamatthā ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:531_3: tadā āyasmā sāriputtatthero tameva gāmaṃ upanissāya aruṇavatīvihāre viharanto ekadivasaṃ dvādasahi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0507a0:531_4: saddhiṃ tassa gāmassa dvārasamīpena maggena atikkamati.
atk-s0507a0:531_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bahū gāmadārikā gāmato nikkhamitvā dvārasamīpe kīḷantiyo pasannamānasā mātāpitūnaṃ paṭipattidassanena
atk-s0507a0:531_6: vegenāgantvā theraṃ aññe ca bhikkhū pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:531_7: Sā panesā assaddhakulassa dhītā cirakālaṃ aparicitakusalatāya sādhujanācāravirahitā anādarā alakkhikā viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:531_8: Thero tassā pubbacaritaṃ idāni ca saṃsāramocakakule nibbattanaṃ āyatiñca niraye nibbattanārahataṃ disvā “sacāyaṃ maṃ vandissati,
atk-s0507a0:531_10: petesu nibbattitvāpi mamaṃyeva nissāya sampattiṃ paṭilabhissatī”ti ñatvā karuṇāsañcoditamānaso tā dārikāyo āha –
atk-s0507a0:531_12: ayaṃ pana dārikā alakkhikā viya ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:531_13: Atha naṃ tā dārikā hatthesu pariggahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā balakkārena therassa pāde vandāpesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:532_0: Sā aparena samayena vayappattā dīgharājiyaṃ saṃsāramocakakule aññatarassa kumārassa dinnā paripuṇṇagabbhā
atk-s0507a0:532_1: hutvā kālakatā petesu uppajjitvā naggā dubbaṇṇarūpā khuppipāsābhibhūtā ativiya bībhacchadassanā vicarantī
atk-s0507a0:532_2: rattiyaṃ āyasmato sāriputtattherassa attānaṃ dassetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:535_0: Upphāsulike kisike, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:536_4: Pubbepi “kisā”ti vatvā puna “kisike”ti vacanaṃ aṭṭhicammanhārumattasarīratāya ativiya kisabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
