atk-s0507a0:539_0: Pāpakammaṃ karitvāna, petalokaṃ ito gatā”ti. – gāthaṃ vatvā puna therena –
atk-s0507a0:541_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:543_0: Katakammaṃ puṭṭhā “adānasīlā maccharinī hutvā petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā evaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavāmī”ti dassentī tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0507a0:545_0: “Anukampakā mayhaṃ nāhesuṃ bhante, pitā ca mātā athavāpi ñātakā;
atk-s0507a0:546_0: Ye maṃ niyojeyyuṃ dadāhi dānaṃ, pasannacittā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:548_0: “Ito ahaṃ vassasatāni pañca, yaṃ evarūpā vicarāmi naggā;
atk-s0507a0:549_0: Khudāya taṇhāya ca khajjamānā, pāpassa kammassa phalaṃ mamedaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:551_0: “Vandāmi taṃ ayya pasannacittā, anukampa maṃ vīra mahānubhāva;
atk-s0507a0:552_0: Datvā ca me ādisa yañhi kiñci, mocehi maṃ duggatiyā bhadante”ti.
atk-s0507a0:553_3: Ye maṃ niyojeyyunti mātā vā pitā vā atha vā ñātakā edisā pasannacittā hutvā “samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dadāhi dāna”nti ye maṃ niyojeyyuṃ,
atk-s0507a0:554_2: yaṃ evarūpā vicarāmi naggāti idaṃ sā petī ito tatiyāya jātiyā attano petattabhāvaṃ anussaritvā idānipi
atk-s0507a0:554_5: dānādīnaṃ puññānaṃ akatattā evarūpā naggā petī hutvā ito paṭṭhāya vassasatāni pañca vicarāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:555_3: ettakameva puññaṃ idāni mayā kātuṃ sakkāti dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:555_4: Anukampa manti anuggaṇha mamaṃ uddissa anuddayaṃ karohi.
atk-s0507a0:555_5: Datvā ca me ādisa yañhi kiñcīti kiñcideva deyyadhammaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ datvā taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ mayhaṃ ādisa,
atk-s0507a0:555_6: tena me ito petayonito mokkho bhavissatīti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0507a0:556_0: Evaṃ petiyā vutte yathā so thero paṭipajji, taṃ dassetuṃ saṅgītikārehi tisso gāthā vuttā –
atk-s0507a0:568_0: Athāyasmā sāriputto taṃ petiṃ pīṇindriyaṃ parisuddhachavivaṇṇaṃ dibbavatthābharaṇālaṅkāraṃ samantato
atk-s0507a0:568_1: attano pabhāya obhāsentiṃ attano santikaṃ upagantvā ṭhitaṃ disvā paccakkhato kammaphalaṃ tāya vibhāvetukāmo
atk-s0507a0:571_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā.
atk-s0507a0:573_0: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0507a0:574_0: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0507a0:576_0: “Pucchāmi taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:577_0: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvā, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:578_4: Obhāsentī disā sabbāti sabbāpi dasa disā jotentī ekālokaṃ karontī.
atk-s0507a0:578_7: osadhānaṃ vā anubalappadāyikāti katvā “osadhī”ti laddhanāmā tārakā yathā samantato ālokaṃ kurumānā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0507a0:579_8: Kena te idha mijjhatīti kena puññavisesena idha imasmiṃ ṭhāne idāni tayā labbhamānaṃ sucaritaphalaṃ ijjhati nipphajjati.
atk-s0507a0:579_11: Ye kecīti bhoge anavasesato byāpetvā saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0507a0:579_12: Anavasesabyāpako hi ayaṃ niddeso yathā “ye keci saṅkhārā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:580_7: Idaṃ yebhuyyena sattā manussattabhāve ṭhitā puññāni karontīti katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:580_9: vitthārato pana paramatthadīpaniyaṃ vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0507a0:581_0: Evaṃ puna therena puṭṭhā petī tassā sampattiyā laddhakāraṇaṃ pakāsentī sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0507a0:584_0: Muni kāruṇiko loke, taṃ maṃ addakkhi duggataṃ.
atk-s0507a0:599_0: Sāhaṃ taṃ paridahāmi, yaṃ yañhi manaso piyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:610_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ ālopaṃ datvātiādi therena attano karuṇāya katākāradassanaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:610_8: anekarasabyañjananti aññehipi kāmetabbakāmehi samannāgatā anekarasabyañjanaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:611_1: Coḷassāti deyyadhammasīsena tabbisayaṃ dānamayaṃ puññameva dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:611_2: Vipākaṃ passa yādisanti tassa coḷadānassa vipākasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ passa, bhante.
atk-s0507a0:612_1: Atīte kira dasavassasahassāyukesu manussesu bārāṇasivāsī eko kuṭumbiko araññe jaṅghāvihāraṃ vicaranto araññaṭṭhāne aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ addasa.
atk-s0507a0:612_2: So paccekabuddho tattha cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṃharitvāva ṭhapetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0507a0:612_4: kiṃ karothā”ti vatvā tena appicchatāya kiñci avuttepi “cīvaradussaṃ nappahotī”ti ñatvā attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ paccekabuddhassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:612_5: Paccekabuddho taṃ gahetvā anuvātaṃ āropento cīvaraṃ katvā pārupi.
atk-s0507a0:612_6: So kuṭumbikā jīvitapariyosāne kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0507a0:612_7: anubhavitvā tato cavitvā bārāṇasito yojanamatte ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ gāme amaccakule nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:613_0: Tassa vayappattakāle tasmiṃ gāme nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:613_10: natthi no ito sukhumatarassa vatthassa paṭilābhāya puñña”nti.
atk-s0507a0:613_12: ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagare rajjapaṭilābhaṃ icchāmī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:613_14: ammā”ti mātaraṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā āha –
atk-s0507a0:613_18: idha vā ettha vā gehe nisīdissatī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:613_19: So pana puññaniyāmena codiyamāno gāmato nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipajji.
atk-s0507a0:613_20: So ca bārāṇasirañño kālakatassa sattamo divaso hoti.
atk-s0507a0:614_0: Amaccā ca purohito ca rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu –
atk-s0507a0:614_5: Te kumudavaṇṇe cattāro sindhave yojetvā setacchattappamukhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ rathasmiṃyeva
atk-s0507a0:614_6: ṭhapetvā rathaṃ vissajjetvā pacchato tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:614_11: Ratho kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0507a0:614_12: purohito pārupanakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento “tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo,
atk-s0507a0:614_13: dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu ekarajjaṃ kāretuṃ yutto”ti vatvā “tūriyāni paggaṇhatha,
atk-s0507a0:615_0: Atha kumāro mukhaṃ vivaritvā oloketvā “kena kammena āgatattha,
atk-s0507a0:615_11: Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ katvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā uyyānaṃ ānetvā kumārassa abhisekaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:616_7: “Na maññe puññavā tumhākaṃ rājā suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ āharatha,
atk-s0507a0:616_10: So uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthena udakaṃ ādāya puratthimadisāyaṃ abbhukkiri.
atk-s0507a0:616_11: Tadā ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā aṭṭha kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:616_12: Puna udakaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāyāti evaṃ catūsu disāsu abbhukkiri.
atk-s0507a0:616_13: Sabbadisāsu aṭṭha aṭṭha katvā dvattiṃsa kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:616_14: Ekekāya disāya soḷasa soḷasa katvā catusaṭṭhi kammarukkhāti keci vadanti.
atk-s0507a0:616_15: So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā “nandarañño vijite suttakantikā itthiyo mā suttaṃ kantiṃsūti
atk-s0507a0:616_16: bheriṃ carāpethā”ti vatvā chattaṃ ussāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatto hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0507a0:617_0: Evaṃ gacchante kāle ekadivasaṃ devī rañño sampattiṃ disvā “aho tapassī”ti kāruññākāraṃ dassesi. “Kimidaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:617_1: devī”ti ca puṭṭhā “atimahatī te, deva, sampatti.
atk-s0507a0:617_3: idāni anāgatassa atthāya kusalaṃ na karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:617_11: idhāgantvā amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā uttaradisābhimukhā urena nipajji.
atk-s0507a0:617_12: Nipannamattāya eva deviyā himavante vasantānaṃ padumavatiyā puttānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhako mahāpadumapaccekabuddho bhātike āmantesi –
atk-s0507a0:617_15: Te adhivāsetvā tāvadeva ākāsenāgantvā uttaradvāre otariṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:617_18: Rājā saddhiṃ deviyā āgantvā vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā tattha tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne rājā saṅghattherassa,
atk-s0507a0:617_22: amhākaṃ idha nivāsāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne nivāsaṭṭhānāni kāretvā yāvajīvaṃ paccekabuddhe
atk-s0507a0:617_23: upaṭṭhahitvā tesu parinibbutesu sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā gandhadāruādīhi sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo gahetvā
atk-s0507a0:617_24: cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “evarūpānampi nāma mahānubhāvānaṃ mahesīnaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0507a0:617_25: kimaṅgaṃ pana mādisāna”nti saṃvegajāto jeṭṭhaputtaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā sayaṃ tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0507a0:617_26: Devīpi “raññe pabbajite ahaṃ kiṃ karissāmī”ti pabbaji.
atk-s0507a0:617_27: Dvepi uyyāne vasantā jhānāni nibbattetvā jhānasukhena vītināmetvā āyupariyosāne brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:617_28: So kira nandarājā amhākaṃ satthu mahāsāvako mahākassapatthero ahosī,
atk-s0507a0:618_0: Ayaṃ pana nandarājā dasa vassasahassāni sayaṃ dibbavatthāni paridahanto sabbameva attano vijitaṃ uttarakurusadisaṃ
atk-s0507a0:618_2: Tayidaṃ dibbavatthasamiddhiṃ sandhāya sā petī āha “yāvatā nandarājassa,
atk-s0507a0:619_1: Idāni sā petī “nandarājasamiddhitopi etarahi mayhaṃ samiddhi vipulatarā”ti dassentī “tato bahutarā, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:619_3: Tattha tatoti nandarājassa pariggahabhūtavatthatopi bahutarāni mayhaṃ vatthacchādanānīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:620_1: Vipulāti āyāmato ca vitthārato ca vipulā.
atk-s0507a0:620_4: Yaṃ yañhi manaso piyanti yaṃ yaṃ mayhaṃ manaso piyaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:620_5: taṃ taṃ gahetvā paridahāmi pārupāmi cāti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:621_2: vipākaṃ passa yādisanti thālakapūraṇamattaṃ pānīyaṃ dinnaṃ anumoditaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:621_3: tassa pana vipākaṃ yādisaṃ yāva mahantaṃ passāti dassentī “gambhīrā caturassā cā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:623_8: imissā dibbasampattiyā paṭilābhassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ tvaṃ vandituṃ āgatā upagatāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:624_0: Evaṃ tāya petiyā vutte āyasmā sāriputto iṭṭhakavatiyaṃ dīgharājiyanti gāmadvayavāsikesu attano santikaṃ
atk-s0507a0:624_1: upagatesu manussesu imamatthaṃ vitthārato kathento saṃvejetvā saṃsāramocanapāpakammato mocetvā upāsakabhāve
atk-s0507a0:624_5: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:627_0: Naggā dubbaṇṇarūpāsīti idaṃ satthari veḷuvane viharante āyasmato sāriputtattherassa ito pañcamāya jātiyā mātubhūtaṃ petiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:627_1: Ekadivasaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca kappino rājagahassa avidūre aññatarasmiṃ araññāyatane viharanti.
atk-s0507a0:627_2: Tena ca samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ aññataro brāhmaṇo aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ
atk-s0507a0:627_4: Dento ca āgatāgatānaṃ yathākālaṃ yathārahañca pādodakapādabbhañjanādidānānupubbakaṃ sabbābhideyyaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
atk-s0507a0:627_7: yathāpaññattaṃ imaṃ dānavidhiṃ aparihāpentī sakkaccaṃ anupatiṭṭhāhī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:627_8: Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā tasmiṃ pakkante eva tāva bhikkhūnaṃ paññattaṃ dānavidhiṃ pacchindi,
atk-s0507a0:627_9: addhikānaṃ pana nivāsatthāya upagatānaṃ gehapiṭṭhito chaḍḍitaṃ jarasālaṃ dassesi “ettha vasathā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:627_10: Annapānādīnaṃ atthāya tattha addhikesu āgatesu “gūthaṃ khādatha,
atk-s0507a0:627_13: tumhākaṃ mātu matthaluṅgaṃ khādathā”ti yaṃ yaṃ asuci jegucchaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:627_14: tassa tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā niṭṭhuraṃ vadati.
atk-s0507a0:628_0: Sā aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā kammānubhāvukkhittā petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā attano vacīduccaritānurūpaṃ
atk-s0507a0:628_1: dukkhaṃ anubhavantī purimajātisambandhaṃ anussaritvā āyasmato sāriputtassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamitukāmā
atk-s0507a0:628_4: Sā kira ito pañcamāya jātiyā therassa mātubhūtapubbā,
atk-s0507a0:628_6: “ahaṃ ayyassa sāriputtattherassa ito pañcamāya jātīyā mātā,
atk-s0507a0:628_8: Taṃ sutvā devatā tassā pavesanaṃ anujāniṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:628_9: Sā pavisitvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhatvā therassa attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:628_10: Thero taṃ disvā karuṇāya sañcoditamānaso hutvā –
atk-s0507a0:631_0: Upphāsulike kisike, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:632_0: Gāthāya pucchi. Sā therena puṭṭhā paṭivacanaṃ dentī –
atk-s0507a0:634_0: “Ahaṃ te sakiyā mātā, pubbe aññāsu jātīsu;
atk-s0507a0:646_0: “Dehi puttaka me dānaṃ, datvā anvādisāhi me;
atk-s0507a0:647_0: Appeva nāma mucceyyaṃ, pubbalohitabhojanā”ti. – pañcagāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0507a0:648_1: Tattha ahaṃ te sakiyā mātāti ahaṃ tuyhaṃ jananibhāvato sakiyā mātā.
atk-s0507a0:648_2: Pubbe aññāsu jātīsūti mātā hontīpi na imissaṃ jātiyaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:648_6: Khuppipāsasamappitāti khudāya ca pipāsāya ca abhibhūtā,
atk-s0507a0:649_7: Vasañca ḍayhamānānanti citakasmiṃ ḍayhamānānaṃ kaḷevarānaṃ vasātelañca.
atk-s0507a0:649_17: Tathā “vaṇikāna”nti iminā tesampi lohitaṃ saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:649_19: Itthipurisanissitanti itthipurisasarīranissitaṃ yathāvuttaṃ aññañca cammamaṃsanhārupubbādikaṃ paribhuñjāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:650_5: Atha vā nīlāti chārikaṅgārabahulā susānabhūmi adhippetā,
atk-s0507a0:650_7: Anvādisāhi meti yathā dinnaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ mayhaṃ upakappati,
atk-s0507a0:650_10: pubbalohitabhojanāti tava uddisanena etasmā pubbalohitabhojanā petajīvikā api nāma mucceyyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:651_0: Taṃ sutvā āyasmā sāriputtatthero dutiyadivase mahāmoggallānattherādike tayo there āmantetvā tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0507a0:651_1: rājagahe piṇḍāya caranto rañño bimbisārassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:651_4: Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:651_6: bhante”ti vatvā there vissajjetvā sabbakammikaṃ amaccaṃ pakkosāpetvā āṇāpesi “nagarassa avidūre vivitte
atk-s0507a0:651_8: Antepure ca pahonakavisesavasena tidhā vibhajitvā catasso kuṭiyo paṭicchāpesi,
atk-s0507a0:651_10: Niṭṭhitāsu kuṭikāsu sabbaṃ balikaraṇaṃ sajjāpetvā annapānavatthādīni buddhappamukhassa cātuddisassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0507a0:651_11: anucchavike sabbaparikkhāre ca upaṭṭhāpetvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa taṃ sabbaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0507a0:651_12: Atha thero taṃ petiṃ uddissa taṃ sabbaṃ buddhappamukhassa cātuddisassa bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:651_13: Sā petī taṃ anumoditvā devaloke nibbattitvā sabbakāmasamiddhā ca hutvā aparadivase āyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa
atk-s0507a0:651_16: sā attano petūpapattiṃ puna devūpapattiñca vitthārato kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:660_0: Bhojanaṃ pānīyaṃ vatthaṃ, dakkhiṇāya idaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:664_1: Tattha saṅghe cātuddise adāti cātuddisassa saṅghassa adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:668_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā.
atk-s0507a0:670_0: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, tena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0507a0:671_0: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0507a0:673_0: “Pucchāmi taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:675_0: Vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti. – pucchi;
atk-s0507a0:676_3: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:676_4: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:679_0: Naggā dubbaṇṇarūpāsīti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante mattaṃ nāma petiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:679_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññataro kuṭumbiko saddho pasanno ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:679_2: Tassa bhariyā assaddhā appasannā kodhanā vañjhā ca ahosi nāmena mattā nāma.
atk-s0507a0:679_3: Atha so kuṭumbiko kulavaṃsūpacchedanabhayena sadisakulato tissaṃ nāma aññaṃ kaññaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0507a0:679_4: Sā ahosi saddhā pasannā sāmino ca piyā manāpā,
atk-s0507a0:679_5: sā nacirasseva gabbhinī hutvā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0507a0:679_7: Sā gehassāminī hutvā cattāro bhikkhū sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi,
atk-s0507a0:680_0: Tā ubhopi ekasmiṃ divase sīsaṃ nhatvā allakesā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0507a0:680_1: kuṭumbiko guṇavasena tissāya ābaddhasineho manuññena hadayena tāya saddhiṃ bahuṃ sallapanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:680_2: Taṃ asahamānā mattā issāpakatā gehe sammajjitvā ṭhapitaṃ saṅkāraṃ tissāya matthake okiri.
atk-s0507a0:680_3: Sā aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā attano kammabalena pañcavidhaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0507a0:680_4: Taṃ pana dukkhaṃ pāḷito eva viññāyati.
atk-s0507a0:680_5: Athekadivasaṃ sā petī sañjhāya vītivattāya gehassa piṭṭhipasse nhāyantiyā tissāya attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:683_0: Upphāsulike kisike, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:686_0: “Ahaṃ mattā tuvaṃ tissā, sapattī te pure ahuṃ;
atk-s0507a0:688_1: Tattha ahaṃ mattā tuvaṃ tissāti ahaṃ mattā nāma,
atk-s0507a0:690_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:694_0: “Caṇḍī ca pharusā cāsiṃ, issukī maccharī saṭhā;
atk-s0507a0:695_0: Tāhaṃ duruttaṃ vatvāna, petalokaṃ ito gatā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:696_6: Ito parampi tāsaṃ vacanapaṭivacanavaseneva gāthā pavattā –
atk-s0507a0:698_0: “Sabbaṃ ahampi jānāmi, yathā tvaṃ caṇḍikā ahu;
atk-s0507a0:699_0: Aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kenāsi paṃsukunthitā.
atk-s0507a0:705_0: Tato me issā vipulā, kodho me samajāyatha.
atk-s0507a0:711_0: Aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kena khajjasi kacchuyā.
atk-s0507a0:719_0: “Sabbaṃ ahampi jānāmi, seyyaṃ me tvaṃ samokiri;
atk-s0507a0:720_0: Aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kenāsi naggiyā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:723_0: Tvañca āmantitā āsi, sasāminī no ca khohaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:728_0: “Sabbaṃ ahampi jānāmi, dussaṃ me tvaṃ apānudi;
atk-s0507a0:729_0: Aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kenāsi gūthagandhinī.
atk-s0507a0:732_0: Gūthakūpe atāresiṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0507a0:735_0: “Sabbaṃ ahampi jānāmi, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ tayā;
atk-s0507a0:736_0: Aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kenāsi duggatā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:738_0: “Ubhinnaṃ samakaṃ āsi, yaṃ gehe vijjate dhanaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:743_0: Na hi pāpehi kammehi, sulabhā hoti suggati.
atk-s0507a0:745_0: “Vāmato maṃ tvaṃ paccesi, athopi maṃ usūyasi;
atk-s0507a0:746_0: Passa pāpānaṃ kammānaṃ, vipāko hoti yādiso.
atk-s0507a0:749_0: Te aññe paricārenti, na bhogā honti sassatā.
atk-s0507a0:752_0: Appeva te dade kiñci, mā su tāva ito agā.
atk-s0507a0:757_0: “Handa kiṃ vā tyāhaṃ dammi, kiṃ vā teca karomahaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:774_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā.
atk-s0507a0:776_0: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0507a0:777_0: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0507a0:779_0: “Pucchāmi taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsī puññaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:780_0: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvā, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatīti.
atk-s0507a0:782_0: “Ahaṃ mattā tuvaṃ tissā, sapattī te pure ahuṃ;
atk-s0507a0:786_0: Ciraṃ jīvāhi bhagini, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
atk-s0507a0:790_0: Vineyya maccheramalaṃ samūlaṃ, aninditā saggamupehi ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0507a0:791_2: yathā tvaṃ caṇḍikā ahūti “caṇḍī ca pharusā cāsi”nti yaṃ tayā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:791_4: yathā tvaṃ caṇḍikā kodhanā pharusavacanā issukī maccharī saṭhā ca ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:791_5: Aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmīti aññaṃ puna taṃ idāni pucchāmi.
atk-s0507a0:791_6: Kenāsi paṃsukunthitāti kena kammena saṅkārapaṃsūti oguṇṭhitā sabbaso okiṇṇasarīrā ahūti attho.
atk-s0507a0:792_8: Sāmikena samantayīti sāmikena saddhiṃ allopasallāpavasena kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:793_7: Tvañca bhesajjamāharīti tvaṃ vejjehi vuttaṃ attano upakārāvahaṃ bhesajjaṃ āhari.
atk-s0507a0:793_8: Ahañca kapikacchunoti ahaṃ pana kapikacchuphalāni duphassaphalāni āhariṃ.
atk-s0507a0:793_11: Seyyaṃ tyāhaṃ samokirinti tava seyyaṃ ahaṃ kapikacchuphalapattehi samantato avakiriṃ.
atk-s0507a0:794_8: No ca khohanti no ca kho ahaṃ āmantitā āsinti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:796_1: Yaṃ gehe vijjate dhananti yaṃ gehe dhanaṃ upalabbhati,
atk-s0507a0:796_2: taṃ tuyhaṃ mayhañcāti amhākaṃ ubhinna samakaṃ tulyameva āsi.
atk-s0507a0:797_1: Evaṃ sā petī tissāya pucchitamatthaṃ katthetvā puna pubbe tassā vacanaṃ akatvā attanā kataṃ aparādhaṃ pakāsentī “tadeva maṃ tva”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:797_14: pāpehi pana kammehi sugati sulabhā na hoti,
atk-s0507a0:797_15: atha kho duggati eva sulabhā”ti yathā maṃ tvaṃ pubbe avaca ovadi,
atk-s0507a0:798_1: Taṃ sutvā tissā “vāmato maṃ tvaṃ paccesī”tiādinā tisso gāthā āha.
atk-s0507a0:798_2: Tattha vāmato maṃ tvaṃ paccesīti vilomato maṃ tvaṃ adhigacchasi,
atk-s0507a0:798_3: tuyhaṃ hitesimpi vipaccanīkakāriniṃ katvā maṃ gaṇhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:798_7: vipāko hoti yādisoti pāpakānaṃ nāma kammānaṃ vipāko yādiso yathā ghorataro,
atk-s0507a0:799_1: Te aññe paricārentīti te ghare dāsiyo ābharaṇāni ca imāni tayā pubbe pariggahitāni idāni aññe paricārenti paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0507a0:799_3: Na bhogā honti sassatāti bhogā nāmete na sassatā anavaṭṭhitā tāvakālikā mahāyagamanīyā,
atk-s0507a0:799_4: tasmā tadatthaṃ issāmacchariyādīni na kattabbānīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:800_1: Idāni bhūtassa pitāti idāneva bhūtassa mayhaṃ puttassa pitā kuṭumbiko.
atk-s0507a0:800_2: Āpaṇāti āpaṇato imaṃ gehaṃ ehiti āgamissati.
atk-s0507a0:800_3: Appeva te dade kiñcīti gehaṃ āgato kuṭumbiko tuyhaṃ dātabbayuttakaṃ kiñci deyyadhammaṃ api nāma dadeyya.
atk-s0507a0:800_4: Mā su tāva ito agāti ito gehassa pacchā vatthuto mā tāva agamāsīti taṃ anukampamānā āha.
atk-s0507a0:801_1: Taṃ sutvā petī attano ajjhāsayaṃ pakāsentī “naggā dubbaṇṇarūpāmhī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0507a0:801_2: Tattha kopīnametaṃ itthīnanti etaṃ naggadubbaṇṇatādikaṃ paṭicchādetabbatāya itthīnaṃ kopīnaṃ rundhanīyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:801_3: Mā maṃ bhūtapitāddasāti tasmā bhūtassa pitā kuṭumbiko maṃ mā addakkhīti lajjamānā vadati.
atk-s0507a0:802_1: Taṃ sutvā tissā sañjātanuddayā “handa kiṃ vā tyāhaṃ dammī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0507a0:802_3: Kiṃ vā tyāhaṃ dammīti kiṃ te ahaṃ dammi,
atk-s0507a0:802_6: Kiṃ vā tedha karomahanti kiṃ vā aññaṃ te idha imasmiṃ kāle upakāraṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0507a0:803_1: Taṃ sutvā petī “cattāro bhikkhū saṅghato”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0507a0:803_3: cattāro pana puggaleti bhikkhusaṅghato saṅghavasena cattāro bhikkhū,
atk-s0507a0:803_4: puggalavasena cattāro bhikkhūti evaṃ aṭṭha bhikkhū yathāruciṃ bhojetvā taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ mama ādisa,
atk-s0507a0:803_6: Tadāhaṃ sukhitā hessanti yadā tvaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ mama uddisissasi,
atk-s0507a0:803_7: tadā ahaṃ sukhitā sukhappattā sabbakāmasamiddhinī bhavissāmīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:804_1: Taṃ sutvā tissā tamatthaṃ attano sāmikassa ārocetvā dutiyadivase aṭṭha bhikkhū bhojetvā tassā dakkhiṇamādisi,
atk-s0507a0:804_2: sā tāvadeva paṭiladdhadibbasampattikā puna tissāya santikaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0507a0:804_3: Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ saṅgītikārehi “sādhūti sā paṭissutvā”tiādikā tisso gāthā ṭhapitā.
atk-s0507a0:805_1: Upasaṅkamitvā ṭhitaṃ pana naṃ tissā “abhikkantena vaṇṇenā”tiādīhi tīhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi.
atk-s0507a0:805_2: Itarā “ahaṃ mattā”ti gāthāya attānaṃ ācikkhitvā “ciraṃ jīvāhī”ti gāthāya tassā anumodanaṃ datvā “idha dhammaṃ caritvānā”ti gāthāya ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:805_8: Vasavattinanti dibbena ādhipateyyena attano vasaṃ vattentānaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:805_12: saggamupehi ṭhānanti rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggattā “sagga”nti laddhanāmaṃ dibbaṭṭhānaṃ upehi,
atk-s0507a0:806_0: Atha tissā taṃ pavattiṃ kuṭumbikassa ārocesi,
atk-s0507a0:806_3: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:806_4: taṃ sutvā mahājano paṭiladdhasaṃvego vineyya maccherādimalaṃ dānasīlādirato sugatiparāyaṇo ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:809_0: Kāḷī dubbaṇṇarūpāsīti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante nandaṃ nāma petiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:809_1: Sāvatthiyā kira avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmake nandiseno nāma upāsako ahosi saddho pasanno.
atk-s0507a0:809_2: Bhariyā panassa nandā nāma assaddhā appasannā maccharinī caṇḍī pharusavacanā sāmike agāravā aggatissā sassuṃ corivādena akkosati paribhāsati.
atk-s0507a0:809_3: Sā aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tasseva gāmassa avidūre vicarantī ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0507a0:809_4: nandisenassa upāsakassa gāmato nikkhamantassa avidūre attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:812_0: Piṅgalāsi kaḷārāsi, na taṃ maññāmi mānusi”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:813_10: Na taṃ maññāmi mānusinti ahaṃ taṃ mānusinti na maññāmi,
atk-s0507a0:815_0: “Ahaṃ nandā nandisena, bhariyā te pure ahuṃ;
atk-s0507a0:817_1: Tattha ahaṃ nandā nandisenāti sāmi nandisena ahaṃ nandā nāma.
atk-s0507a0:817_2: Bhariyā te pure ahunti purimajātiyaṃ tuyhaṃ bhariyā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:819_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:823_0: “Caṇḍī ca pharusā cāsiṃ, tayi cāpi agāravā;
atk-s0507a0:824_0: Tāhaṃ duruttaṃ vatvāna, petalokaṃ ito gatā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:828_0: Imaṃ dussaṃ nivāsetvā, ehi nessāmi taṃ gharaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:831_0: Putte ca te passissasi, suṇisāyo ca dakkhasī”ti. – athassa sā –
atk-s0507a0:833_0: “Hatthena hatthe te dinnaṃ, na mayhaṃ upakappati;
atk-s0507a0:842_0: Chattaṃ gandhañca mālañca, vividhā ca upāhanā.
atk-s0507a0:852_0: Catasso gāthā saṅgītikārehi vuttā. Tato paraṃ –
atk-s0507a0:855_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā.
atk-s0507a0:857_0: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0507a0:858_0: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0507a0:860_0: “Pucchāmi taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:861_0: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvā, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0507a0:863_0: “Ahaṃ nandā nandisena, bhariyā te pure ahuṃ;
atk-s0507a0:867_0: Ciraṃ jīva gahapati, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
atk-s0507a0:871_0: Vineyya maccheramalaṃ samūlaṃ, anindito saggamupehi ṭhāna”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:873_1: Tattha dānaṃ vipulamākirīti ukkhiṇeyyakhette deyyadhammabījaṃ vippakiranto viya mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0507a0:874_0: Evaṃ sā attano dibbasampattiṃ tassā ca kāraṇaṃ nandisenassa vibhāvetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā.
atk-s0507a0:874_3: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:877_0: Alaṅkato maṭṭhakuṇḍalīti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante maṭṭhakuṇḍalidevaputtaṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:878_0: Ettha ca maṭṭhakuṇḍalīdevaputtassa vimānadevatābhāvato tassa vatthu yadipi vimānavatthupāḷiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropitaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:878_1: yasmā pana so devaputto adinnapubbakabrāhmaṇassa puttasokena susānaṃ gantvā āḷāhanaṃ anupariyāyitvā rodantassa
atk-s0507a0:878_2: sokaharaṇatthaṃ attano devarūpaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā haricandanussado bāhā paggayha kandanto dukkhābhibhūtākārena
atk-s0507a0:878_4: Manussattabhāvato apetattā petapariyāyopi labbhati evāti tassa vatthu petavatthupāḷiyampi saṅgahaṃ āropitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:881_0: Uṭṭhehi kaṇha kiṃ sesīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ mataputtaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:881_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññatarassa upāsakassa putto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0507a0:881_7: maṃ ohāya kahaṃ paṭhamataraṃ gatosī”tiādīni vadanto vippalapati.
atk-s0507a0:881_8: Satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento tassa sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ disvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0507a0:881_9: sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco bhikkhū uyyojetvā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena tassa gharadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:881_11: Athassa gehajano gehadvāre āsanaṃ paññāpetvā satthāraṃ nisīdāpetvā upāsakaṃ pariggahetvā satthu santikaṃ upanesi.
atk-s0507a0:881_15: porāṇakapaṇḍitā paṇḍitānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā mataputtaṃ nānusociṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0507a0:882_1: vāsudevo baladevo candadevā sūriyadevo aggidevo varuṇadevo ajjuno pajjuno ghaṭapaṇḍito aṅkuro cāti.
atk-s0507a0:882_3: Tena rājā sokapareto sabbakiccāni pahāya mañcassa aṭaniṃ pariggahetvā vippalapanto nipajji.
atk-s0507a0:882_5: “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño koci mama bhātu sokaṃ pariharituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0507a0:882_8: sasaṃ me dethā”ti ākāsaṃ olokento sakalanagaraṃ vicari.
atk-s0507a0:883_0: Tasmiṃ kāle rohiṇeyyo nāma amacco vāsudevarañño santikaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpento –
atk-s0507a0:885_0: “Uṭṭhehi kaṇha kiṃ sesi, ko attho supanena te;
atk-s0507a0:886_0: Yo ca tuyhaṃ sako bhātā, hadayaṃ cakkhu ca dakkhiṇaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:887_0: Tassa vātā balīyanti, sasaṃ jappati kesavā”ti. – imaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0507a0:888_2: Ko attho supanena teti supanena tuyhaṃ kā nāma vaḍḍhi.
atk-s0507a0:888_4: Hadayaṃ cakkhu ca dakkhiṇanti hadayena ceva dakkhiṇacakkhunā ca sadisoti attho.
atk-s0507a0:888_5: Tassa vātā balīyantīti tassa aparāparaṃ uppajjamānā ummādavātā balavanto honti vaḍḍhanti abhibhavanti.
atk-s0507a0:888_7: Kesavāti so kira kesānaṃ sobhanānaṃ atthitāya “kesavo”ti voharīyati.
atk-s0507a0:889_0: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sayanato uṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dīpento satthā abhisambuddho hutvā –
atk-s0507a0:892_0: Taramānarūpo vuṭṭhāsi, bhātu sokena aṭṭito”ti. – imaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0507a0:893_0: Rājā uṭṭhāya sīghaṃ pāsādā otaritvā ghaṭapaṇḍitassa santikaṃ gantvā ubhosu hatthesu naṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto –
atk-s0507a0:904_4: Saso sasoti lapasīti saso sasoti vilapasi.
atk-s0507a0:904_13: kīdisaṃ sasamicchasīti ghaṭapaṇḍitaṃ “sasena atthiko”ti adhippāyena sasena nimantesi.
atk-s0507a0:907_0: Candato sasamicchāmi, taṃ me ohara kesavā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:908_2: Taṃ sutvā rājā “nissaṃsayaṃ me bhātā ummattako jāto”ti domanassappatto –
atk-s0507a0:912_3: mayhaṃ piyañāti yaṃ atimadhuraṃ attano jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:913_0: Ghaṭapaṇḍito rañño vacanaṃ sutvā niccalova ṭhatvā “bhātika,
atk-s0507a0:913_1: tvaṃ candato sasaṃ patthentassa taṃ alabhitvā jīvitakkhayo bhavissatīti jānanto kasmā mataṃ puttaṃ alabhitvā anusocasī”ti imamatthaṃ dīpento –
atk-s0507a0:916_0: Kasmā pure mataṃ puttaṃ, ajjāpi manusocasī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:917_1: Tattha evaṃ ce, kaṇha, jānāsīti, bhātika,
atk-s0507a0:917_3: “alabbhaneyyavatthu nāma na patthetabba”nti yadi evaṃ jānāsi.
atk-s0507a0:917_4: Yathaññanti evaṃ jānantova yathā aññaṃ anusāsasi,
atk-s0507a0:917_6: Kasmā pure mataṃ puttanti atha kasmā ito catumāsamatthake mataṃ puttaṃ ajjāpi anusocasīti.
atk-s0507a0:918_0: Evaṃ so antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitakova “ahaṃ tāva evaṃ paññāyamānaṃ patthemi,
atk-s0507a0:918_1: tvaṃ pana apaññāyamānassatthāya socasī”ti vatvā tassa dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0507a0:920_0: “Na yaṃ labbhā manussena, amanussena vā pana;
atk-s0507a0:921_0: Jāto me mā mari putto, kuto labbhā alabbhiyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:924_0: Sakkā ānayituṃ kaṇha, yaṃ petamanusocasī”ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0507a0:925_2: yaṃ “evaṃ jāto me putto mā marī”ti manussena vā devena vā pana na labbhā na sakkā laddhuṃ,
atk-s0507a0:926_7: taṃ etehi mantappayogādīhipi ānetuṃ na sakkāti.
atk-s0507a0:927_1: idaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma dhanena vā jātiyā vā vijjāya vā sīlena vā bhāvanāya vā na sakkā paṭibāhitu”nti dassento –
atk-s0507a0:933_0: Ete caññe ca jātiyā, tepi no ajarāmarā.
atk-s0507a0:936_0: Ete caññe ca vijjāya, tepi no ajarāmarā.
atk-s0507a0:944_1: Tattha mahaddhanāti nidhānagatasseva mahato dhanassa atthitāya bahudhanā.
atk-s0507a0:944_4: Pahūtadhanadhaññāseti tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ vā saṃvaccharānaṃ atthāya nidahitvā ṭhapetabbassa niccaparibbayabhūtassa
atk-s0507a0:944_6: Tepi no ajarāmarāti tepi evaṃ mahāvibhavā mandhātumahāsudassanādayo khattiyā ajarāmarā nāhesuṃ,
atk-s0507a0:945_3: Jātiyāti attano jātinimittaṃ ajarāmarā nāhesunti attho.
atk-s0507a0:946_3: Atha vā parivattentīti vedaṃ anuparivattentā homaṃ karontā japanti.
atk-s0507a0:947_6: Tena evaṃ tapanissitakā hutvā sarīrena ca vimokkhaṃ pattukāmāpi saṃvarakā sarīraṃ vijahanti evāti dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:947_7: Atha vā isayoti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ esanaṭṭhena isayo,
atk-s0507a0:948_0: Evaṃ ghaṭapaṇḍitena dhamme kathite taṃ sutvā rājā apagatasokasallo pasannamānaso ghaṭapaṇḍitaṃ pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0507a0:951_0: Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
atk-s0507a0:957_0: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna bhātika.
atk-s0507a0:963_0: Subhāsitena anventi, ghaṭo jeṭṭhaṃva bhātara”nti. – sesagāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0507a0:964_1: Tattha ghaṭo jeṭṭhaṃva bhātaranti yathā ghaṭapaṇḍito attano jeṭṭhabhātaraṃ mataputtasokābhibhūtaṃ attano
atk-s0507a0:964_2: upāyakosallena ceva dhammakathāya ca tato puttasokato vinivattayi,
atk-s0507a0:964_3: evaṃ aññepi sappaññā ye honti anukampakā,
atk-s0507a0:965_3: yathā yena kāraṇena puttasokaparetaṃ rājānaṃ vāsudevaṃ ghaṭapaṇḍito sokaharaṇatthāya subhāsitena anvesi anuesi,
atk-s0507a0:965_4: yassa aññassāpi etādisā paṇḍitā amaccā paṭiladdhā assu,
atk-s0507a0:965_5: tassa kuto sokoti! Sesagāthā heṭṭhā vuttatthā evāti.
atk-s0507a0:966_1: porāṇakapaṇḍitā paṇḍitānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā puttasokaṃ hariṃsū”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0507a0:969_0: Naggo dubbaṇṇarūposīti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante dhanapālapetaṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:969_1: Anuppanne kira buddhe paṇṇaraṭṭhe erakacchanagare dhanapālako nāma seṭṭhi ahosi assaddho appasanno kadariyo natthikadiṭṭhiko.
atk-s0507a0:969_3: So kālaṃ katvā marukantāre peto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:969_9: So pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni bhattasitthaṃ vā udakabinduṃ vā alabhanto visukkhakaṇṭhoṭṭhajivho jighacchāpipāsābhibhūto ito cito ca paribbhamati.
atk-s0507a0:970_0: Atha amhākaṃ bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anukkamena sāvatthiyaṃ viharante sāvatthivāsino
atk-s0507a0:970_1: vāṇijā pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni bhaṇḍassa pūretvā uttarāpathaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā paṭiladdhabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0507a0:970_2: sakaṭesu āropetvā paṭinivattamānā sāyanhasamaye aññataraṃ sukkhanadiṃ pāpuṇitvā tattha yānaṃ muñcitvā
atk-s0507a0:970_4: Atha so peto pipāsābhibhūto pānīyassatthāya āgantvā tattha bindumattampi pānīyaṃ alabhitvā vigatāso chinnamūlo viya tālo chinnapādo pati.
atk-s0507a0:973_0: Upphāsuliko kisiko, ko nu tvamasi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:980_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:982_0: Katakammaṃ pucchito pubbe nibbattaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya atītaṃ paccuppannaṃ anāgatañca attano pavattiṃ dassento tesañca ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0507a0:985_0: Tattha seṭṭhi pure āsiṃ, dhanapāloti maṃ vidū.
atk-s0507a0:988_0: Pahūtaṃ me jātarūpaṃ, muttā veḷuriyā bahū.
atk-s0507a0:990_0: “Tāva mahaddhanassāpi, na me dātuṃ piyaṃ ahu;
atk-s0507a0:991_0: Pidahitvā dvāraṃ bhuñjiṃ, mā maṃ yācanakāddasuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:998_0: Papāyo ca vināsesiṃ, dugge saṅkamanāni ca.
atk-s0507a0:1004_0: Nābhijānāmi bhuttaṃ vā, pītaṃ vā pana pāniyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1006_0: “Yo saṃyamo so vināso, yo vināso so saṃyamo;
atk-s0507a0:1007_0: Petā hi kira jānanti, yo saṃyamo so vināso.
atk-s0507a0:1023_0: Phalaṃ pāpassa kammassa, tasmā socāmahaṃ bhusaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1025_0: “Taṃ vā vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;
atk-s0507a0:1026_0: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
atk-s0507a0:1028_0: “Sace taṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissatha karotha vā;
atk-s0507a0:1029_0: Na vo dukkhā pamutyatthi, uppaccāpi palāyataṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1032_0: Sāmaññā hotha brahmaññā, evaṃ saggaṃ gamissathā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1034_6: Tayidaṃ nāmaṃ tadā mayhaṃ atthānugatamevāti dassento “asītī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0507a0:1034_9: Tesaṃ sakaṭavāhānaṃ asīti hiraññassa tathā kahāpaṇassa ca me ahosīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:1034_10: Pahūtaṃ me jātarūpanti suvaṇṇampi pahūtaṃ anekabhāraparimāṇaṃ ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0507a0:1035_1: Na me dātuṃ piyaṃ ahūti dānaṃ dātuṃ mayhaṃ piyaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0507a0:1035_2: Mā maṃ yācanakāddasunti “yācakā mā maṃ passiṃsū”ti pidahitvā gehadvāraṃ bhuñjāmi.
atk-s0507a0:1035_4: Paribhāsakoti dānaṃ dente disvā bhayena santajjako.
atk-s0507a0:1035_8: Dadantānaṃ vā karontānaṃ vā samudāyabhūtaṃ bahuṃ janaṃ puññakammato vārayissaṃ nivāresiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1036_1: Vipāko natthi dānassātiādi dānādīnaṃ nivāraṇe kāraṇadassanaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1036_2: Tattha vipāko natthi dānassāti dānakammassa phalaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0507a0:1036_3: kevalaṃ puññaṃ puññanti dhanavināso evāti dīpeti.
atk-s0507a0:1036_5: Kuto phalanti kuto nāma phalaṃ labbhati,
atk-s0507a0:1036_13: Yato kālaṅkato ahanti yadā kālakatā ahaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1036_15: Nābhijānāmīti ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhuttaṃ vā pītaṃ vā kiñci na jānāmi.
atk-s0507a0:1037_1: Yo saṃyamo so vināsoti lobhādivasena yaṃ saṃyamanaṃ kassaci adānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1037_2: so imesaṃ sattānaṃ vināso nāma petayoniyaṃ nibbattapetānaṃ mahābyasanassa hetubhāvato.
atk-s0507a0:1037_3: “Yo vināso so saṃyamo”ti iminā yathāvuttassa atthassa ekantikabhāvaṃ vadati.
atk-s0507a0:1037_4: Petā hi kira jānantīti ettha hi-
atk-s0507a0:1037_7: “Saṃyamo deyyadhammassa apariccāgo vināsahetū”ti imamatthaṃ petā eva kira jānanti paccakkhato anubhuyyamānattā,
atk-s0507a0:1037_9: Nayidaṃ yuttaṃ manussānampi petānaṃ viya khuppipāsādīhi abhibhuyyamānānaṃ dissamānattā.
atk-s0507a0:1037_10: Petā pana purimattabhāve katakammassa pākaṭabhāvato tamatthaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ jānanti. Tenāha –
atk-s0507a0:1037_12: Tattha saṃyamissanti sayampi dānādipuññakiriyato saṃyamanaṃ saṅkocaṃ akāsiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1038_3: Bhaddaṃ voti bhaddaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sundaraṃ tumhākaṃ hotūti vacanaseso.
atk-s0507a0:1038_4: Yāvantettha samāgatāti yāvanto yāvatakā ettha samāgatā,
atk-s0507a0:1038_5: te sabbe mama vacanaṃ suṇāthāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:1038_9: yadi vā raho abhijjhādivasena pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ akusalakammaṃ mākattha mā karittha.
atk-s0507a0:1039_1: Sace taṃ pāpakaṃ kammanti atha pana taṃ pāpakammaṃ āyatiṃ karissatha,
atk-s0507a0:1039_3: nirayādīsu catūsu apāyesu manussesu ca appāyukatādivasena tassa phalabhūtā dukkhato pamutti pamokkho nāma natthi.
atk-s0507a0:1039_4: Uppaccāpi palāyatanti uppatitvā ākāsena gacchantānampi mokkho natthiyevāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1039_6: ito vā etto vā palāyante tumhe anubandhissatīti adhippāyena upecca sañcicca palāyantānampi tumhākaṃ tato mokkho natthi,
atk-s0507a0:1040_0: “Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
atk-s0507a0:1041_0: Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1043_7: Evaṃ saggaṃ gamissathāti iminā mayā vuttanayena puññāni katvā devalokaṃ upapajjissathāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1044_0: Te vāṇijā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā saṃvegajātā taṃ anukampamānā bhājanehi pānīyaṃ gahetvā taṃ sayāpetvā mukhe āsiñciṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:1044_1: Tato mahājanena bahuvelaṃ āsittaṃ udakaṃ tassa petassa pāpabalena adhogaḷaṃ na otiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1044_4: “api te kāci assāsamattā laddhā”ti. So āha –
atk-s0507a0:1044_5: “yadi me ettakehi janehi ettakaṃ velaṃ āsiñcamānaṃ udakaṃ ekabindumattampi paragaḷaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1044_7: Atha te vāṇijā taṃ sutvā ativiya saṃvegajātā “atthi pana koci upāyo pipāsāvūpasamāyā”ti āhaṃsu. So āha –
atk-s0507a0:1044_8: “imasmiṃ pāpakamme khīṇe tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakānaṃ vā dāne dinne mama dānamuddisissati,
atk-s0507a0:1044_10: Taṃ sutvā vāṇijā sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā saraṇāni sīlāni ca
atk-s0507a0:1044_11: gahetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā tassa petassa dakkhiṇaṃ ādisiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:1044_12: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā catunnaṃ parisānaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:1044_13: Mahājano ca lobhādimaccheramalaṃ pahāya dānādipuññābhirato ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:1047_1: bhanteti idaṃ satthari veḷuvane viharante cūḷaseṭṭhipetaṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1047_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira eko gahapati assaddho appasanno maccharī kadariyo puññakiriyāya anādaro cūḷaseṭṭhi nāma ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:1047_4: tassa kāyo apagatamaṃsalohito aṭṭhinhārucammamatto muṇḍo apetavattho ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:1047_5: Dhītā panassa anulā andhakavinde sāmikassa gehe vasantī pitaraṃ uddissa brāhmaṇe bhojetukāmā taṇḍulādīni dānūpakaraṇāni sajjesi.
atk-s0507a0:1047_6: Taṃ ñatvā peto āsāya ākāsena tattha gacchanto rājagahaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0507a0:1047_7: Tena ca samayena rājā ajātasattu devadattena uyyojito pitaraṃ jīvitā voropetvā tena vippaṭisārena dussupinena
atk-s0507a0:1047_8: ca niddaṃ anupagacchanto uparipāsādavaragato caṅkamanto taṃ petaṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā imāya gāthāya pucchi –
atk-s0507a0:1049_0: “Naggo kiso pabbajitosi bhante, rattiṃ kuhiṃ gacchasi kissahetu;
atk-s0507a0:1050_0: Ācikkha me taṃ api sakkuṇemu, sabbena vittaṃ paṭipādaye tuva”nti.
atk-s0507a0:1051_1: Rājā kira taṃ naggattā muṇḍattā ca “naggo samaṇo aya”nti saññāya “naggo kiso pabbajitosī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:1051_3: Sabbena vittaṃ paṭipādaye tuvanti vittiyā upakaraṇabhūtaṃ vittaṃ sabbena bhogena tuyhaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1051_5: Tathā kātuṃ mayaṃ appeva nāma sakkuṇeyyāma,
atk-s0507a0:1051_7: etaṃ tava āgamanakāraṇaṃ mayhaṃ kathehīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1052_0: Evaṃ raññā puṭṭho peto attano pavattiṃ kathento tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0507a0:1054_0: “Bārāṇasī nagaraṃ dūraghuṭṭhaṃ, tatthāhaṃ gahapati aḍḍhako ahu dīno;
atk-s0507a0:1055_0: Adātā gedhitamano āmisasmiṃ, dussīlyena yamavisayamhi patto.
atk-s0507a0:1062_0: “Dhītā ca mayhaṃ lapate abhikkhaṇaṃ, dassāmi dānaṃ pitūnaṃ pitāmahānaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1063_0: Tamupakkhaṭaṃ parivisayanti brāhmaṇā, yāmi ahaṃ andhakavindaṃ bhuttu”nti.
atk-s0507a0:1064_1: Tattha dūraghuṭṭhanti dūrato eva guṇakittanavasena ghositaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1064_6: Gedhitamano āmisasminti kāmāmise laggacitto gedhaṃ āpanno.
atk-s0507a0:1064_7: Dussīlyena yamavisayamhi pattoti attanā katena dussīlakammunā yamavisayaṃ petalokaṃ patto amhi.
atk-s0507a0:1065_1: So sūcikāya kilamitoti so ahaṃ vijjhanaṭṭhena sūcisadisatāya “sūcikā”ti laddhanāmāya jighacchāya kilamito nirantaraṃ vijjhamāno.
atk-s0507a0:1065_4: Tassa hi petassa tāni pāpakammāni anussarantassa ativiya domanassaṃ uppajji,
atk-s0507a0:1065_7: Ñātīsu yāmīti ñātīnaṃ samīpaṃ yāmi gacchāmi.
atk-s0507a0:1065_12: tathā evaṃ aññepi manussā adānasīlā “dānassa phalaṃ ekaṃsena paraloke hotī”ti na ca saddahanti.
atk-s0507a0:1065_13: Yato ahaṃ viya tepi petā hutvā mahādukkhaṃ paccanubhavantīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:1066_3: Kinti lapatīti āha “dassāmi dānaṃ pitūnaṃ pitāmahāna”nti.
atk-s0507a0:1070_0: Ācikkha me taṃ yadi atthi hetu,
atk-s0507a0:1073_0: “Tathāti vatvā agamāsi tattha, bhuñjiṃsu bhattaṃ na ca dakkhiṇārahā;
atk-s0507a0:1074_0: Paccāgami rājagahaṃ punāparaṃ, pāturahosi purato janādhipassa.
atk-s0507a0:1076_0: “Disvāna petaṃ punadeva āgataṃ, rājā avoca ‘ahamapi kiṃ dadāmi;
atk-s0507a0:1077_0: Ācikkha me taṃ yadi atthi hetu, yena tuvaṃ cirataraṃ pīṇito siyā’.
atk-s0507a0:1079_0: “Buddhañca saṅghaṃ parivisiyāna rāja, annena pānena ca cīvarena;
atk-s0507a0:1080_0: Taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ ādisa me hitāya, evaṃ ahaṃ cirataraṃ pīṇito siyā.
atk-s0507a0:1082_0: “Tato ca rājā nipatitvā tāvade, dānaṃ sahatthā atulaṃ daditvā saṅghe;
atk-s0507a0:1083_0: Ārocesi pakataṃ tathāgatassa, tassa ca petassa dakkhiṇaṃ ādisittha.
atk-s0507a0:1085_0: “So pūjito ativiya sobhamāno, pāturahosi purato janādhipassa;
atk-s0507a0:1086_0: Yakkhohamasmi paramiddhipatto, na mayhamatthi samā sadisā mānusā.
atk-s0507a0:1088_0: “Passānubhāvaṃ aparimitaṃ mamayidaṃ, tayānudiṭṭhaṃ atulaṃ datvā saṅghe;
atk-s0507a0:1089_0: Santappito satataṃ sadā bahūhi, yāmi ahaṃ sukhito manussadevā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:1090_1: Tattha tamavoca rājāti taṃ petaṃ tathā vatvā ṭhitaṃ rājā ajātasattu avoca.
atk-s0507a0:1090_2: Anubhaviyāna tampīti taṃ tava dhītuyā upakkhaṭaṃ dānampi anubhavitvā.
atk-s0507a0:1090_5: Ācikkha me taṃ yadi atthi hetūti sace kiñci kāraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0507a0:1090_9: “amukasmiṃ ṭhāne asukena pakārena dāne kate mayhaṃ upakappatī”ti sakāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vadāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1091_3: Bhuñjiṃsu bhattaṃ na ca dakkhiṇārahāti bhattaṃ bhuñjiṃsu dussīlabrāhmaṇā,
atk-s0507a0:1091_4: na ca pana dakkhiṇārahā sīlavanto bhuñjiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1091_5: Punāparanti puna aparaṃ vāraṃ rājagahaṃ paccāgami.
atk-s0507a0:1092_1: Kiṃ dadāmīti “kīdisaṃ te dānaṃ dassāmī”ti rājā petaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0507a0:1093_3: Me hitāyāti mayhaṃ hitatthāya petattabhāvato parimuttiyā.
atk-s0507a0:1094_5: Yamhi peto paccāgantvā rañño attānaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0507a0:1094_11: dānaṃ aññataraṃ petaṃ sandhāya pakata”nti taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:1094_12: Ārocetvā ca yathā taṃ dānaṃ tassa upakappati,
atk-s0507a0:1094_13: evaṃ tassa ca petassa dakkhiṇaṃ ādisittha ādisi.
atk-s0507a0:1095_6: Yakkhohamasmīti petattabhāvato mutto yakkho ahaṃ jāto devabhāvaṃ pattosmi.
atk-s0507a0:1095_7: Na mayhamatthi samā sadisā mānusāti mayhaṃ ānubhāvasampattiyā samā vā bhogasampattiyā sadisā vā manussā na santi.
atk-s0507a0:1096_1: Passānubhāvaṃ aparimitaṃ mamayidanti “mama idaṃ aparimāṇaṃ dibbānubhāvaṃ passā”ti attano sampattiṃ paccakkhato rañño dassento vadati.
atk-s0507a0:1096_2: Tayānudiṭṭhaṃ atulaṃ datvā saṅgheti ariyasaṅghassa atulaṃ uḷāraṃ dānaṃ datvā mayhaṃ anukampāya tayā anudiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1096_3: Santappito satataṃ sadā bahūhīti annapānavatthādīhi bahūhi deyyadhammehi ariyasaṅghaṃ santappentena tayā
atk-s0507a0:1096_4: sadā sabbakālaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tatthāpi satataṃ nirantaraṃ ahaṃ santappito pīṇito.
atk-s0507a0:1096_5: Yāmi ahaṃ sukhito manussadevāti “tasmā ahaṃ idāni sukhito manussadeva mahārāja yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ yāmī”ti rājānaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0507a0:1097_0: Evaṃ pete āpucchitvā gate rājā ajātasattu tamatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi,
atk-s0507a0:1097_2: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:1097_3: Taṃ sutvā mahājano maccheramalaṃ pahāya dānādipuññābhirato ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:1100_0: Yassa atthāya gacchāmāti idaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto aṅkurapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:1101_1: ye te uttaramadhurādhipatino rañño mahāsāgarassa puttaṃ upasāgaraṃ paṭicca uttarāpathe kaṃsabhoge asitañjananagare
atk-s0507a0:1101_2: mahākaṃsassa dhītuyā devagabbhāya kucchiyaṃ uppannā añjanadevī vāsudevo baladevo candadevo sūriyadevo
atk-s0507a0:1101_3: aggidevo varuṇadevo ajjuno pajjuno ghaṭapaṇḍito aṅkuro cāti vāsudevādayo dasa bhātikāti ekādasa khattiyā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1101_4: tesu vāsudevādayo bhātaro asitañjananagaraṃ ādiṃ katvā dvāravatīpariyosānesu sakalajambudīpe tesaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0507a0:1101_5: nagarasahassesu sabbe rājāno cakkena jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā dvāravatiyaṃ vasamānā rajjaṃ dasa koṭṭhāse
atk-s0507a0:1101_8: Puna saritvā “ekādasa koṭṭhāse karomā”ti vutte tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭho aṅkuro “mama koṭṭhāsaṃ tassā detha,
atk-s0507a0:1101_10: tumhe attano attano janapadesu suṅkaṃ mayhaṃ vissajjethā”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:1101_11: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tassa koṭṭhāyaṃ bhaginiyā datvā nava rājāno dvāravatiyaṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:1102_0: Aṅkuro pana vaṇijjaṃ karonto niccakālaṃ mahādānaṃ deti.
atk-s0507a0:1102_1: Tassa paneko dāso bhaṇḍāgāriko atthakāmo ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:1102_2: Aṅkuro pasannamānaso tassa ekaṃ kuladhītaraṃ gahetvā adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:1102_4: Aṅkuro tasmiṃ jāte tassa pituno dinnaṃ bhattavetanaṃ tassa adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:1102_5: Atha tasmiṃ dārake vayappatte “dāso na dāso”ti rājakule vinicchayo uppajji.
atk-s0507a0:1102_6: Taṃ sutvā añjanadevī dhenūpamaṃ vatvā “mātu bhujissāya puttopi bhujisso evā”ti dāsabyato mocesi.
atk-s0507a0:1103_0: Dārako pana lajjāya tattha vasituṃ avisahanto roruvanagaraṃ gantvā tattha aññatarassa tunnavāyassa dhītaraṃ gahetvā tunnavāyasippena jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0507a0:1103_1: Tena samayena roruvanagare asayhamahāseṭṭhi nāma ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:1103_3: So tunnavāyo seṭṭhino gharaṃ ajānantānaṃ pītisomanassajāto hutvā asayhaseṭṭhino nivesanaṃ dakkhiṇabāhuṃ
atk-s0507a0:1104_0: So aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā marubhūmiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe bhummadevatā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0507a0:1104_2: Tasmiṃyeva ca roruve aññataro puriso asayhaseṭṭhino dāne byāvaṭo assaddho appasanno micchādiṭṭhiko puññakiriyāya
atk-s0507a0:1104_3: anādaro kālaṃ katvā tassa devaputtassa vasanaṭṭhānassa avidūre peto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:1104_5: Asayhamahāseṭṭhi pana kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane sakkassa devarañño sahabyataṃ upagato.
atk-s0507a0:1105_0: Atha aparena samayena aṅkuro pañcahi sakaṭasatehi,
atk-s0507a0:1105_1: aññataro ca brāhmaṇo pañcahi sakaṭasatehīti dvepi janā sakaṭasahassena bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya marukantāramaggaṃ
atk-s0507a0:1105_2: paṭipannā maggamūḷhā hutvā bahuṃ divasaṃ tattheva vicarantā parikkhīṇatiṇodakāhārā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1105_3: Aṅkuro assadūtehi catūsu disāsu pāniyaṃ maggāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:1105_4: Atha so kāmadadahattho yakkho taṃ tesaṃ byasanappattiṃ disvā aṅkurena pubbe attano kataṃ upakāraṃ cintetvā
atk-s0507a0:1105_5: “handa dāni imassa mayā avassayena bhavitabba”nti attano vasanavaṭarukkhaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:1105_6: So kira vaṭarukkho sākhāviṭapasampanno ghanapalāso sandacchāyo anekasahassapāroho āyāmena vitthārena ubbedhena ca yojanaparimāṇo ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:1105_7: Taṃ disvā aṅkuro haṭṭhatuṭṭho tassa heṭṭhā khandhāvāraṃ bandhāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:1105_8: Yakkho attano dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā paṭhamaṃ tāva pānīyena sabbaṃ janaṃ santappesi.
atk-s0507a0:1105_9: Tato yo yo yaṃ yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0507a0:1106_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ mahājane nānāvidhena annapānādinā yathākāmaṃ santappite pacchā vūpasante maggaparissame so
atk-s0507a0:1106_2: “dhanalābhāya ito kambojaṃ gantvā mayaṃ kiṃ karissāma,
atk-s0507a0:1106_3: imameva pana yakkhaṃ yena kenaci upāyena gahetvā yānaṃ āropetvā amhākaṃ nagarameva gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:1109_0: Ayaṃ kāmadado yakkho, imaṃ yakkhaṃ nayāmase.
atk-s0507a0:1113_13: tena gamanena sādhetabbo attho idheva sijjhati.
atk-s0507a0:1113_15: tasmā imaṃ yakkhaṃ yācitvā tassa anumatiyā vā,
atk-s0507a0:1113_17: balakkārena vā yānaṃ āropetvā yāne pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā taṃ gahetvā itoyeva khippaṃ dvāravatīnagaraṃ gacchāmāti.
atk-s0507a0:1114_0: Evaṃ pana brāhmaṇena vutto aṅkuro sappurisadhamme ṭhatvā tassa vacanaṃ paṭikkhipanto –
atk-s0507a0:1117_0: Na tassa sākhaṃ bhañjeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1118_4: Yo hi sītacchāyo rukkho ghammābhitattassa purisassa parissamavinodako,
atk-s0507a0:1118_7: Ayaṃ devaputto sappuriso pubbakārī amhākaṃ dukkhapanūdako bahūpakāro,
atk-s0507a0:1119_0: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇā “atthassa mūlaṃ nikativinayo”ti nītimaggaṃ nissāya aṅkurassa paṭilomapakkhe ṭhatvā –
atk-s0507a0:1122_0: Khandhampi tassa chindeyya, attho ce tādiso siyā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1123_1: Tattha attho ce tādiso siyāti tādisena dabbasambhārena sace attho bhaveyya,
atk-s0507a0:1124_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇena vutte aṅkuro sappurisadhammaṃyeva paggaṇhanto –
atk-s0507a0:1127_0: Na tassa pattaṃ bhindeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1128_1: Tattha na tassa pattaṃ bhindeyyāti tassa rukkhassa ekapaṇṇamattampi na pāteyya,
atk-s0507a0:1132_0: Samūlampi taṃ abbuhe, attho ce tādiso siyā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1133_1: Tattha samūlampi taṃ abbuheti taṃ tattha samūlampi saha mūlenapi abbuheyya,
atk-s0507a0:1134_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇena vutte puna aṅkuro taṃ nītiṃ niratthakaṃ kātukāmo –
atk-s0507a0:1137_0: Na tassa pāpaṃ manasāpi cintaye, kataññutā sappurisehi vaṇṇitā.
atk-s0507a0:1139_0: “Yassekarattimpi ghare vaseyya, annena pānena upaṭṭhito siyā;
atk-s0507a0:1140_0: Na tassa pāpaṃ manasāpi cintaye, adubbhapāṇī dahate mittadubbhiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1143_0: Allapāṇihato poso, na so bhadrāni passatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1145_3: Yatthannapānaṃ puriso labhethāti yassa santike koci puriso annapānaṃ vā yaṃkiñci bhojanaṃ vā labheyya.
atk-s0507a0:1145_4: Na tassa pāpaṃ manasāpi cintayeti tassa puggalassa abhaddakaṃ anatthaṃ manasāpi na cinteyya na piheyya,
atk-s0507a0:1145_7: Kataññutā sappurisehi vaṇṇitāti kataññutā nāma buddhādīhi uttamapurisehi pasaṃsitā.
atk-s0507a0:1146_1: Upaṭṭhitoti payirupāsito “idaṃ gaṇha idaṃ bhuñjā”ti annapānādinā upaṭṭhito.
atk-s0507a0:1146_3: Dahate mittadubbhinti taṃ mittadubbhiṃ puggalaṃ dahati vināseti,
atk-s0507a0:1146_4: appaduṭṭhe hitajjhāsayasampanne puggale parena kato aparādho avisesena tasseva anatthāvaho,
atk-s0507a0:1146_5: appaduṭṭho puggalo atthato taṃ dahati nāma.
atk-s0507a0:1147_0: “Yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa;
atk-s0507a0:1148_0: Tameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ, sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃva khitto”ti. ;
atk-s0507a0:1149_1: Yo pubbe katakalyāṇoti yo puggalo kenaci sādhunā katabhaddako katūpakāro.
atk-s0507a0:1149_2: Pacchā pāpena hiṃsatīti taṃ pubbakārinaṃ aparabhāge pāpena abhaddakena anatthakena bādhati.
atk-s0507a0:1149_3: Allapāṇihato posoti allapāṇinā upakārakiriyāya allapāṇinā dhotahatthena pubbakārinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena hato bādhito,
atk-s0507a0:1149_4: tassa vā pubbakārino bādhanena hato allapāṇihato nāma,
atk-s0507a0:1149_6: Na so bhadrāni passatīti so yathāvuttapuggalo idhaloke ca paraloke ca iṭṭhāni na passati,
atk-s0507a0:1150_0: Evaṃ sappurisadhammaṃ paggaṇhantena aṅkurena abhibhavitvā vutto so brāhmaṇo niruttaro tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:1150_1: Yakkho pana tesaṃ dvinnaṃ vacanapaṭivacanāni sutvā brāhmaṇassa kujjhitvāpi “hotu imassa duṭṭhabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0507a0:1150_2: kattabbaṃ pacchā jānissāmī”ti attano kenaci anabhibhavanīyatameva tāva dassento –
atk-s0507a0:1152_0: “Nāhaṃ devena vā manussena vā, issariyena vā haṃ suppasayho;
atk-s0507a0:1154_1: Tattha devena vāti yena kenaci devena vā.
atk-s0507a0:1154_3: Issariyena vāti devissariyena vā manussissariyena vā.
atk-s0507a0:1154_7: Mahānubhāvāpi hi devā attano puññaphalūpatthambhite manussepi asati payogavipattiyaṃ abhibhavituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0507a0:1154_11: Yakkhohamasmi paramiddhipattoti attano puññaphalena ahaṃ yakkhattaṃ upagato asmi,
atk-s0507a0:1154_12: yakkhova samāno na yo vā so vā,
atk-s0507a0:1154_13: atha kho paramiddhipatto paramāya uttamāya yakkhiddhiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0507a0:1154_14: Dūraṅgamoti khaṇeneva dūrampi ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samattho.
atk-s0507a0:1154_15: Vaṇṇabalūpapannoti rūpasampattiyā sarīrabalena ca upapanno samannāgatoti tīhipi padehi mantappayogādīhi attano anabhibhavanīyataṃyeva dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:1154_17: rūpasampadaṃ nissāya visabhāgavatthunāpi anākaḍḍhaniyovāti vaṇṇasampadā anabhibhavanīyakāraṇanti vuttā.
atk-s0507a0:1155_0: Ito paraṃ aṅkurassa ca devaputtassa ca vacanapaṭivacanakathā hoti –
atk-s0507a0:1160_0: “Nāmhi devo na gandhabbo, nāpi sakko purindado;
atk-s0507a0:1161_0: Petaṃ maṃ aṅkura jānāhi, roruvamhā idhāgataṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1164_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
atk-s0507a0:1167_0: Sukicchavutti kapaṇo, na me vijjati dātave.
atk-s0507a0:1173_0: Te ca maṃ tattha pucchanti, asayhassa nivesanaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1175_0: “Kattha gacchāma bhaddaṃ vo, kattha dānaṃ padīyati;
atk-s0507a0:1178_0: “Paggayha dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ, ettha gacchatha bhaddaṃ vo;
atk-s0507a0:1182_0: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
atk-s0507a0:1184_0: “Na kira tvaṃ adā dānaṃ, sakapāṇīhi kassaci;
atk-s0507a0:1185_0: Parassa dānaṃ anumodamāno, pāṇiṃ paggayha pāvadi.
atk-s0507a0:1188_0: Tena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
atk-s0507a0:1191_0: So hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, kiṃ nu so disataṃ gato.
atk-s0507a0:1193_0: “Nāhaṃ pajānāmi asayhasāhino, aṅgīrasassa gatiṃ āgatiṃ vā;
atk-s0507a0:1194_0: Sutañca me vessavaṇassa santike, sakkassa sahabyataṃ gato asayho.
atk-s0507a0:1197_0: Pāṇiṃ kāmadadaṃ disvā, ko puññaṃ na karissati.
atk-s0507a0:1199_0: “So hi nūna ito gantvā, anuppatvāna dvārakaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1205_3: Pañcadhāroti pañcahi aṅgulīhi parehi kāmitavatthūnaṃ dhārā etassa santīti pañcadhāro.
atk-s0507a0:1205_7: Yakkhassa hi kāmadade madhurādirasasampannāni vividhāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni hatthe vissajjante madhurādirasā paggharantīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1205_8: Maññehaṃ taṃ purindadanti maññe ahaṃ taṃ purindadaṃ sakkaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1205_9: “evaṃmahānubhāvo sakko devarājā”ti taṃ ahaṃ maññāmīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1206_1: Nāmhi devoti vessavaṇādiko pākaṭadevo na homi.
atk-s0507a0:1206_3: Nāpi sakko purindadoti purimattabhāve pure dānassa paṭṭhapitattā “purindado”ti laddhanāmo sakko devarājāpi na homi.
atk-s0507a0:1206_4: Kataro pana ahosīti āha “petaṃ maṃ aṅkura jānāhī”tiādi.
atk-s0507a0:1206_7: Roruvamhā idhāgatanti roruvanagarato cavitvā marukantāre idha imasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe upapajjanavasena āgataṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1207_2: roruvasmiṃ pure tuvanti pubbe purimattabhāve roruvanagare vasanto tvaṃ kiṃsīlo kiṃsamācāro ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:1207_3: pāpato nivattanalakkhaṇaṃ kīdisaṃ sīlaṃ samādāya saṃvattitapuññakiriyālakkhaṇena samācārena kiṃsamācāro,
atk-s0507a0:1207_4: dānādīsu kusalasamācāresu kīdiso samācāro ahosīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1207_6: puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatīti kīdisena seṭṭhacariyena idaṃ evarūpaṃ tava hatthesu puññaphalaṃ idāni samijjhati nipphajjati,
atk-s0507a0:1207_11: dhammānaṃ samādānahetu evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu puññanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1208_5: Na me vijjati dātaveti addhikānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dātuṃ kiñci dātabbayuttakaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0507a0:1208_6: cittaṃ pana me dānaṃ dinnanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:1209_3: Asayhassa upantiketi asayhassa mahāseṭṭhino gehassa samīpe.
atk-s0507a0:1209_5: Dānapatinoti dāne nirantarappavattāya pariccāgasampattiyā lobhassa ca abhibhavena patibhūtassa.
atk-s0507a0:1210_2: Yācanakāyantīti yācanakā janā asayhaseṭṭhiṃ kiñci yācitukāmā āgacchanti.
atk-s0507a0:1210_5: ye dāyakassa puññaphalādiñca guṇakittanādimukhena attano atthikabhāvaṃ pavedentā vicaranti.
atk-s0507a0:1210_6: Te ca maṃ tattha pucchantīti tatthāti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1210_7: te yācakādayo maṃ asayhaseṭṭhino nivesanaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0507a0:1210_8: Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu kammadvayaṃ icchanti.
atk-s0507a0:1211_9: Tesāhaṃ puṭṭho akkhāmīti evaṃ tehi addhikajanehi labhanaṭṭhānaṃ puṭṭho “ahaṃ pubbe akatapuññatāya idāni īdisānaṃ kiñci dātuṃ asamattho jāto,
atk-s0507a0:1211_10: dānaggaṃ pana imesaṃ dassento lābhassa upāyācikkhaṇena pītiṃ uppādento ettakenapi bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavāmī”ti
atk-s0507a0:1211_11: gāravaṃ uppādetvā dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ pasāretvā tesaṃ asayhaseṭṭhissa nivesanaṃ akkhāmi.
atk-s0507a0:1212_1: Tena pāṇi kāmadadoti tena paradānapakāsanena parena katassa dānassa sakkaccaṃ anumodanamattena hetunā
atk-s0507a0:1212_2: idāni mayhaṃ hattho kapparukkho viya santānakalatā viya ca kāmaduho icchiticchitadāyī kāmadado hoti.
atk-s0507a0:1212_3: Kāmadado ca honto tena pāṇi madhussavo iṭṭhavatthuvissajjanako jāto.
atk-s0507a0:1213_1: Na kira tvaṃ adā dānanti kirāti anussavanatthe nipāto,
atk-s0507a0:1213_2: tvaṃ kira attano santakaṃ na pariccaji,
atk-s0507a0:1213_3: sakapāṇīhi sahatthehi yassa kassaci samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā kiñci dānaṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:1213_4: Parassa dānaṃ anumodamānoti kevalaṃ pana parena kataṃ parassa dānaṃ “aho dānaṃ pavattesī”ti anumodamānoyeva vihāsi.
atk-s0507a0:1214_1: Tena pāṇi kāmadadoti tena tuyhaṃ pāṇi evaṃ kāmadado,
atk-s0507a0:1214_2: aho acchariyā vata puññānaṃ gatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:1215_2: pasanno sakapāṇibhīti devaputtaṃ gāravena ālapati. Bhante,
atk-s0507a0:1215_3: parena katassa dānānumodakassa tāva tuyhaṃ īdisaṃ phalaṃ evarūpo ānubhāvo,
atk-s0507a0:1215_4: yo pana so asayhamahāseṭṭhi mahādānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:1215_5: pasannacitto hutvā sahatthehi tadā mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0507a0:1215_6: So hitvā mānusaṃ dehanti so idha manussattabhāvaṃ pahāya.
atk-s0507a0:1215_10: kīdisī tassa gato nipphattīti asayhaseṭṭhino abhisamparāyaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0507a0:1216_1: Asayhasāhinoti aññehi maccharīhi lobhābhibhūtehi sahituṃ vahituṃ asakkuṇeyyassa pariccāgādivibhāgassa sappurisadhurassa sahanato asayhasāhino.
atk-s0507a0:1216_4: Tassa kira yācake āgacchante disvā uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0507a0:1216_7: Gatiṃ āgatiṃ vāti tassa “asukaṃ nāma gatiṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1216_8: ito gato”ti gatiṃ vā “tato vā pana asukasmiṃ kāle idhāgamissatī”ti āgatiṃ vā nāhaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0507a0:1216_10: Sutañca me vessavaṇassa santiketi apica kho upaṭṭhānaṃ gatena vessavaṇassa mahārājassa santike sutametaṃ mayā.
atk-s0507a0:1216_11: Sakkassa sahabyataṃ gato asayhoti asayhaseṭṭhi sakkassa devānamindassa sahabyataṃ gato ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:1217_1: Alameva kātuṃ kalyāṇanti yaṃkiñci kalyāṇaṃ kusalaṃ puññaṃ kātuṃ yuttameva patirūpameva.
atk-s0507a0:1217_6: Yatra hi nāma parakatapuññānumodanapubbakena dānapatinivesanamaggācikkhaṇamattena ayaṃ hattho kāmadado diṭṭho,
atk-s0507a0:1217_8: Ko puññaṃ na karissatīti mādiso ko nāma attano patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ puññaṃ na karissatīti.
atk-s0507a0:1218_1: Evaṃ aniyamavasena puññakiriyāya ādaraṃ dassetvā idāni attani taṃ niyametvā dassento “so hi nūnā”tiādigāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0507a0:1219_0: Evaṃ aṅkurena “dānaṃ dassāmī”ti paṭiññāya katāya yakkho tuṭṭhamānaso “mārisa,
atk-s0507a0:1219_3: yena te deyyadhammo na parikkhayaṃ gamissati,
atk-s0507a0:1219_4: tena pakārena karissāmī”ti taṃ dānakiriyāya samuttejetvā “brāhmaṇa vāṇija,
atk-s0507a0:1219_5: tvaṃ kira mādise balakkārena netukāmo attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti tassa bhaṇḍamantaradhāpetvā taṃ yakkhavibhiṃsakāya bhiṃsāpento santajjesi.
atk-s0507a0:1219_6: Atha naṃ aṅkuro nānappakāraṃ yācitvā brāhmaṇena khamāpento pasādetvā sabbabhaṇḍaṃ pākatikaṃ kārāpetvā
atk-s0507a0:1219_7: rattiyā upagatāya yakkhaṃ vissajjetvā gacchanto tassa avidūre aññataraṃ ativiya bībhacchadassanaṃ petaṃ
atk-s0507a0:1222_0: Akkhīni ca paggharanti, kiṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ tayā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1233_0: Akkhīni me paggharanti, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1235_4: Dāne adhikato ahunti deyyadhammassa pariccajane dānādhikāre adhikato ṭhapito ahosiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1236_1: Ekamantaṃ apakkammāti yācanake bhojanatthike āgate disvā dānabyāvaṭena dānaggato anapakkamma yathāṭhāneyeva
atk-s0507a0:1236_2: ṭhatvā sañjātapītisomanassena vippasannamukhavaṇṇena sahatthena dānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1236_4: ahaṃ pana tathā akatvā yācanake āgacchante dūratova disvā attānaṃ adassento ekamantaṃ apakkamma apakkamitvā.
atk-s0507a0:1236_5: Akāsiṃ kuṇaliṃ mukhanti vikuṇitaṃ saṅkucitaṃ mukhaṃ akāsiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1237_1: Tenāti yasmā tadāhaṃ sāminā dānādhikāre niyutto samāno dānakāle upaṭṭhite macchariyāpakato dānaggato apakkamanto pādehi saṅkocaṃ āpajjiṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1237_2: sahatthehi dātabbe tathā akatvā hatthasaṅkocaṃ āpajjiṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1237_5: tasmā hatthaṅguliyo ca pādaṅguliyo ca kuṇitā jātā,
atk-s0507a0:1239_0: Akkhīni me paggharanti, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:1243_0: Akkhīni ca paggharanti, yaṃ taṃ parassa dānassa;
atk-s0507a0:1246_0: Puna aṅkuro taṃ dānapatiṃ seṭṭhiṃ garahanto –
atk-s0507a0:1250_2: dānaṃ dadanto puriso kathañhi nāma taṃ parapattiyaṃ parena pāpetabbaṃ sādhetabbaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0507a0:1251_0: Evaṃ taṃ garahitvā idāni attanā paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassento –
atk-s0507a0:1253_0: “So hi nūna ito gantvā, anuppatvāna dvārakaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1266_0: “Ko chāto ko ca tasito, ko vatthaṃ paridahissati;
atk-s0507a0:1267_0: Kassa santāni yoggāni, ito yojentu vāhanaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1269_0: “Ko chatticchati gandhañca, ko mālaṃ ko upāhanaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1271_0: Sadā sāyañca pāto ca, aṅgurassa nivesane”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1272_0: Catasso gāthā aṅgurassa paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitā.
atk-s0507a0:1273_4: Dānaṃ paṭṭhapayi aṅguroti yakkhena paripūritasakalakoṭṭhāgāro sabbapātheyyakaṃ mahādānaṃ so aṅguro paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0507a0:1273_5: Yaṃtumassa sukhāvahanti yaṃ attano sampati āyatiñca sukhanibbattakaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1274_8: Ito yojentu vāhananti ito yoggasamūhato yathārucitaṃ gahetvā vāhanaṃ yojentu.
atk-s0507a0:1275_1: Ko chatticchatīti ko kilañjachattādibhedaṃ chattaṃ icchati,
atk-s0507a0:1275_13: Sadāti sabbakālaṃ divase divase sāyañca pāto ca tattha aṅgurassa nivesane ghosenti ugghosentīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:1276_0: Evaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattentassa gacchante kāle tittibhāvato atthikajanehi pavivittaṃ viraḷaṃ dānaggaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:1276_1: Taṃ disvā aṅkuro dāne uḷārajjhāsayatāya atuṭṭhamānaso hutvā attano dāne niyuttaṃ sindhakaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ āmantetvā –
atk-s0507a0:1278_0: “Sukhaṃ supati aṅkuro, iti jānāti maṃ jano;
atk-s0507a0:1279_0: Dukkhaṃ supāmi sindhaka, yaṃ na passāmi yācake.
atk-s0507a0:1281_0: “Sukhaṃ supati aṅkuro, iti jānāti maṃ jano;
atk-s0507a0:1282_0: Dukkhaṃ supāmi sindhaka, appake su vanibbake”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1283_2: iti jānāti maṃ janoti “aṅkuro rājā yasabhogasamappito dānapati attano bhogasampattiyā dānasampattiyā ca sukhaṃ supati,
atk-s0507a0:1283_4: sukhaṃ paṭibujjhatī”ti evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāveti.
atk-s0507a0:1283_5: Dukkhaṃ supāmi sindhakāti ahaṃ pana sindhaka dukkhameva supāmi. Kasmā?
atk-s0507a0:1283_7: yasmā mama ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ deyyadhammapaṭiggāhake bahū yācake na passāmi,
atk-s0507a0:1283_9: Appake su vanibbaketi vanibbakajane appake katipaye jāte dukkhaṃ supāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:1284_0: Taṃ sutvā sindhako tassa uḷāraṃ dānādhimuttiṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātukāmo –
atk-s0507a0:1287_0: Kissa sabbassa lokassa, varamāno varaṃ vare”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1288_2: tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ sabbassa ca lokassa issaro sakko “varaṃ varassu, aṅkura,
atk-s0507a0:1288_3: yaṃkiñci manasicchita”nti tuyhaṃ varaṃ dajjā dadeyya ce,
atk-s0507a0:1288_4: varamāno patthayamāno kissa kīdisaṃ varaṃ vareyyāsīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1289_0: Atha aṅkuro attano ajjhāsayaṃ yāthāvato pavedento –
atk-s0507a0:1293_0: Dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ, sīlavanto ca yācakā.
atk-s0507a0:1296_0: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyyaṃ, etaṃ sakkaṃ varaṃ vare”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0507a0:1297_1: Tattha kāluṭṭhitassa me satoti kāle pāto vuṭṭhitassa atthikānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ apacāyanapāricariyādivasena uṭṭhānavīriyasampannassa me samānassa.
atk-s0507a0:1297_3: Dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyunti devalokapariyāpannā āhārā uppajjeyyuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1297_4: Sīlavanto ca yācakāti yācakā ca sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1298_1: Dadato me na khīyethāti āgatāgatānaṃ dānaṃ dadato ca me deyyadhammo na khīyetha,
atk-s0507a0:1298_3: Datvā nānutapeyyahanti tañca dānaṃ datvā kiñcideva appasādakaṃ disvā tena ahaṃ pacchā nānutapeyyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1298_4: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyyanti dadamāno cittaṃ pasādeyyaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1298_6: Etaṃ sakkaṃ varaṃ vareti sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārogyasampadā,
atk-s0507a0:1298_11: Ettha ca “kāluṭṭhitassa me sato”ti etena ārogyasampadā,
atk-s0507a0:1298_14: “dadato me na khīyethā”ti etena deyyadhammassa aparimitasampadā,
atk-s0507a0:1298_16: dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyya”nti etehi dāyakasampadāti ime pañca atthā varabhāvena icchitā.
atk-s0507a0:1298_17: Te ca kho dānamayapuññassa yāvadeva uḷārabhāvāyāti veditabbā.
atk-s0507a0:1299_0: Evaṃ aṅkurena attano ajjhāsaye pavedite tattha nisinno nītisatthe kataparicayo sonako nāma eko puriso taṃ atidānato vicchinditukāmo –
atk-s0507a0:1301_0: “Na sabbavittāni pare pavecche, dadeyya dānañca dhanañca rakkhe;
atk-s0507a0:1302_0: Tasmā hi dānā dhanameva seyyo, atippadānena kulā na honti.
atk-s0507a0:1307_0: Dve gāthā abhāsi. Sindhako evaṃ punapi vīmaṃsitukāmo “na sabbavittānī”tiādimāhāti apare.
atk-s0507a0:1308_6: “dakkhiṇeyyā laddhā”ti katvā kiñci asesetvā sabbasāpateyyapariccāgo na kātabboti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1308_7: Dadeyya dānañcāti sabbena sabbaṃ dānadhammo na kātabbo,
atk-s0507a0:1308_8: atha kho attano āyañca vayañca jānitvā vibhavānurūpaṃ dānañca dadeyya.
atk-s0507a0:1311_0: Vuttavidhinā vā dhanaṃ rakkheyya tammūlakattā dānassa.
atk-s0507a0:1311_1: Tayopi maggā aññamaññavisodhanena paṭisevitabbāti hi nīticintakā.
atk-s0507a0:1311_2: Tasmā hīti yasmā dhanañca rakkhanto dānañca karonto ubhayalokahitāya paṭipanno hoti dhanamūlakañca dānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1311_3: tasmā dānato dhanameva seyyo sundarataroti atidānaṃ na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:1311_5: dhanassa pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā dānassa taṃ nissāya atippadānapasaṅgena kulāni na honti nappavattanti,
atk-s0507a0:1312_2: Tattha adānamatidānañcāti sabbena sabbaṃ kaṭacchubhikkhāyapi taṇḍulamuṭṭhiyāpi adānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1312_3: pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā pariccāgasaṅkhātaṃ atidānañca paṇḍitā buddhimanto sapaññajātikā nappasaṃsanti na vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0507a0:1312_4: Sabbena sabbaṃ adānena hi samparāyikato atthato paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0507a0:1312_6: Samena vatteyyāti avisamena lokiyasarikkhakena samāhitena majjhimena ñāyena pavatteyya.
atk-s0507a0:1313_0: Taṃ sutvā aṅkuro tassa adhippāyaṃ parivattento –
atk-s0507a0:1315_0: “Aho vata re ahameva dajjaṃ, santo ca maṃ sappurisā bhajeyyuṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1319_0: Datvā attamano hoti, taṃ gharaṃ vasato sukhaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1322_0: Datvā attamano hoti, esā yaññassa sampadā.
atk-s0507a0:1325_0: Datvā attamano hoti, esā yaññassa sampadā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1327_5: “dānā dhanameva seyyo”ti yadi ayaṃ nītikusalānaṃ vādo tava hotu,
atk-s0507a0:1327_7: Santo ca maṃ sappurisā bhajeyyunti tasmiñca dāne santo upasantakāyavacīmanosamācārā sappurisā sādhavo maṃ bhajeyyuṃ upagaccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1327_8: Meghova ninnāni paripūrayantoti ahaṃ abhippavassanto mahāmegho viya ninnāni ninnaṭṭhānāni sabbesaṃ vanibbakānaṃ
atk-s0507a0:1327_9: adhippāye paripūrayanto aho vata te santappeyyanti.
atk-s0507a0:1328_1: Yassa yācanake disvāti yassa puggalassa gharamesino yācanake disvā “paṭhamaṃ tāva upaṭṭhitaṃ vata me
atk-s0507a0:1328_3: yathāvibhavaṃ pana tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā attamano pītisomanassehi gahitacitto hoti.
atk-s0507a0:1329_0: 304. Esā yaññassa sampadāti esā yaññassa sampatti pāripūri, nipphattīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1330_1: Pubbeva dānā sumanoti “sampattīnaṃ nidānaṃ anugāmikaṃ nidhānaṃ nidhessāmī”ti muñcanacetanāya pubbe eva
atk-s0507a0:1330_2: dānūpakaraṇassa sampādanato paṭṭhāya sumano somanassajāto bhaveyya.
atk-s0507a0:1330_3: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādayeti dadanto deyyadhammaṃ dakkhiṇeyyahatthe patiṭṭhāpento “asārato dhanato sārādānaṃ karomī”ti attano cittaṃ pasādeyya.
atk-s0507a0:1330_4: Datvā attamano hotīti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajitvā “paṇḍitapaññattaṃ nāma mayā anuṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1330_5: aho sādhu suṭṭhū”ti attamano pamuditamano pītisomanassajāto hoti.
atk-s0507a0:1330_6: Esā yaññassa sampadāti yā ayaṃ pubbacetanā muñjacetanā aparacetanāti imesaṃ kammaphalasaddhānugatānaṃ
atk-s0507a0:1331_0: Evaṃ aṅkuro attano paṭipajjanavidhiṃ pakāsetvā bhiyyosomattāya abhivaḍḍhamānadānajjhāsayo divase divase mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0507a0:1331_1: Tena tadā sabbarajjāni unnaṅgalāni katvā mahādāne diyyamāne paṭiladdhasabbūpakaraṇā manussā attano attano kammante pahāya yathāsukhaṃ vicariṃsu,
atk-s0507a0:1331_4: “bhoto dānaṃ nissāya amhākaṃ āyassa vināso ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:1332_0: Taṃ sutvā aṅkuro dakkhiṇāpathaṃ gantvā damiḷavisaye samuddassa avidūraṭṭhāne mahatiyo anekadānasālāyo
atk-s0507a0:1332_1: kārāpetvā mahādānāni pavattento yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:1352_0: “Bahū māse ca pakkhe ca, utusaṃvaccharāni ca;
atk-s0507a0:1356_0: So hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, tāvatiṃsūpago ahū”ti. – gāthā āhaṃsu;
atk-s0507a0:1357_1: Tatha saṭṭhi vāhasahassānīti vāhānaṃ saṭṭhisahassāni gandhasālitaṇḍulādipūritavāhānaṃ saṭṭhisahassāni.
atk-s0507a0:1357_2: Puññapekkhassa dānajjhāsayassa dānādhimuttassa aṅkurassa nivesane niccaṃ divase divase jantuno sattakāyassa bhojanaṃ dīyateti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:1358_1: Tisahassāni sūdā hīti tisahassamattā sūdā bhattakārakā.
atk-s0507a0:1358_2: Te ca kho pana padhānabhūtā adhippetā,
atk-s0507a0:1358_3: tesu ekamekassa pana vacanakarā anekāti veditabbā.
atk-s0507a0:1358_10: Dāne yaññassa vāvaṭāti mahāyāgasaññitassa yaññassa dāne yajane vāvaṭā ussukkaṃ āpannā.
atk-s0507a0:1358_11: Kaṭṭhaṃ phālenti māṇavāti nānappakārānaṃ khajjabhojjādiāhāravisesānaṃ pacanāya alaṅkatapaṭiyattā taruṇamanussā kaṭṭhāni phālenti vidālenti.
atk-s0507a0:1359_0: 309. Vidhāti vidhātabbāni bhojanayoggāni kaṭukabhaṇḍāni. Piṇḍentīti pisanavasena payojenti.
atk-s0507a0:1360_0: 310. Dabbigāhāti kaṭacchugāhikā. Upaṭṭhitāti parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā honti.
atk-s0507a0:1361_6: Bahuṃ bahūnaṃ cirakālañca dento yathā adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:1361_14: katipayavāre vā akatvā anekavāraṃ pādāsīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:1362_1: Idāni tameva punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “bahū māse cā”ti gāthamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:1362_2: Tattha bahū māseti cittamāsādike bahū aneke māse.
atk-s0507a0:1362_4: Utusaṃvaccharāni cāti vasantagimhādike bahū utū ca saṃvaccharāni ca,
atk-s0507a0:1362_7: Ettha ca “ciraṃ pādāsī”ti cirakālaṃ dānassa pavattitabhāvaṃ vatvā puna tassa nirantarameva pavattitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0507a0:1363_3: kesañci dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ ekaccassa deyyadhammassa pariccajanavasena datvā,
atk-s0507a0:1363_4: puna “bahuṃ bahūnaṃ pādāsī”ti vuttanayena atthikānaṃ sabbesaṃ yathākāmaṃ dento mahāyāgavasena yajitvā.
atk-s0507a0:1363_6: tāvatiṃsūpago ahūti so aṅkuro āyupariyosāne manussatthabhāvaṃ pahāya paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tāvatiṃsadevanikāyūpago ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:1364_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavante amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle indako nāma māṇavo
atk-s0507a0:1364_1: āyasmato anuruddhattherassa piṇḍāya carantassa pasannamānaso kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:1364_2: So aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā khettagatassa puññassa ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsesu mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo
atk-s0507a0:1364_3: devaputto hutvā nibbatto dibbehi rūpādīhi dasahi ṭhānehi aṅkuraṃ devaputtaṃ abhibhavitvā virocati.
atk-s0507a0:1367_0: So hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, tāvatiṃsūpago ahu.
atk-s0507a0:1370_0: Rūpe sadde rase gandhe, phoṭṭhabbe ca manorame.
atk-s0507a0:1372_0: “Āyunā yasasā ceva, vaṇṇena ca sukhena ca;
atk-s0507a0:1374_5: Nanu ca devānaṃ jīvitaṃ paricchinnappamāṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1374_8: Tathā hi ekaccānaṃ devānaṃ yogavipattiādinā antarāmaraṇaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-s0507a0:1374_9: Indako pana tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasahassāni paripūretiyeva.
atk-s0507a0:1375_0: Evaṃ aṅkure ca indake ca tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavantesu amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambodhito
atk-s0507a0:1375_1: sattame saṃvacchare āsāḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ sāvatthinagaradvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā anukkamena
atk-s0507a0:1375_2: tipadavikkamena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ yugandharapabbate bālasūriyo
atk-s0507a0:1375_3: viya virocamāno dasahi lokadhātūhi sannipatitāya devabrahmaparisāya jutiṃ attano sarīrappabhāya abhibhavanto
atk-s0507a0:1375_4: abhidhammaṃ desetuṃ nisinno avidūre nisinnaṃ indakaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1378_1: Taṃ sutvā aṅkuro “bhagavā mayā cirakālaṃ bahuṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajitvā pavattitampi mahādānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyasampattivirahena
atk-s0507a0:1378_2: akhette vuttabījaṃ viya na uḷāraphalaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:1378_3: indakassa pana kaṭacchubhikkhādānampi dakkhiṇeyyasampattiyā sukhette vuttabījaṃ viya ativiya uḷāraphalaṃ jāta”nti āha.
atk-s0507a0:1389_0: “Yojanāni dasa dve ca, aṅkuroyaṃ tadā ahu;
atk-s0507a0:1399_0: Kiṃ mayhaṃ tena dānena, dakkhiṇeyyena suññataṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1401_0: “Ayaṃ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṃ parittakaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1405_0: Na vipulaṃ phalaṃ hoti, napi toseti kassakaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1408_0: Na vipulaṃ phalaṃ hoti, napi toseti dāyakaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1411_0: Sammā dhāraṃ pavecchante, phalaṃ tosesi kassakaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1414_0: Appakampi kataṃ kāraṃ, puññaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti. – gāthāyo avocuṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1415_2: Silāyaṃ paṇḍukambaleti paṇḍukambalanāmake silāsane purisuttamo buddho yadā vihāsīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:1416_2: sannipatitvāna devatāti jātikhettasaññitesu dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu kāmāvacaradevatā brahmadevatā ca
atk-s0507a0:1416_3: buddhassa bhagavato payirupāsanāya dhammassavanatthañca ekato sannipatitvā.
atk-s0507a0:1417_2: aṅkuroyaṃ tadā ahūti ayaṃ yathāvuttacarito aṅkuro tadā satthu sammukhakāle dasa dve yojanāni antaraṃ katvā ahu.
atk-s0507a0:1417_3: Satthu nisinnaṭṭhānato dvādasayojanantare ṭhāne nisinno ahosīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1418_1: Codito bhāvitattenāti pāramiparibhāvitāya ariyamaggabhāvanāya bhāvitattena sammāsambuddhena codito.
atk-s0507a0:1418_2: Kiṃ mayhaṃ tenātiādikā satthu paṭivacanavasena aṅkurena vuttagāthā.
atk-s0507a0:1418_3: Dakkhiṇeyyena suññatanti yaṃ dakkhiṇeyyena suññataṃ rittakaṃ virahitaṃ tadā mama dānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1418_4: tasmā “kiṃ mayhaṃ tenā”ti attano dānapuññaṃ hīḷento vadati.
atk-s0507a0:1419_3: Atirocati amhehīti attanā mādisehi ativiya virocati.
atk-s0507a0:1420_4: vapitvā vā uddharitvā vā puna ropitaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1420_7: Tathevāti yathā ujjaṅgale khette bahumpi bījaṃ ropitaṃ vipulaphalaṃ uḷāraphalaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0507a0:1420_9: tathā dussīlesu sīlavirahitesu bahukampi dānaṃ patiṭṭhāpitaṃ vipulaphalaṃ mahapphalaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0507a0:1420_10: tato eva dāyakaṃ na tosetīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1421_1: Yathāpi bhaddaketi gāthādvayassa vattavipariyāyena atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0507a0:1421_2: Tattha sammā dhāraṃ pavecchanteti vuṭṭhidhāraṃ sammadeva pavattente,
atk-s0507a0:1421_3: anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ anupañcāhaṃ deve vassanteti attho.
atk-s0507a0:1424_0: Viceyya dānaṃ datvāna, saggaṃ gacchanti dāyakā.
atk-s0507a0:1426_0: “Viceyya dānaṃ sugatappasaṭṭhaṃ, ye dakkhiṇeyyā idha jīvaloke;
atk-s0507a0:1427_0: Etesu dinnāni mahapphalāni, bījāni vuttāni yathā sukhette”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:1429_0: 329. Tattha viceyyāti vicinitvā, puññakkhettaṃ paññāya upaparikkhitvā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0507a0:1430_0: Tayidaṃ aṅkurapetavatthu satthārā tāvatiṃsabhavane dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ purato dakkhiṇeyyasampattivibhāvanatthaṃ
atk-s0507a0:1430_2: tattha tayo māse abhidhammaṃ desetvā mahāpavāraṇāya devagaṇaparivuto devadevo devalokato saṅkassanagaraṃ
atk-s0507a0:1430_3: otaritvā anukkamena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavane viharanto catuparisamajjhe dakkhiṇeyyasampattivibhāvanatthameva
atk-s0507a0:1430_4: “yassa atthāya gacchāmā”tiādinā vitthārato desetvā catusaccakathāya desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0507a0:1433_2: satthari parinibbute paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyā pavattitāya āyasmā mahākaccāyano dvādasahi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0507a0:1433_4: Tena ca samayena rañño udenassa aññataro amacco kālamakāsi,
atk-s0507a0:1433_5: tena ca pubbe nagare kammantā adhiṭṭhitā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1433_6: Atha rājā tassa puttaṃ uttaraṃ nāma māṇavaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tvañca pitarā adhiṭṭhite kammante samanusāsā”ti tena ṭhitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0507a0:1434_0: So ca sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā ekadivasaṃ nagarapaṭisaṅkharaṇiyānaṃ dārūnaṃ atthāya vaḍḍhakiyo gahetvā araññaṃ gato.
atk-s0507a0:1434_1: Tattha āyasmato mahākaccāyanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upagantvā theraṃ tattha paṃsukūlacīvaradharaṃ vivittaṃ
atk-s0507a0:1434_2: nisinnaṃ disvā iriyāpatheyeva pasīditvā katapaṭisanthāro vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0507a0:1434_4: So dhammaṃ sutvā ratanattaye sañjātappasādo saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya theraṃ nimantesi –
atk-s0507a0:1434_6: svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhūhi anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:1434_8: So tato nikkhamitvā nagaraṃ gantvā aññesaṃ upāsakānaṃ ācikkhi –
atk-s0507a0:1435_0: So dutiyadivase kālasseva paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā kālaṃ ārocāpetvā saddhiṃ bhikkhūhi
atk-s0507a0:1435_1: āgacchantassa therassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā vanditvā purakkhatvā gehaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0507a0:1435_2: Atha mahārahakappiyapaccattharaṇaatthatesu āsanesu there ca bhikkhūsu ca nisinnesu gandhapupphadhūpehi
atk-s0507a0:1435_3: pūjaṃ katvā paṇītena annapānena te santappetvā sañjātappasādo katañjalī anumodanaṃ suṇitvā katabhattānumodane
atk-s0507a0:1435_4: there gacchante pattaṃ gahetvā anugacchanto nagarato nikkhamitvā paṭinivattanto “bhante,
atk-s0507a0:1435_5: tumhehi niccaṃ mama gehaṃ pavisitabba”nti yācitvā therassa adhivāsanaṃ ñatvā nivatti.
atk-s0507a0:1435_6: Evaṃ so theraṃ upaṭṭhahanto tassa ovāde patiṭṭhāya sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0507a0:1435_8: sabbe ca attano ñātake sāsane abhippasanne akāsi.
atk-s0507a0:1436_0: Mātā panassa maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitacittā hutvā evaṃ paribhāsi –
atk-s0507a0:1436_1: “yaṃ tvaṃ mama anicchantiyā eva samaṇānaṃ annapānaṃ desi,
atk-s0507a0:1436_3: Ekaṃ pana morapiñchakalāpaṃ vihāramahadivase diyyamānaṃ anujāni.
atk-s0507a0:1436_5: morapiñchakalāpadānānumodanena panassā kesā nīlā siniddhā vellitaggā sukhumā dīghā ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1436_8: Sā pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni khuppipāsābhibhūtā vicaritvā ekadivasaṃ kaṅkhārevatattheraṃ gaṅgāya tīre divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0507a0:1436_9: nisinnaṃ disvā attānaṃ attano kesehi paṭicchādetvā upasaṅkamitvā pānīyaṃ yāci.
atk-s0507a0:1443_0: Imā dve gāthā saṅgītikārakehi idha ādito ṭhapitā.
atk-s0507a0:1444_5: Pubbe “bhikkhu”nti ca pacchā “samaṇa”nti ca kaṅkhārevatattherameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1445_0: Sā pana petī theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pānīyaṃ yācantī –
atk-s0507a0:1448_0: Nābhijānāmi bhuttaṃ vā, pītaṃ vā pana pāniyaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1449_0: Dehi tvaṃ pāniyaṃ bhante, tasitā pāniyāya me”ti. – imaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0507a0:1450_1: Tattha nābhijānāmi bhuttaṃ vāti evaṃ dīghamantare kāle bhojanaṃ bhuttaṃ vā pānīyaṃ pītaṃ vā nābhijānāmi,
atk-s0507a0:1450_4: Pāniyāyāti pānīyatthāya āhiṇḍantiyā me pānīyaṃ dehi,
atk-s0507a0:1454_0: Piva etto gahetvāna, kiṃ maṃ yācasi pāniyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1457_0: Lohitaṃ me parivattati, tasmā yācāmi pāniyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1459_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:1462_0: “Putto me uttaro nāma, saddho āsi upāsako;
atk-s0507a0:1463_0: So ca mayhaṃ akāmāya, samaṇānaṃ pavecchati.
atk-s0507a0:1473_0: Imā therassa ca petiyā ca vacanapaṭivacanagāthā.
atk-s0507a0:1474_1: Tattha himavantatoti mahato himassa atthitāya “himavā”ti laddhanāmato pabbatarājato.
atk-s0507a0:1475_1: Lohitaṃ me parivattatīti udakaṃ sandamānaṃ mayhaṃ pāpakammaphalena lohitaṃ hutvā parivattati pariṇamati,
atk-s0507a0:1476_4: Etanti yaṃ etaṃ cīvarādikaṃ paccayajātaṃ samaṇānaṃ pavecchasi desi,
atk-s0507a0:1476_5: etaṃ te paralokasmiṃ lohitaṃ hotu uttarāti abhisapanavasena kataṃ pāpakammaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:1477_0: Athāyasmā revato taṃ petiṃ uddissa bhikkhusaṅghassa pānīyaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:1477_2: saṅkārakūṭādito paṃsukūlaṃ gahetvā dhovitvā bhisiñca cimilikañca katvā bhikkhūnaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:1477_4: Sā therassa santikaṃ gantvā attanā laddhadibbasampattiṃ therassa dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:1477_5: Thero taṃ pavattiṃ attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ catunnaṃ parisānaṃ pakāsetvā dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:1477_6: Tena mahājano sañjātasaṃvego vigatamalamacchero hutvā dānasīlādikusaladhammābhirato ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:1477_7: Idaṃ pana petavatthu dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ āruḷhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:1480_0: Ahaṃ pure pabbajitassa bhikkhunoti idaṃ suttapetavatthu.
atk-s0507a0:1480_2: Sāvatthiyā kira avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmake amhākaṃ satthari anuppanneyeva sattannaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari aññataro dārako ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0507a0:1480_3: Tassa mātā tasmiṃ vayappatte tassatthāya samānakulato aññataraṃ kuladhītaraṃ ānesi.
atk-s0507a0:1480_4: Vivāhadivaseyeva ca so kumāro sahāyehi saddhiṃ nhāyituṃ gato ahinā daṭṭho kālamakāsi,
atk-s0507a0:1480_6: So paccekabuddhassa upaṭṭhānena bahuṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā ṭhitopi tassā dārikāya paṭibaddhacittatāya vimānapeto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0507a0:1481_0: Atha so taṃ dārikaṃ attano vimānaṃ netukāmo “kena nu kho upāyena esā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0507a0:1481_1: mayā saddhiṃ idha abhirameyyā”ti tassā dibbabhogasampattiyā anubhavanahetuṃ vīmaṃsanto paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0507a0:1481_2: cīvarakammaṃ karontaṃ disvā manussarūpena gantvā vanditvā “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:1481_6: asukasmiṃ ṭhāne suttabhikkhaṃ carathā”ti tassā dārikāya gehaṃ dassesi.
