atk-s0507a0:2288_5: Taṃ sutvā so āha “ahaṃ sūle āvuto vajjho maraṇābhimukho,
atk-s0507a0:2288_7: Eko panettha peto mahiddhiko mama samīpaṃ āgamissati,
atk-s0507a0:2288_12: So tattha ṭhito majjhimayāme taṃ petaṃ āgataṃ disvā sakkhiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0507a0:2288_13: Vibhātāya ca rattiyā raññā “mama āṇā tayā atikkantā,
atk-s0507a0:2288_14: tasmā rājadaṇḍaṃ te karissāmī”ti vutte, deva,
atk-s0507a0:2288_18: So tassa sūlāvutassa purisassa santike āgacchantaṃ naggapetaṃ “sakkhī”ti niddisitvā “kathametaṃ amhehi
atk-s0507a0:2288_19: saddhātabba”nti raññā vutte “ajja rattiyaṃ tumhehi saddhātabbaṃ purisaṃ mayā saddhiṃ pesethā”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:2288_20: Taṃ sutvā rājā sayameva tena saddhiṃ tattha gantvā ṭhito petena ca tatthāgantvā “jīva, bho,
atk-s0507a0:2288_21: jīvitameva seyyo”ti vutte taṃ “seyyā nisajjā nayimassa atthī”tiādinā pañcahi gāthāhi paṭipucchi.
atk-s0507a0:2288_22: Idāni ādito pana “vesāli nāma nagaratthi vajjīna”nti gāthā tāsaṃ sambandhadassanatthaṃ saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitā –
atk-s0507a0:2290_0: “Vesālī nāma nagaratthi vajjīnaṃ, tattha ahu licchavi ambasakkaro;
atk-s0507a0:2291_0: Disvāna petaṃ nagarassa bāhiraṃ, tattheva pucchittha taṃ kāraṇatthiko.
atk-s0507a0:2293_0: “Seyyā nisajjā nayimassa atthi, abhikkamo natthi paṭikkamo ca;
atk-s0507a0:2296_0: “Ye ñātakā diṭṭhasutā suhajjā, anukampakā yassa ahesuṃ pubbe;
atk-s0507a0:2297_0: Daṭṭhumpi te dāni na taṃ labhanti, virājitato hi janena tena.
atk-s0507a0:2299_0: “Na oggatattassa bhavanti mittā, jahanti mittā vikalaṃ viditvā;
atk-s0507a0:2300_0: Atthañca disvā parivārayanti, bahū mittā uggatattassa honti.
atk-s0507a0:2307_0: Atha tvaṃ kena vaṇṇena vadesi yakkha,
atk-s0507a0:2309_3: vesālinagarassa bahi eva jātaṃ pavattaṃ sambandhaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2309_8: jīvitameva seyyo”ti vuttaatthassa kāraṇena atthiko hutvā.
atk-s0507a0:2310_1: Seyyā nisajjā nayimassa atthīti piṭṭhipasāraṇalakkhaṇā seyyā,
atk-s0507a0:2310_2: pallaṅkābhujanalakkhaṇā nisajjā ca imassa sūle āropitapuggalassa natthi.
atk-s0507a0:2310_3: Abhikkamo natthi paṭikkamo cāti abhikkamādilakkhaṇaṃ appamattakampi gamanaṃ imassa natthi.
atk-s0507a0:2310_4: Paricārikā sāpīti yā asitapītakhāyitavatthaparibhogādilakkhaṇā indriyānaṃ paricāraṇā,
atk-s0507a0:2311_2: anukampakā yassa ahesuṃ pubbeti sandiṭṭhasahāyā ceva adiṭṭhasahāyā ca yassa mittā anuddayāvanto ye assa imassa pubbe ahesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2312_1: Na oggatattassa bhavanti mittāti apagataviññāṇassa matassa mittā nāma na honti tassa mittehi kātabbakiccassa atikkantattā.
atk-s0507a0:2312_2: Jahanti mittā vikalaṃ viditvāti mato tāva tiṭṭhatu,
atk-s0507a0:2312_3: jīvantampi bhogavikalaṃ purisaṃ viditvā “na ito kiñci gayhūpaga”nti mittā pajahanti.
atk-s0507a0:2312_4: Atthañca disvā parivārayantīti tassa pana santakaṃ atthaṃ dhanaṃ disvā piyavādino mukhullokikā hutvā taṃ parivārenti.
atk-s0507a0:2312_5: Bahū mittā uggatattassa hontīti vibhavasampattiyā uggatasabhāvassa samiddhassa bahū anekā mittā honti,
atk-s0507a0:2313_6: Ajja suveti ajja vā suve vā imassa nāma purisassa jīvitassa uparodho nirodho,
atk-s0507a0:2314_3: Kena vaṇṇenāti kena kāraṇena. Jīva, bho,
atk-s0507a0:2314_6: Sūlaṃ āropitassāpi hi te idha jīvitameva ito cutassa jīvitato satabhāgena sahassabhāgena seyyo sundarataroti.
atk-s0507a0:2315_0: Evaṃ tena raññā pucchito so peto attano adhippāyaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0507a0:2317_0: “Sālohito esa ahosi mayhaṃ, ahaṃ sarāmi purimāya jātiyā;
atk-s0507a0:2318_0: Disvā ca me kāruññamahosi rāja, mā pāpadhammo nirayaṃ patāyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2320_0: “Ito cuto licchavi esa poso, satthussadaṃ nirayaṃ ghorarūpaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2323_0: “Anekabhāgena guṇena seyyo, ayameva sūlo nirayena tena;
atk-s0507a0:2324_0: Ekantadukkhaṃ kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ, ekantatibbaṃ nirayaṃ patāyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2326_0: “Idañca sutvā vacanaṃ mameso, dukkhūpanīto vijaheyya pāṇaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2327_0: Tasmā ahaṃ santike na bhaṇāmi, mā mekato jīvitassūparodho”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2329_4: Mā pāpadhammo nirayaṃ patāyanti ayaṃ pāpadhammo puriso nirayaṃ mā pati,
atk-s0507a0:2329_5: mā nirayaṃ upapajjīti imaṃ disvā me kāruññaṃ ahosīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:2331_2: Ayameva sūlo nirayena tenāti tato imassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtato nirayato ayameva sūlo seyyoti.
atk-s0507a0:2332_1: Idañca sutvā vacanaṃ mamesoti “ito cuto”tiādinā vuttaṃ mama vacanaṃ sutvā eso puriso dukkhūpanīto mama vacanena nirayadukkhaṃ upanīto viya hutvā.
atk-s0507a0:2332_4: Mā mekatoti “mayā ekato imassa purisassa jīvitassa uparodho mā hotū”ti imassa santike idaṃ vacanaṃ ahaṃ na bhaṇāmi,
atk-s0507a0:2333_0: Evaṃ petena attano adhippāye pakāsite puna rājā petassa pavattiṃ pucchituṃ okāsaṃ karonto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0507a0:2335_0: “Aññāto eso purisassa attho, aññampi icchāmase pucchituṃ tuvaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2336_0: Okāsakammaṃ sace no karosi, pucchāma taṃ no na ca kujjhitabba”nti.
atk-s0507a0:2338_0: “Addhā paṭiññā me tadā ahu, nācikkhaṇā appasannassa hoti;
atk-s0507a0:2339_0: Akāmā saddheyyavacoti katvā, pucchassu maṃ kāmaṃ yathā visayha”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:2341_4: Na ca kujjhitabbanti “ime manussā yaṃkiñci pucchantī”ti kodho na kātabbo.
atk-s0507a0:2342_4: Tadā ahūti tasmiṃ kāle paṭhamadassane ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:2342_5: Nācikkhaṇā appasannassa hotīti akathanā appasannassa hoti.
atk-s0507a0:2342_6: Pasanno eva hi pasannassa kiñci katheti.
atk-s0507a0:2342_10: Idāni panāhaṃ tuyhaṃ akāmā saddheyyavaco akāmo eva saddhātabbavacano iti katvā iminā kāraṇena.
atk-s0507a0:2342_11: Pucchassu maṃ kāmaṃ yathā visayhanti tvaṃ yathā icchasi,
atk-s0507a0:2342_13: Ahaṃ pana yathā visayhaṃ yathā mayhaṃ sahituṃ sakkā,
atk-s0507a0:2343_0: Evaṃ petena pucchanāya okāse kate rājā –
atk-s0507a0:2349_4: taṃ pana disvāva taṃ vacanaṃ nopi ce saddaheyyaṃ. Yakkha,
atk-s0507a0:2349_6: Atha vā yaṃ kiñcahaṃ cakkhunā passissāmīti ahaṃ yaṃ kiñcideva cakkhunā passissāmi acakkhugocarassa adassanato.
atk-s0507a0:2349_7: Sabbampi tāhaṃ abhisaddaheyyanti sabbampi te ahaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ aññaṃ vā abhisaddaheyyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2349_8: Tādiso hi mayhaṃ tayi abhippasādoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:2352_0: “Saccappaṭiññā tava mesā hotu, sutvāna dhammaṃ labha suppasādaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2353_0: Aññatthiko no ca paduṭṭhacitto, yaṃ te sutaṃ asutañcāpi dhammaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2354_0: Sabbampi akkhissaṃ yathā pajāna”nti. – gāthamāha; Ito paraṃ –
atk-s0507a0:2357_0: Yānaṃ idaṃ abbhutaṃ dassaneyyaṃ, kissetaṃ kammassa ayaṃ vipākoti.
atk-s0507a0:2360_0: Gosīsamekāhaṃ pasannacitto, setaṃ gahetvā narakasmiṃ nikkhipiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2362_0: “Etasmiṃ pādāni patiṭṭhapetvā, mayañca aññe ca atikkamimhā;
atk-s0507a0:2363_0: Yānaṃ idaṃ abbhutaṃ dassaneyyaṃ, tasseva kammassa ayaṃ vipākoti.
atk-s0507a0:2365_0: “Vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsati, gandho ca te sabbadisā pavāyati;
atk-s0507a0:2366_0: Yakkhiddhipattosi mahānubhāvo, naggo cāsi kissa ayaṃ vipākoti.
atk-s0507a0:2369_0: Tasseva kammassa ayaṃ vipāko, dibbo me vaṇṇo satataṃ pabhāsati.
atk-s0507a0:2371_0: “Yasañca kittiñca dhamme ṭhitānaṃ, disvāna mantemi pasannacitto;
atk-s0507a0:2372_0: Tasseva kammassa ayaṃ vipāko, dibbo me gandho satataṃ pavāyati.
atk-s0507a0:2374_0: “Sahāyānaṃ titthasmiṃ nhāyantānaṃ, thale gahetvā nidahissa dussaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2375_0: Khiḍḍatthiko no ca paduṭṭhacitto, tenamhi naggo kasirā ca vuttīti.
atk-s0507a0:2378_0: Akīḷamāno pana yo karoti, kiṃ tassa kammassa vipākamāhūti.
atk-s0507a0:2380_0: “Ye duṭṭhasaṅkappamanā manussā, kāyena vācāya ca saṃkiliṭṭhā;
atk-s0507a0:2381_0: Kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ te nirayaṃ upenti.
atk-s0507a0:2384_0: Kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ te sugatiṃ upentī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2386_1: Tattha saccappaṭiññā tava mesā hotūti “sabbampi tāhaṃ abhisaddaheyya”nti tava esā paṭiññā mayhaṃ saccaṃ hotu.
atk-s0507a0:2386_2: Sutvāna dhammaṃ labha suppasādanti mayā vuccamānaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sundaraṃ pasādaṃ labhassu.
atk-s0507a0:2386_5: “yathāpi ñāta”nti vā mayā yathā ñātanti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2387_1: Kissetaṃ kammassa ayaṃ vipākoti kissetaṃ kissa nāma etaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2388_4: Narakasmiṃ nikkhipinti yathā kaddamo na akkamīyati,
atk-s0507a0:2389_4: No ca paduṭṭhacittoti dussasāmike na dūsitacitto,
atk-s0507a0:2390_3: Kiṃ tassa kammassa vipākamāhūti tassa tathā katassa pāpakammassa kīva kaṭukaṃ dukkhavipākaṃ paṇḍitā āhu.
atk-s0507a0:2391_3: Kāyena vācāya ca saṃkiliṭṭhāti pāṇātipātādivasena kāyavācāhi malinā.
atk-s0507a0:2392_0: Evaṃ petena saṅkhepeneva kammaphalesu vibhajitvā dassitesu taṃ asaddahanto rājā –
atk-s0507a0:2394_0: “Taṃ kinti jāneyyamahaṃ avecca, kalyāṇapāpassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0507a0:2395_0: Kiṃ vāhaṃ disvā abhisaddaheyyaṃ, ko vāpi maṃ saddahāpeyya eta”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:2396_1: Tattha taṃ kinti jāneyyamahaṃ aveccāti yoyaṃ tayā “ye duṭṭhasaṅkappamanā manussā,
atk-s0507a0:2396_3: “Apare pana sugatimāsamānā”tiādinā ca kalyāṇassa pāpassa ca kammassa vipāko vibhajitvā vutto,
atk-s0507a0:2396_4: taṃ kinti kena kāraṇena ahaṃ avecca aparapaccayabhāvena saddaheyyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2396_5: Kiṃ vāhaṃ disvā abhisaddaheyyanti kīdisaṃ vā panāhaṃ paccakkhabhūtaṃ nidassanaṃ disvā paṭisaddaheyyaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2396_6: Ko vāpi maṃ saddahāpeyya etanti ko vā viññū puriso paṇḍito etamatthaṃ maṃ saddahāpeyya,
atk-s0507a0:2397_0: Taṃ sutvā peto kāraṇena tamatthaṃ tassa pakāsento –
atk-s0507a0:2399_0: “Disvā ca sutvā abhisaddahassu, kalyāṇapāpassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0507a0:2400_0: Kalyāṇapāpe ubhaye asante, siyā nu sattā sugatā duggatā vā.
atk-s0507a0:2402_0: “No cettha kammāni kareyyuṃ maccā, kalyāṇapāpāni manussaloke;
atk-s0507a0:2403_0: Nāhesuṃ sattā sugatā duggatā vā, hīnā paṇītā ca manussaloke.
atk-s0507a0:2405_0: “Yasmā ca kammāni karonti maccā, kalyāṇapāpāni manussaloke;
atk-s0507a0:2406_0: Tasmā hi sattā sugatā duggatā vā, hīnā paṇītā ca manussaloke.
atk-s0507a0:2408_0: “Dvayajja kammānaṃ vipākamāhu, sukhassa dukkhassa ca vedanīyaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2409_0: Tā devatāyo paricārayanti, paccenti bālā dvayataṃ apassino”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2411_2: Sutvāti dhammaṃ sutvā tadanusārena nayaṃ nento anuminanto.
atk-s0507a0:2411_3: Kalyāṇapāpassāti kusalassa akusalassa ca kammassa ayaṃ sukho ayaṃ dukkho ca vipākoti abhisaddahassu.
atk-s0507a0:2411_4: Ubhaye asanteti kalyāṇe pāpe cāti duvidhe kamme avijjamāne.
atk-s0507a0:2411_5: Siyā nu sattā sugatā duggatā vāti “ime sattā sugatiṃ gatā duggatiṃ gatā vā,
atk-s0507a0:2411_6: sugatiyaṃ vā aḍḍhā duggatiyaṃ daliddā vā”ti ayamattho kiṃ nu siyā kathaṃ sambhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2412_1: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ “no cettha kammānī”ti ca “yasmā ca kammānī”ti ca gāthādvayena byatirekato anvayato ca vibhāveti.
atk-s0507a0:2412_2: Tattha hīnā paṇītāti kularūpārogyaparivārādīhi hīnā uḷārā ca.
atk-s0507a0:2413_1: Dvayajja kammānaṃ vipākamāhūti dvayaṃ duvidhaṃ ajja idāni kammānaṃ sucaritaduccaritānaṃ vipākaṃ vadanti kathenti.
atk-s0507a0:2413_2: Kiṃ tanti āha “sukhassa dukkhassa ca vedanīya”nti,
atk-s0507a0:2413_4: Tā devatāyo paricārayantīti ye ukkaṃsavasena sukhavedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ paṭilabhanti,
atk-s0507a0:2413_5: te devaloke tā devatā hutvā dibbasukhasamappitā indriyāni paricārenti.
atk-s0507a0:2413_6: Paccenti bālā dvayataṃ apassinoti ye bālā kammañca kammaphalañcāti dvayaṃ apassantā asaddahantā,
atk-s0507a0:2413_7: te pāpappasutā dukkhavedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ anubhavantā nirayādīsu kammunā paccenti dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0507a0:2414_0: Evaṃ kammaphalaṃ saddahanto pana tvaṃ kasmā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhavasīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya –
atk-s0507a0:2416_0: “Na matthi kammāni sayaṃkatāni, datvāpi me natthi yo ādiseyya;
atk-s0507a0:2417_0: Acchādanaṃ sayanamathannapānaṃ, tenamhi naggo kasirā ca vuttī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2418_1: Tattha na matthi kammāni sayaṃkatānīti yasmā sayaṃ attanā pubbe katāni puññakammāni mama natthi na vijjanti,
atk-s0507a0:2418_3: Datvāpi me natthi yo ādiseyyāti yo samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dānaṃ datvā “asukassa petassa hotū”ti me ādiseyya uddiseyya,
atk-s0507a0:2418_5: Tenamhi naggo kasirā ca vuttīti tena duvidhenāpi kāraṇena idāni naggo niccoḷo amhi,
atk-s0507a0:2418_6: kasirā dukkhā ca vutti jīvikā hotīti.
atk-s0507a0:2419_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa acchādanādilābhaṃ ākaṅkhanto –
atk-s0507a0:2421_0: “Siyā nu kho kāraṇaṃ kiñci yakkha, acchādanaṃ yena tuvaṃ labhetha;
atk-s0507a0:2422_0: Ācikkha me tvaṃ yadatthi hetu, saddhāyikaṃ hetuvaco suṇomā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2423_1: Tattha yenāti yena kāraṇena tvaṃ acchādanaṃ labhetha labheyyāsi,
atk-s0507a0:2423_2: kiñci taṃ kāraṇaṃ siyā nu kho bhaveyya nu khoti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2426_0: “Kappitako nāma idhatthi bhikkhu, jhāyī susīlo arahā vimutto;
atk-s0507a0:2429_0: “Sakhilo vadaññū suvaco sumukho, svāgamo suppaṭimuttako ca;
atk-s0507a0:2432_0: “Santo vidhūmo anīgho nirāso, mutto visallo amamo avaṅko;
atk-s0507a0:2433_0: Nirūpadhī sabbapapañcakhīṇo, tisso vijjā anuppatto jutimā.
atk-s0507a0:2435_0: “Appaññāto disvāpi na ca sujāno, munīti naṃ vajjisu voharanti;
atk-s0507a0:2436_0: Jānanti taṃ yakkhabhūtā anejaṃ, kalyāṇadhammaṃ vicarantaṃ loke.
atk-s0507a0:2438_0: “Tassa tuvaṃ ekayugaṃ duve vā, mamuddisitvāna sace dadetha;
atk-s0507a0:2439_0: Paṭiggahītāni ca tāni assu, mamañca passetha sannaddhadussa”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:2441_1: Tattha kappitato nāmāti jaṭilasahassassa abbhantare āyasmato upālittherassa upajjhāyaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0507a0:2443_12: Appaññātoti paramappicchatāya paṭicchannaguṇatāya ca na pākaṭo.
atk-s0507a0:2444_1: Disvāpi na ca sujānoti gambhīrabhāvena disvāpi “evaṃsīlo,
atk-s0507a0:2444_4: Jānanti taṃ yakkhabhūtā anejanti yakkhabhūtā ca anejaṃ nittaṇhaṃ “arahā”ti taṃ jānanti.
atk-s0507a0:2445_5: Paṭiggahītāni ca tāni assūti tāni vatthayugāni tena paṭiggahitāni ca assu bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2448_0: “Kasmiṃ padese samaṇaṃ vasantaṃ, gantvāna passemu mayaṃ idāni;
atk-s0507a0:2449_0: Yo majja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitañca, diṭṭhīvisūkāni vinodayeyyā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2454_0: Dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsati saccanāmo, sakasmimācerake appamatto”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2455_1: Tattha kapinaccanāyanti kapīnaṃ vānarānaṃ naccanena “kapinaccanā”ti laddhavohāre padese.
atk-s0507a0:2455_2: Saccanāmoti jhāyī susīlo arahā vimuttotiādīhi guṇanāmehi yāthāvanāmo aviparītanāmo.
atk-s0507a0:2456_0: Evaṃ petena vutte rājā tāvadeva therassa santikaṃ gantukāmo –
atk-s0507a0:2458_0: “Tathāhaṃ kassāmi gantvā idāni, acchādayissaṃ samaṇaṃ yugena;
atk-s0507a0:2459_0: Paṭiggahītāni ca tāni assu, tuvañca passemu sannaddhadussa”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:2461_0: Atha peto “devatānaṃ thero dhammaṃ deseti, tasmā nāyaṃ upasaṅkamanakālo”ti dassento –
atk-s0507a0:2463_0: “Mā akkhaṇe pabbajitaṃ upāgami, sādhu vo licchavi nesa dhammo;
atk-s0507a0:2464_0: Tato ca kāle upasaṅkamitvā, tattheva passāhi raho nisinna”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:2465_4: tumhākaṃ rājūnaṃ esa dhammo na hoti,
atk-s0507a0:2466_0: Evaṃ petena vutte rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā attano nivesanameva gantvā puna yuttapattakāle aṭṭha
atk-s0507a0:2466_1: vatthuyugāni gāhāpetvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisinno paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “imāni, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:2466_4: pubbe tvaṃ adānasīlo samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ viheṭhanajātikova kathaṃ paṇītāni vatthāni dātukāmo jāto”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:2466_5: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa kāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto petena samāgamaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2466_6: tena ca attanā ca kathitaṃ sabbaṃ therassa ārocetvā vatthāni datvā petassa uddisi.
atk-s0507a0:2466_7: Tena peto dibbavatthadharo alaṅkatapaṭiyatto assāruḷho therassa ca rañño ca purato pātubhavi.
atk-s0507a0:2466_8: Taṃ disvā rājā attamano pamudito pītisomanassajāto “paccakkhato vata mayā kammaphalaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2466_10: puññameva karissāmī”ti vatvā tena petena sakkhiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0507a0:2466_13: ito paṭṭhāya adhammaṃ pahāya dhammaṃ carasi,
atk-s0507a0:2466_17: evaṃ so jīvitaṃ labhitvā dhammaṃ caranto dukkhato muccissati,
atk-s0507a0:2466_18: therañca kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇanto puññāni karohī”ti vatvā gato.
atk-s0507a0:2467_0: Atha rājā theraṃ vanditvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ licchaviparisaṃ sannipātetvā te anujānāpetvā
atk-s0507a0:2467_1: taṃ purisaṃ sūlato mocetvā “imaṃ arogaṃ karothā”ti tikicchake āṇāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:2467_4: nirayagāmikammaṃ katvā ṭhitassa nirayato muttī”ti. Siyā, mahārāja,
atk-s0507a0:2467_6: muccatīti vatvā thero rājānaṃ saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:2467_7: So tattha patiṭṭhito therassa ovāde ṭhatvā sotāpanno ahosi,
atk-s0507a0:2467_8: sūlāvuto pana puriso arogo hutvā saṃvegajāto bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0507a0:2469_0: “Tathāti vatvā agamāsi tattha, parivārito dāsagaṇena licchavi;
atk-s0507a0:2470_0: So taṃ nagaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, vāsūpagacchittha sake nivesane.
atk-s0507a0:2477_0: “So taṃ padesaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, taṃ addasa samaṇaṃ santacittaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2478_0: Paṭikkantaṃ gocarato nivattaṃ, sītibhūtaṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2481_0: Vesāliyaṃ licchavihaṃ bhadante, jānanti maṃ licchavi ambasakkaro.
atk-s0507a0:2483_0: “Imāni me aṭṭha yugā subhāni, paṭiggaṇha bhante padadāmi tuyhaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2484_0: Teneva atthena idhāgatosmi, yathā ahaṃ attamano bhaveyyanti.
atk-s0507a0:2486_0: “Dūratova samaṇā brāhmaṇā ca, nivesanaṃ te parivajjayanti;
atk-s0507a0:2487_0: Pattāni bhijjanti ca te nivesane, saṅghāṭiyo cāpi vidālayanti.
atk-s0507a0:2490_0: Etādisaṃ pabbajitā vihesaṃ, tayā kataṃ samaṇā pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0507a0:2492_0: “Tiṇena telampi na tvaṃ adāsi, mūḷhassa maggampi na pāvadāsi;
atk-s0507a0:2493_0: Andhassa daṇḍaṃ sayamādiyāsi, etādiso kadariyo asaṃvuto tuvaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2494_0: Atha tvaṃ kena vaṇṇena kimeva disvā, amhehi saha saṃvibhāgaṃ karosīti.
atk-s0507a0:2496_0: “Paccemi bhante yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi, vihesayiṃ samaṇe brāhmaṇe ca;
atk-s0507a0:2497_0: Khiḍḍatthiko no ca paduṭṭhacitto, etampi me dukkaṭameva bhante.
atk-s0507a0:2499_0: Khiḍḍāya yakkho pasavitvā pāpaṃ, vedeti dukkhaṃ asamattabhogī;
atk-s0507a0:2500_0: Daharo yuvā nagganiyassa bhāgī, kiṃ su tato dukkhatarassa hoti.
atk-s0507a0:2502_0: “Taṃ disvā saṃvegamalatthaṃ bhante, tappaccayā vāpi dadāmi dānaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2503_0: Paṭiggaṇha bhante vatthayugāni aṭṭha, yakkhassimā gacchantu dakkhiṇāyoti.
atk-s0507a0:2505_0: “Addhā hi dānaṃ bahudhā pasatthaṃ, dadato ca te akkhayadhammamatthu;
atk-s0507a0:2506_0: Paṭigaṇhāmi te vatthayugāni aṭṭha, yakkhassimā gacchantu dakkhiṇāyoti.
atk-s0507a0:2508_0: “Tato hi so ācamayitvā licchavi, therassa datvāna yugāni aṭṭha;
atk-s0507a0:2509_0: Paṭiggahītāni ca tāni assu, yakkhañca passetha sannaddhadussaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2514_0: “So taṃ disvā attamano udaggo, pahaṭṭhacitto ca subhaggarūpo;
atk-s0507a0:2515_0: Kammañca disvāna mahāvipākaṃ, sandiṭṭhikaṃ cakkhunā sacchikatvā.
atk-s0507a0:2518_0: Na cāpi me kiñci adeyyamatthi, tuvañca me yakkha bahūpakāroti.
atk-s0507a0:2520_0: “Tuvañca me licchavi ekadesaṃ, adāsi dānāni amoghametaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2521_0: Svāhaṃ karissāmi tayāva sakkhiṃ, amānuso mānusakena saddhinti.
atk-s0507a0:2523_0: “Gatī ca bandhū ca parāyaṇañca, mitto mamāsi atha devatā me;
atk-s0507a0:2524_0: Yācāmi taṃ pañjaliko bhavitvā, icchāmi taṃ yakkha punapi daṭṭhunti.
atk-s0507a0:2527_0: Tvaṃ neva maṃ lacchasi dassanāya, disvā ca taṃ nopi ca ālapissaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2529_0: “Sace pana tvaṃ bhavissasi dhammagāravo, dāne rato saṅgahitattabhāvo;
atk-s0507a0:2530_0: Opānabhūto samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ, evaṃ mamaṃ lacchasi dassanāya.
atk-s0507a0:2532_0: “Disvā ca taṃ ālapissaṃ bhadante, imañca sūlato lahuṃ pamuñca;
atk-s0507a0:2533_0: Yatonidānaṃ akarimha sakkhiṃ, maññāmi sūlāvutakassa kāraṇā.
atk-s0507a0:2535_0: “Te aññamaññaṃ akarimha sakkhiṃ, ayañca sūlato lahuṃ pamutto;
atk-s0507a0:2536_0: Sakkacca dhammāni samācaranto, mucceyya so nirayā ca tamhā;
atk-s0507a0:2540_0: Sayaṃ mukhenūpanisajja puccha, so te akkhissati etamatthaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2542_0: “Tameva bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā, pucchassu aññatthiko no ca paduṭṭhacitto;
atk-s0507a0:2543_0: So te sutaṃ asutañcāpi dhammaṃ, sabbampi akkhissati yathā pajānanti.
atk-s0507a0:2545_0: “So tattha rahassaṃ samullapitvā, sakkhiṃ karitvāna amānusena;
atk-s0507a0:2546_0: Pakkāmi so licchavinaṃ sakāsaṃ, atha bravi parisaṃ sannisinnaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2548_0: “‘Suṇantu bhonto mama ekavākyaṃ, varaṃ varissaṃ labhissāmi atthaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2551_0: “‘Ettāvatā vīsatirattimattā, yato āvuto neva jīvati na mato;
atk-s0507a0:2552_0: Tāhaṃ mocayissāmi dāni, yathāmatiṃ anujānātu saṅgho’ti.
atk-s0507a0:2554_0: “‘Etañca aññañca lahuṃ pamuñca, ko taṃ vadetha tathā karontaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2555_0: Yathā pajānāsi tathā karohi, yathāmatiṃ anujānāti saṅgho’ti.
atk-s0507a0:2557_0: “So taṃ padesaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, sūlāvutaṃ mocayi khippameva;
atk-s0507a0:2558_0: Mā bhāyi sammāti ca taṃ avoca, tikicchakānañca upaṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0507a0:2561_0: Sayaṃ mukhenūpanisajja licchavi, tatheva pucchittha naṃ kāraṇatthiko.
atk-s0507a0:2564_0: Ettāvatā vīsatirattimattā, yato āvuto neva jīvati na mato.
atk-s0507a0:2566_0: “So mocito gantvā mayā idāni, etassa yakkhassa vaco hi bhante;
atk-s0507a0:2567_0: Siyā nu kho kāraṇaṃ kiñcideva, yena so nirayaṃ no vajeyya.
atk-s0507a0:2569_0: “Ācikkha bhante yadi atthi hetu, saddhāyikaṃ hetuvaco suṇoma;
atk-s0507a0:2570_0: Na tesaṃ kammānaṃ vināsamatthi, avedayitvā idha byantibhāvoti.
atk-s0507a0:2573_0: Mucceyya so nirayā ca tamhā, kammaṃ siyā aññatra vedanīyanti.
atk-s0507a0:2575_0: “Aññāto eso purisassa attho, mamampi dāni anukampa bhante;
atk-s0507a0:2576_0: Anusāsa maṃ ovada bhūripañña, yathā ahaṃ no nirayaṃ vajeyyanti.
atk-s0507a0:2578_0: “Ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ upehi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto;
atk-s0507a0:2579_0: Tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu.
atk-s0507a0:2582_0: Amajjapo mā ca musā abhāṇī, sakena dārena ca hoti tuṭṭho;
atk-s0507a0:2583_0: Imañca ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgavarenupetaṃ, samādiyāhi kusalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2593_0: Muñca tuvaṃ nirayā ca tamhā, kammaṃ siyā aññatra vedanīyanti.
atk-s0507a0:2595_0: “Ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ upemi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto;
atk-s0507a0:2596_0: Tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyāmi.
atk-s0507a0:2599_0: Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho;
atk-s0507a0:2600_0: Imañca ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgavarenupetaṃ, samādiyāmi kusalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2606_0: Dadāmi na vikampāmi, buddhānaṃ sāsane ratoti.
atk-s0507a0:2609_0: Saddho mudū kārakaro ca bhikkhu, saṅghañca sakkacca tadā upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0507a0:2611_0: “Sūlāvuto ca arogo hutvā, serī sukhī pabbajjaṃ upāgami;
atk-s0507a0:2612_0: Bhikkhuñca āgamma kappitakuttamaṃ, ubhopi sāmaññaphalāni ajjhaguṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2614_0: “Etādisā sappurisāna sevanā, mahapphalā hoti sataṃ vijānataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2615_0: Sūlāvuto aggaphalaṃ aphassayi, phalaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ pana ambasakkaro”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2619_2: Mūḷhassa maggampi na pāvadāsīti maggamūḷhassa maggampi tvaṃ na kathayasi “evāyaṃ purisā ito cito ca paribbhamatū”ti.
atk-s0507a0:2619_4: Sayamādiyāsīti andhassa hatthato yaṭṭhiṃ sayameva acchinditvā gaṇhasi.
atk-s0507a0:2619_5: Saṃvibhāgaṃ karosīti attanā paribhuñjitabbavatthuto ekaccāni datvā saṃvibhajasi.
atk-s0507a0:2621_7: Kiṃ su tato dukkhatarassa hotīti kiṃ su nāma tato naggabhāvato dukkhataraṃ assa petassa hoti.
atk-s0507a0:2621_8: Yakkhassimā gacchantu dakkhiṇāyoti imā mayā diyyamānavatthadakkhiṇāyo petassa upakappantu.
atk-s0507a0:2622_1: Bahudhā pasatthanti bahūhi pakārehi buddhādīhi vaṇṇitaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2623_1: Ekadesaṃ adāsīti catūsu paccayesu ekadesabhūtaṃ vatthadānaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0507a0:2624_0: 574. Mamāsīti me āsi. Devatā meti mayhaṃ devatā āsīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:2625_2: dhammiyaṃ paṭipadaṃ pahāya adhammiyaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannoti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2626_2: Sayaṃ mukhenūpanisajja pucchāti aññe purise apesetvā upinisīditvā sammukheneva puccha.
atk-s0507a0:2627_2: Labhissāmi atthanti mayā icchitampi atthaṃ labhissāmi.
atk-s0507a0:2628_1: Etañca aññañcāti etaṃ sūle āvutaṃ purisaṃ aññañca yassa rājāṇā paṇihitā, tañca.
atk-s0507a0:2628_3: Ko taṃ vadetha tathā karontanti tathā dhammiyakammaṃ karontaṃ taṃ imasmiṃ vajjiraṭṭhe ko nāma “na pamocehī”ti vadeyya,
atk-s0507a0:2628_4: evaṃ vattuṃ kocipi na labhatīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2630_0: 588. Yakkhassa vacoti petassa vacanaṃ, tassa, bhante, petassa vacanena evamakāsinti dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:2631_1: Dhammānīti pubbe kataṃ pāpakammaṃ abhibhavituṃ samatthe puññadhamme.
atk-s0507a0:2631_2: Kammaṃ siyā aññatra vedanīyanti yaṃ tasmiṃ pāpakamme upapajjavedanīyaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2631_5: taṃ aññatra aparapariyāye vedayitabbaphalaṃ hoti sati saṃsārappavattiyanti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2632_1: Imañcāti attanā vuccamānaṃ tāya āsannaṃ paccakkhaṃ vāti katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2632_3: pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi upetaṃ yuttaṃ uttamaṃ uposathasīlaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2633_1: Sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti sakideva puññaṃ katvā “alamettāvatā”ti aparituṭṭho hutvā aparāparaṃ sucaritaṃ pūrentassa sabbakālaṃ puññaṃ abhivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0507a0:2633_2: aparāparaṃ vā sucaritaṃ pūrentassa puññasaṅkhātaṃ puññaphalaṃ uparūpari vaḍḍhati paripūretīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2634_1: Evaṃ therena vutte rājā apāyadukkhato utrastacitto ratanattaye puññadhamme ca abhivaḍḍhamānapasādo tato
atk-s0507a0:2634_2: paṭṭhāya saraṇāni sīlāni ca samādiyanto “ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ upemī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:2635_2: Vesāliyaṃ aññataro upāsakoti vesāliyaṃ anekasahassesu upāsakesu aññataro upāsako hutvā.
atk-s0507a0:2635_3: Saddhotiādi kalyāṇamittasannissayena tassa purimabhāvato aññādisataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2635_4: Pubbe hi so assaddho kakkhaḷo bhikkhūnaṃ akkosakārako saṅghassa ca anupaṭṭhāko ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:2635_5: Idāni pana saddho muduko hutvā bhikkhusaṅghañca sakkaccaṃ tadā upaṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0507a0:2637_0: Evaṃ raññā petena attanā ca vuttamatthaṃ āyasmā kappitako satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ gato bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:2637_1: Satthā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:2640_3: tasmā tattha aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ gāthāsu ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2643_2: Satthu parinibbānato vassasatadvayassa accayena suraṭṭhavisaye piṅgalo nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:2643_3: Tassa senāpati nandako nāma micchādiṭṭhī viparītadassano “natthi dinna”ntiādinā micchāgāhaṃ paggayha vicari.
atk-s0507a0:2643_4: Tassa dhītā uttarā nāma upāsikā patirūpe kule dinnā ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:2643_5: Nandako pana kālaṃ katvā viñjhāṭaviyaṃ mahati nigrodharukkhe vemānikapeto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:2643_6: Tasmiṃ kālakate uttarā sucisītalagandhodakapūritaṃ pānīyaghaṭaṃ kummāsābhisaṅkhatehi vaṇṇagandharasasampannehi
atk-s0507a0:2643_7: pūvehi paripuṇṇasarāvakañca aññatarassa khīṇāsavattherassa datvā “ayaṃ dakkhiṇā mayhaṃ pitu upakappatū”ti uddisi,
atk-s0507a0:2643_8: tassa tena dānena dibbapānīyaṃ aparimitā ca pūvā pātubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:2643_12: Idāni pana piṅgalo rājā dhammāsokassa rañño ovādaṃ dātuṃ gato,
atk-s0507a0:2643_15: Na cireneva ca piṅgalo rājā dhammāsokassa rañño ovādaṃ datvā paṭinivattanto maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0507a0:2644_0: Atha so peto attano vasanaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ taṃ maggaṃ nimmini.
atk-s0507a0:2644_1: Rājā ṭhitamajjhanhike samaye tena maggena gacchati.
atk-s0507a0:2644_4: Sabbapacchato gacchanto puriso maggaṃ antarahitaṃ disvā bhīto vissaraṃ viravanto dhāvitvā rañño ārocesi,
atk-s0507a0:2644_5: taṃ sutvā rājā bhīto saṃviggamānaso hatthikkhandhe ṭhatvā catasso disā olokento petassa vasananigrodharukkhaṃ
atk-s0507a0:2644_6: disvā tadabhimukho agamāsi saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya.
atk-s0507a0:2644_7: Athānukkamena raññe taṃ ṭhānaṃ patte peto sabbābharaṇavibhūsito rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā pūve ca pānīyañca dāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:2644_8: Rājā saparijano nhatvā pūve khāditvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā paṭippassaddhamaggakilamatho “devatā nusi gandhabbo”tiādinā petaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0507a0:2644_9: Peto ādito paṭṭhāya attano pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā rājānaṃ micchādassanato vimocetvā saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:2650_0: Addasa maggaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ, petānaṃ taṃ vaṇṇupathaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2653_0: Iminā sārathi yāma, suraṭṭhānaṃ santike ito’.
atk-s0507a0:2659_0: Purato dissati maggo, pacchato ca na dissati.
atk-s0507a0:2662_0: Amānuso vāyati gandho, ghoso suyyati dāruṇo’.
atk-s0507a0:2666_0: Purato dissati maggo, pacchato ca na dissati.
atk-s0507a0:2669_0: Amānuso vāyati gandho, ghoso suyyati dāruṇo’.
atk-s0507a0:2681_0: “Tena pāyāsi soraṭṭho, yena so dissate brahā;
atk-s0507a0:2686_0: Pūraṃ pānīyasarakaṃ, pūve vitte ca addasa.
atk-s0507a0:2692_0: Pivatu devo pānīyaṃ, pūve khāda arindama’.
atk-s0507a0:2695_0: Pūve khāditvā pitvā ca, soraṭṭho etadabravi.
atk-s0507a0:2698_0: Ajānantā taṃ pucchāma, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayanti.
atk-s0507a0:2700_0: “Nāmhi devo na gandhabbo, nāpi sakko purindado;
atk-s0507a0:2701_0: Peto ahaṃ mahārāja, suraṭṭhā idha māgatoti.
atk-s0507a0:2704_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, ānubhāvo ayaṃ tavāti.
atk-s0507a0:2707_0: Amaccā pārisajjā ca, brāhmaṇo ca purohito.
atk-s0507a0:2716_0: Natthi ācariyo nāma, adantaṃ ko damessati.
atk-s0507a0:2719_0: Natthi balaṃ vīriyaṃ vā, kuto uṭṭhānaporisaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2724_0: “Natthi mātā pitā bhātā, loko natthi ito paraṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2725_0: Natthi dinnaṃ natthi hutaṃ, sunihitaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0507a0:2728_0: Na koci kañci hanati, sattannaṃ vivaramantare.
atk-s0507a0:2731_0: Yojanānaṃ sataṃ pañca, ko jīvaṃ chettumarahati.
atk-s0507a0:2734_0: Evameva ca so jīvo, nibbeṭhento palāyati.
atk-s0507a0:2737_0: Evameva ca so jīvo, aññaṃ bondiṃ pavisati.
atk-s0507a0:2740_0: Evameva ca so jīvo, aññaṃ bondiṃ pavisati.
atk-s0507a0:2743_0: Ye bālā ye ca paṇḍitā, saṃsāraṃ khepayitvāna;
atk-s0507a0:2747_0: Jino sabbaṃ pajānāti, sammūḷhā itarā pajā.
atk-s0507a0:2765_0: Micchādiṭṭhī ca dussīlā, ye ca ariyūpavādino.
atk-s0507a0:2768_0: Phalaṃ pāpassa kammassa, tasmā socāmahaṃ bhusaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2771_0: Dhītā mayhaṃ mahārāja, uttarā bhaddamatthu te.
atk-s0507a0:2785_0: “Pūraṃ pānīyasarakaṃ, pūve vitte ca sā adā;
atk-s0507a0:2786_0: Pitā me kālakato bhante, tassetaṃ upakappatu.
atk-s0507a0:2793_0: Taṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, saputtadāro arindama.
atk-s0507a0:2796_0: Taṃ dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, saputtadāro arindama.
atk-s0507a0:2798_0: “Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phale ṭhitā;
atk-s0507a0:2800_0: Taṃ saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, saputtadāro arindama.
atk-s0507a0:2803_0: Amajjapo mā ca musā abhāṇi, sakena dārena ca hohi tuṭṭhoti.
atk-s0507a0:2806_0: Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mama.
atk-s0507a0:2812_0: Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho.
atk-s0507a0:2815_0: Vamāmi pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, buddhānaṃ sāsane rato.
atk-s0507a0:2818_0: Namo bhagavato katvā, pāmokkho rathamāruhī”ti. – gāthāyo avocuṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2819_2: suraṭṭhānaṃ adhipati ahūti piṅgalacakkhutāya “piṅgalo”ti pākaṭanāmo suraṭṭhadesassa issaro rājā ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:2819_5: Suraṭṭhaṃ punarāgamāti suraṭṭhassa visayaṃ uddissa suraṭṭhagāmimaggaṃ paccāgañchi.
atk-s0507a0:2820_4: Suraṭṭhānaṃ santike itoti iminā maggena gacchantā mayaṃ suraṭṭhavisayassa samīpeyeva.
atk-s0507a0:2822_2: Amānuso vāyati gandhoti petānaṃ sarīragandho vāyati.
atk-s0507a0:2822_3: Ghoso suyyati dāruṇoti paccekanirayesu kāraṇaṃ kāriyamānānaṃ sattānaṃ ghorataro saddo suyyati.
atk-s0507a0:2823_1: Pādapanti pādasadisehi mūlāvayavehi udakassa pivanato “pādapo”ti laddhanāmaṃ taruṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2824_3: Vitteti vittijanane madhure manuññe tahiṃ tahiṃ sarāve pūretvā ṭhapitapūve addasa.
atk-s0507a0:2825_1: Atho te adurāgatanti ettha athoti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2825_4: atha kho svāgatamevāti mayaṃ sampaṭicchāmāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2826_1: Amaccā pārisajjāti amaccā pārisajjā ca vacanaṃ suṇantu,
atk-s0507a0:2826_2: brāhmaṇo ca tuyhaṃ purohito taṃ suṇātūti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:2828_2: Antarāyakaro ahanti dānaṃ dadantānaṃ upakāraṃ karontānaṃ antarāyakaro hutvā aññesañca paresaṃ dānaṃ dadamānānaṃ
atk-s0507a0:2828_3: dānamayapuññato ahaṃ bahujanaṃ vārayissaṃ vāresinti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:2829_2: Tattha vipāko natthi dānassāti dānaṃ dadato tassa vipāko āyatiṃ pattabbaphalaṃ natthīti vipākaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0507a0:2829_3: Saṃyamassa kuto phalanti sīlassa pana kuto nāma phalaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2829_5: Natthi ācariyo nāmāti ācārasamācārasikkhāpako ācariyo nāma koci natthi.
atk-s0507a0:2829_6: Sabhāvato eva hi sattā dantā vā adantā vā hontīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:2830_1: Samatulyāni bhūtānīti ime sattā sabbepi aññamaññaṃ samasamā,
atk-s0507a0:2830_5: Natthi balanti yamhi attano bale patiṭṭhitā sattā vīriyaṃ katvā manussasobhagyataṃ ādiṃ katvā yāvaarahattaṃ sampattiyo pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0507a0:2830_7: Vīriyaṃ vā natthi kuto uṭṭhānaporisanti idaṃ no purisavīriyena purisakārena pavattanti evaṃ pavattavādapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2831_1: Natthi dānaphalaṃ nāmāti dānassa phalaṃ nāma kiñci natthi,
atk-s0507a0:2831_2: deyyadhammapariccāgo bhasmanihitaṃ viya nipphalo evāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2831_3: Na visodheti verinanti ettha verinanti veravantaṃ verānaṃ vasena pāṇātipātādīnaṃ vasena ca katapāpaṃ puggalaṃ dānasīlādivatato na visodheti,
atk-s0507a0:2831_5: Pubbe “vipāko natthi dānassā”tiādi dānādito attano paresaṃ nivāritākāradassanaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2831_6: “natthi dānaphalaṃ nāmā”tiādi pana atthano micchābhinivesadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2831_9: Ayaṃ satto sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā labhanto niyativipariṇāmavaseneva labhati,
atk-s0507a0:2832_1: Natthi mātā pitā bhātāti mātādīsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0507a0:2832_2: Loko natthi ito paranti ito idhalokato paraloko nāma koci natthi,
atk-s0507a0:2832_8: Na vijjatīti yaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dānaṃ nāma “anugāmikanidhī”ti vadanti,
atk-s0507a0:2833_1: Na koci kañci hanatīti yo puriso paraṃ purisaṃ haneyya,
atk-s0507a0:2833_3: tattha paramatthato na koci kañci hanati,
atk-s0507a0:2833_4: sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ chiddabhāvato hananto viya hoti.
atk-s0507a0:2833_6: Pathavīādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ vivarabhūte antare chidde satthaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0507a0:2833_7: tena sattā asiādīhi pahatā viya honti,
atk-s0507a0:2833_8: jīvo viya pana sesakāyāpi niccasabhāvattā na chijjantīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:2834_1: Acchejjābhejjo hi jīvoti ayaṃ sattānaṃ jīvo satthādīhi na chinditabbo na bhinditabbo niccasabhāvattā.
atk-s0507a0:2834_2: Aṭṭhaṃso guḷaparimaṇḍaloti so pana jīvo kadāci aṭṭhaṃso hoti kadāci guḷaparimaṇḍalo.
atk-s0507a0:2834_3: Yojanānaṃ sataṃ pañcāti kevalībhāvaṃ patto pañcayojanasatubbedho hoti.
atk-s0507a0:2834_4: Ko jīvaṃ chettumarahatīti niccaṃ nibbikāraṃ jīvaṃ ko nāma satthādīhi chindituṃ arahati,
atk-s0507a0:2835_3: Nibbeṭhentaṃ palāyatīti pabbate vā rukkhagge vā ṭhatvā nibbeṭhiyamānaṃ khittaṃ suttaguḷaṃ nibbeṭhentameva gacchati,
atk-s0507a0:2835_5: Evamevanti yathā taṃ suttaguḷaṃ nibbeṭhiyamānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0507a0:2835_7: evameva so jīvo “cullāsīti mahākappino satasahassānī”ti vuttakālameva attabhāvaguḷaṃ nibbeṭhento palāyati pavattati,
atk-s0507a0:2836_1: Evameva ca so jīvoti yathā koci puriso attano nivāsagāmato nikkhamitvā tato aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisati kenacideva karaṇīyena,
atk-s0507a0:2836_2: evameva so jīvo ito sarīrato nikkhamitvā aññaṃ aparaṃ sarīraṃ niyatavasena pavisatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:2837_3: Tattha “ekamhā mahāsarā anotattādito vassasate vassasate kusaggena ekekaṃ udakabinduṃ nīharante iminā
atk-s0507a0:2837_4: upakkamena sattakkhattuṃ tamhi sare nirudake jāte eko mahākappo nāma hotī”ti vatvā “evarūpānaṃ mahākappānaṃ
atk-s0507a0:2837_6: Ye bālā ye ca paṇḍitāti ye andhabālā,
atk-s0507a0:2837_9: Saṃsāraṃ khepayitvānāti yathāvuttakālaparicchedaṃ saṃsāraṃ aparāparuppattivasena khepetvā.
atk-s0507a0:2837_10: Dukkhassantaṃ karissareti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ pariyosānaṃ karissanti.
atk-s0507a0:2837_12: bālāpi tato uddhaṃ nappavattantīti tassa laddhi.
atk-s0507a0:2838_2: doṇehi piṭakehi cāti sattānaṃ sukhadukkhāni nāma doṇehi piṭakehi mānabhājanehi mitāni viya yathāvuttakālaparicchedeneva
atk-s0507a0:2838_3: parimitattā paccekañca tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tāni niyatipariṇāmajāni parimitāni.
atk-s0507a0:2838_4: Tayidaṃ jino sabbaṃ pajānāti jinabhūmiyaṃ ṭhito kevalaṃ pajānāti saṃsārassa samatikkantattā.
atk-s0507a0:2838_5: Saṃsāre pana paribbhamati sammūḷhāyaṃ itarā pajā.
atk-s0507a0:2839_1: Evaṃdiṭṭhi pure āsinti yathāvuttanatthikadiṭṭhiko pubbeva ahaṃ ahosiṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2839_2: Sammūḷho mohapārutoti yathāvuttāya diṭṭhiyā hetubhūtena sammohena sammūḷho,
atk-s0507a0:2840_1: Evaṃ pubbe yā attano uppannā pāpadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0507a0:2840_2: tassā vasena kataṃ pāpakammaṃ dassetvā idāni attanā āyatiṃ anubhavitabbaṃ tassa phalaṃ dassento “oraṃ me chahi māsehī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:2841_5: Ghoso suyyati tāvadeti yadā ettako kālo atikkanto hoti,
atk-s0507a0:2841_6: tāvadeva tasmiṃ kāle “idha paccantānaṃ vo mārisā vassasatasahassaparimāṇo kālo atīto”ti evaṃ tasmiṃ niraye saddo suyyati.
atk-s0507a0:2841_9: niraye paccantānaṃ sattānaṃ āyuno eso lakkho eso paricchedoti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2841_15: tāsaṃ koṭīnaṃ vasena satasahassavassakoṭiyo satabhāgā vassakoṭiyo.
atk-s0507a0:2841_16: Sā ca kho nerayikānaṃyeva vassagaṇanāvasena veditabbā,
atk-s0507a0:2841_22: Yādisena pana pāpena sattā evaṃ nirayesu paccanti,
atk-s0507a0:2842_1: Evaṃ āyatiṃ attanā anubhavitabbaṃ pāpaphalaṃ dassetvā idāni “kena te brahmacariyena,
atk-s0507a0:2842_2: ānubhāvo ayaṃ tavā”ti raññā pucchitamatthaṃ ācikkhitvā taṃ saraṇesu ceva sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetukāmo “taṃ suṇohi mahārājā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:2842_3: Tattha sīlesuposathe ratāti niccasīlesu ca uposathasīlesu ca abhiratā.
atk-s0507a0:2842_5: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ amatapadañca.
atk-s0507a0:2843_1: Evaṃ petena saraṇesu sīlesu ca samādapito rājā pasannamānaso tena attano kataṃ upakāraṃ tāva kittetvā
atk-s0507a0:2843_2: saraṇādīsu patiṭṭhahanto “atthakāmo”tiādikā tisso gāthā vatvā pubbe attanā gahitāya pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā
atk-s0507a0:2844_0: Tattha ophuṇāmi mahāvāteti mahante vāte vāyante bhusaṃ viya taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, yakkha,
atk-s0507a0:2844_2: Nadiyā vā sīghagāmiyāti sīghasotāya mahānadiyā vā tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇakasaṭaṃ viya pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pavāhemīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:2844_3: Vamāmi pāpikaṃ diṭṭhinti mama manomukhagataṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ ucchaḍḍayāmi.
atk-s0507a0:2844_5: Yasmā ekaṃsena amatāvahe buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sāsane rato abhirato,
atk-s0507a0:2844_6: tasmā taṃ diṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ visaṃ vamāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:2845_3: Rathamāruhīti rājā gamanasajjaṃ attano rājarathaṃ abhiruhi,
atk-s0507a0:2845_4: āruyha yakkhānubhāvena taṃ divasameva attano nagaraṃ patvā rājabhavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0507a0:2845_5: So aparena samayena imaṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi,
atk-s0507a0:2848_3: tasmā yadettha aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ gāthāsu ca vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:2848_5: Idañhi nandiyassa devaputtassa vasena vimānavatthupāḷiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropitampi revatīpaṭibaddhāya gāthāya
atk-s0507a0:2851_0: Idaṃ mama ucchuvanaṃ mahantanti idaṃ ucchupetavatthu.
atk-s0507a0:2851_2: Bhagavati veḷuvane viharante aññataro puriso ucchukalāpaṃ khandhe katvā ekaṃ ucchuṃ khādanto gacchati.
atk-s0507a0:2851_3: Atha aññataro upāsako sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo bāladārakena saddhiṃ tassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchati.
atk-s0507a0:2851_5: Upāsako dārakaṃ parodantaṃ disvā taṃ purisaṃ saṅgaṇhanto tena saddhiṃ sallāpamakāsi.
atk-s0507a0:2851_6: So pana puriso tena saddhiṃ na kiñci ālapi,
atk-s0507a0:2851_8: Upāsako taṃ dārakaṃ dassetvā “ayaṃ dārako ativiya rodati,
atk-s0507a0:2851_10: Taṃ sutvā so puriso asahanto paṭihatacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā anādaravasena ekaṃ ucchulaṭṭhiṃ piṭṭhito khipi.
atk-s0507a0:2852_0: So aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā ciraṃ paribhāvitassa lobhassa vasena petesu nibbatti,
atk-s0507a0:2852_1: tassa phalaṃ nāma sakakammasarikkhakaṃ hotīti aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ avattharantaṃ añjanavaṇṇaṃ musaladaṇḍaparimāṇehi
atk-s0507a0:2852_3: Tasmiṃ khāditukāmatāya “ucchuṃ gahessāmī”ti upagatamatte taṃ ucchū abhihananti,
atk-s0507a0:2853_0: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya gacchanto antarāmagge taṃ petaṃ addasa.
atk-s0507a0:2853_1: So theraṃ disvā attanā katakammaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0507a0:2855_0: “Idaṃ mama ucchuvanaṃ mahantaṃ, nibbattati puññaphalaṃ anappakaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2856_0: Taṃ dāni me na paribhogameti, ācikkha bhante kissa ayaṃ vipāko.
atk-s0507a0:2858_0: “Haññāmi khajjāmi ca vāyamāmi, parisakkāmi paribhuñjituṃ kiñci;
atk-s0507a0:2859_0: Svāhaṃ chinnathāmo kapaṇo lālapāmi, kissa kammassa ayaṃ vipāko.
atk-s0507a0:2866_0: “Chāto kilanto ca pipāsito ca, santassito sātasukhaṃ na vinde;
atk-s0507a0:2867_0: Pucchāmi taṃ etamatthaṃ bhadante, kathaṃ nu ucchuparibhogaṃ labheyya”nti.
atk-s0507a0:2869_0: “Pure tuvaṃ kammamakāsi attanā, manussabhūto purimāya jātiyā;
atk-s0507a0:2870_0: Ahañca taṃ etamatthaṃ vadāmi, sutvāna tvaṃ etamatthaṃ vijāna.
atk-s0507a0:2872_0: “Ucchuṃ tuvaṃ khādamāno payāto, puriso ca te piṭṭhito anvagacchi;
atk-s0507a0:2873_0: So ca taṃ paccāsanto kathesi, tassa tuvaṃ na kiñci ālapittha.
atk-s0507a0:2875_0: “So ca taṃ abhaṇantaṃ ayāci, dehayya ucchunti ca taṃ avoca;
atk-s0507a0:2876_0: Tassa tuvaṃ piṭṭhito ucchuṃ adāsi, tassetaṃ kammassa ayaṃ vipāko.
atk-s0507a0:2878_0: “Iṅgha tvaṃ gantvāna piṭṭhito gaṇheyyāsi, gahetvāna taṃ khādassu yāvadatthaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2879_0: Teneva tvaṃ attamano bhavissasi, haṭṭho cudaggo ca pamodito cāti.
atk-s0507a0:2881_0: “Gantvāna so piṭṭhito aggahesi, gahetvāna taṃ khādi yāvadatthaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2882_0: Teneva so attamano ahosi, haṭṭho cudaggo ca pamodito cā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2884_7: asipattasadisehi nisitehi khādantehi viya ucchupattehi kantiyāmīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2885_3: Paripatāmi chamāyanti ṭhātuṃ asakkonto bhūmiyaṃ papatāmi.
atk-s0507a0:2886_11: Piṭṭhito gaṇheyyāsīti attano piṭṭhipasseneva ucchuṃ gaṇheyyāsi.
atk-s0507a0:2887_1: Gahetvāna taṃ khādi yāvadatthanti therena āṇattiniyāmena ucchuṃ gahetvā yathāruci khāditvā mahantaṃ ucchukalāpaṃ gahetvā therassa upanesi,
atk-s0507a0:2887_2: thero taṃ anuggaṇhanto teneva taṃ ucchukalāpaṃ gāhāpetvā veḷuvanaṃ gantvā bhagavato adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:2887_3: bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ taṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0507a0:2888_0: So aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajji.
atk-s0507a0:2888_1: Sā panesā petassa pavatti manussaloke pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:2888_2: Atha manussā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:2888_3: Satthā tesaṃ tamatthaṃ vitthārato kathetvā dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:2888_4: taṃ sutvā manussā maccheramalato paṭiviratā ahesunti.
atk-s0507a0:2891_0: Sāvatthi nāma nagaranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve pete ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:2891_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira kosalarañño dve puttā pāsādikā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā yobbanamadamattā paradārakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0507a0:2891_2: kālaṃ katvā parikhāpiṭṭhe petā hutvā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:2891_4: Manussā taṃ sutvā bhītatasitā “evaṃ kate idaṃ avamaṅgalaṃ vūpasammatī”ti buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0507a0:2891_5: mahādānaṃ datvā taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2891_6: Bhagavā “upāsakā tassa saddassa savanena tumhākaṃ na koci antarāyo”ti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ ācikkhitvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ –
atk-s0507a0:2894_0: Tattha āsuṃ dve kumārā, rājaputtāti me sutaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2899_0: “Te cutā ca manussattā, paralokaṃ ito gatā;
atk-s0507a0:2903_0: Nāsakkhimhā ca attānaṃ, parittaṃ kātuṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2905_0: “Kiṃ tato pāpakaṃ assa, yaṃ no rājakulā cutā;
atk-s0507a0:2913_0: Kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatī”ti – gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0507a0:2914_1: Tattha iti me sutanti na kevalaṃ attano ñāṇena diṭṭhameva,
atk-s0507a0:2914_2: atha kho loke pākaṭabhāvena evaṃ mayā sutanti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2915_2: Paccuppannasukhe giddhāti vattamānasukhamatte giddhā gathitā hutvā.
atk-s0507a0:2915_3: Na te passiṃsunāgatanti duccaritaṃ pahāya sucaritaṃ caritvā anāgataṃ āyatiṃ devamanussesu laddhabbaṃ sukhaṃ te na cintesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2916_1: Tedha ghosentyadissantāti te pubbe rājaputtabhūtā petā idha sāvatthiyā samīpe adissamānarūpā ghosenti kandanti.
atk-s0507a0:2917_1: Idāni tesaṃ kandanassa kāraṇaṃ hetuto ca phalato ca vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “bahūsu vata santesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2918_0: Tattha bahūsu vata santesūti anekesu dakkhiṇeyyesu vijjamānesu.
atk-s0507a0:2918_1: Deyyadhamme upaṭṭhiteti attano santake dātabbadeyyadhammepi samīpe ṭhite,
atk-s0507a0:2918_3: Parittaṃ sukhāvahanti appamattakampi āyatiṃ sukhāvahaṃ puññaṃ katvā attānaṃ sotthiṃ nirupaddavaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhimhā vatāti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:2919_1: Kiṃ tato pāpakaṃ assāti tato pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ nāma kiṃ aññaṃ assa siyā.
atk-s0507a0:2919_2: Yaṃ no rājakulā cutāti yena pāpakammena mayaṃ rājakulato cutā idha pettivisayaṃ upapannā petesu nibbattā khuppipāsasamappitā vicarāmāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:2920_1: Sāmino idha hutvānāti idha imasmiṃ loke yasmiṃyeva ṭhāne pubbe sāmino hutvā vicaranti,
atk-s0507a0:2920_3: Manussā unnatonatāti manussakāle sāmino hutvā kālakatā kammavasena onatā bhamanti khuppipāsāya,
atk-s0507a0:2921_2: issaramadasambhavanti etaṃ issariyamadavasena sambhūtaṃ apāyūpapattisaṅkhātaṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā pahāya issariyamadaṃ puññappasuto hutvā.
atk-s0507a0:2921_3: Bhave saggagato naroti saggaṃ devalokaṃ gatoyeva bhaveyya.
atk-s0507a0:2922_0: Iti satthā tesaṃ petānaṃ pavattiṃ kathetvā tehi manussehi kataṃ dānaṃ tesaṃ petānaṃ uddisāpetvā sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:2925_0: Pubbe katānaṃ kammānanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājaputtapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:2925_1: Tattha yo so atīte kitavassa nāma rañño putto atīte paccekabuddhe aparajjhitvā bahūni vassasahassāni
atk-s0507a0:2925_2: niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena petesu uppanno.
atk-s0507a0:2925_4: Tassa vatthu heṭṭhā sāṇavāsipetavatthumhi vitthārato āgatameva,
atk-s0507a0:2925_6: Satthā hi tadā therena attano ñātipetānaṃ pavattiyā kathitāya “na kevalaṃ tava ñātakāyeva,
atk-s0507a0:2925_7: atha kho tvampi ito anantarātīte attabhāve peto hutvā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavī”ti vatvā tena yācito –
atk-s0507a0:2928_0: Rūpe sadde rase gandhe, phoṭṭhabbe ca manorame.
atk-s0507a0:2937_0: Tassa pattaṃ gahetvāna, uccaṃ paggayha khattiyo.
atk-s0507a0:2940_0: Rañño kitavassāhaṃ putto, kiṃ maṃ bhikkhu karissasi.
atk-s0507a0:2949_0: Uddhaṃpādo ṭhito ceva, ciraṃ bālo apaccatha.
atk-s0507a0:2958_0: Khuppipāsahato nāma, peto āsi tato cuto.
atk-s0507a0:2964_0: Kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:2966_2: vipāko mathaye mananti purimāsu jātīsu katānaṃ akusalakammānaṃ phalaṃ uḷāraṃ hutvā uppajjamānaṃ andhabālānaṃ cittaṃ mathayeyya abhibhaveyya,
atk-s0507a0:2966_3: paresaṃ anatthakaraṇamukhena attano atthaṃ uppādeyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0507a0:2967_0: Idāni taṃ cittamathanaṃ visayena saddhiṃ dassetuṃ “rūpe sadde”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2968_1: Evaṃ sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ asādhāraṇato niyametvā dassento “naccaṃ gīta”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0507a0:2969_5: Uñche pattagate ratanti uñchena bhikkhācārena laddhe pattagate pattapariyāpanne āhāre rataṃ santuṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2970_3: Uccaṃ paggayhāti uccataraṃ katvā pattaṃ ukkhipitvā.
atk-s0507a0:2971_1: Thaṇḍile pattaṃ bhinditvāti kharakaṭhine bhūmippadese khipanto pattaṃ bhinditvā.
atk-s0507a0:2971_3: Apasakkanto ca “akāraṇeneva andhabālo mahantaṃ anatthaṃ attano akāsī”ti karuṇāyanavasena olokentaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0507a0:2972_0: 758. Pharusassāti dāruṇassa. Kaṭukoti aniṭṭho. Yanti yaṃ vipākaṃ. Samappitoti allīno.
atk-s0507a0:2973_2: vassāni nahutāni cāti uttāno nipanno caturāsītivassasahassāni, nikujjo,
atk-s0507a0:2973_6: yathāṭhito cāti evaṃ cha caturāsītisahassāni vassāni honti. Tenāha –
atk-s0507a0:2976_0: Uddhaṃpādo ṭhito ceva, ciraṃ bālo apaccathā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:2977_0: Tāni pana vassāni yasmā anekāni nahutāni honti,
atk-s0507a0:2977_2: Bhusaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchitthoti ativiya dukkhaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0507a0:2978_0: 761. Pūgānīti vassasamūhe, idha purimagāthāya ca accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2979_4: Appaduṭṭhappadosinaṃ isiṃ subbataṃ āsajja āsādetvā pāpakammantā puggalā evarūpaṃ kaṭukaṃ ativiya dukkhaṃ paccantīti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:2981_0: Evaṃ bhagavā rājaputtapetakathāya tattha sannipatitaṃ mahājanaṃ saṃvejetvā upari saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0507a0:2984_0: Gūthakūpato uggantvāti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante ekaṃ gūthakhādakapetaṃ ārambha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:2984_1: Sāvatthiyā kira avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmake eko kuṭumbiko attano kulūpakaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa vihāraṃ kāresi.
atk-s0507a0:2984_3: Te disvā manussā pasannacittā paṇītena paccayena upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:2984_4: Kulūpako bhikkhu taṃ asahamāno issāpakato hutvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dosaṃ vadanto kuṭumbikaṃ ujjhāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:2984_5: Kuṭumbiko te bhikkhū kulūpakañca paribhavanto paribhāsi.
atk-s0507a0:2984_6: Atha kulūpako kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva vihāre vaccakuṭiyaṃ peto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0507a0:2984_7: kuṭumbiko pana kālaṃ katvā tasseva upari peto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:2987_0: Nissaṃsayaṃ pāpakammanto, kiṃ nu saddahase tuva”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:2992_0: Gāthāya attānaṃ ācikkhi. Atha naṃ thero –
atk-s0507a0:2994_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:2996_0: Gāthāya tena katakammaṃ pucchi. So peto –
atk-s0507a0:3004_1: Tattha ahu āvāsiko mayhanti mayhaṃ āvāse mayā katavihāre eko bhikkhu āvāsiko nibaddhavasanako ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:3004_2: Ajjhāsito mayhaṃ ghareti kulūpakabhāvena mama gehe taṇhābhinivesavasena abhiniviṭṭho.
atk-s0507a0:3005_4: Petalokaṃ ito gatoti iminā ākārena petayoniṃ upagato petabhūto.
atk-s0507a0:3006_0: Taṃ sutvā thero itarassa gatiṃ pucchanto –
atk-s0507a0:3009_0: Kāyassa bhedā duppañño, kiṃ nu pecca gatiṃ gato”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:3014_0: So ca paravisayaṃ patto, mameva paricārako.
atk-s0507a0:3016_0: “Yaṃ bhadante hadantaññe, etaṃ me hoti bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:3017_0: Ahañca kho yaṃ hadāmi, etaṃ so upajīvatī”ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0507a0:3018_1: Tattha tassevāti tasseva mayhaṃ pubbe kulūpakabhikkhubhūtassa petassa.
atk-s0507a0:3018_6: Paravisayaṃ pattoti manussalokaṃ upādāya paravisayabhūtaṃ pettivisayaṃ patto.
atk-s0507a0:3018_7: Mamevāti mayhaṃ eva paricārako ahosīti vacanaseso.
atk-s0507a0:3019_3: tassaṃ vaccakuṭiyaṃ yaṃ aññe uhadanti vaccaṃ ossajanti.
atk-s0507a0:3019_4: Etaṃ me hoti bhojananti etaṃ vaccaṃ mayhaṃ divase divase bhojanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0507a0:3019_5: Yaṃ hadāmīti taṃ pana vaccaṃ khāditvā yampahaṃ vaccaṃ karomi.
atk-s0507a0:3019_6: Etaṃ so upajīvatīti etaṃ mama vaccaṃ so kulūpakapeto divase divase khādanavasena upajīvati,
atk-s0507a0:3020_0: Tesu kuṭumbiko pesale bhikkhū “evaṃ āhāraparibhogato varaṃ tumhākaṃ gūthakhādana”nti akkosi.
atk-s0507a0:3020_1: Kulūpako pana kuṭumbikampi tathāvacane samādapetvā sayaṃ tathā akkosi,
atk-s0507a0:3020_3: Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:3020_4: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā upavāde ādīnavaṃ dassetvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:3023_1: Gūthakūpato uggantvāti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante aññataraṃ gūthakhādakapetiṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3023_3: Tattha upāsakena vihāro kāritoti upāsakassa vasena āgataṃ,
atk-s0507a0:3023_5: Sesaṃ vatthusmiṃ gāthāsu ca apubbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0507a0:3026_0: Naggā dubbaṇṇarūpātthāti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante sambahule pete ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3026_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira sambahulā manussā gaṇabhūtā assaddhā appasannā maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitacittā dānādisucaritavimukhā
atk-s0507a0:3026_2: hutvā ciraṃ jīvitvā kāyassa bhedā nagarassa samīpe petayoniyaṃ nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:3026_3: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya gacchanto antarāmagge pete disvā –
atk-s0507a0:3029_0: Upphāsulikā kisikā, ke nu tumhettha mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:3030_2: Ke nu tumhetthāti tumhe ke nu nāma bhavatha.
atk-s0507a0:3035_0: Gāthāya attano petabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā puna therena –
atk-s0507a0:3037_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:3048_0: Etañca bhante arahāma, aññañca pāpakaṃ tato.
atk-s0507a0:3057_0: Uraṃ sīsañca ghaṭṭema, aho no appapuññatā.
atk-s0507a0:3062_0: “Te hi nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
atk-s0507a0:3065_1: Tattha api yojanāni gacchāmāti anekānipi yojanāni gacchāma. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0507a0:3065_3: cirakālaṃ jighacchāya jighacchitā āhāre giddhā abhigijjhantā hutvā,
atk-s0507a0:3065_4: evaṃ gantvāpi kiñci āhāraṃ aladdhāyeva nivattāma.
atk-s0507a0:3066_1: Uttānā paṭikirāmāti kadāci uttānā hutvā vikiriyamānaṅgapaccaṅgā viya vattāma.
atk-s0507a0:3066_2: Avakujjā patāmaseti kadāci avakujjā hutvā patāma.
atk-s0507a0:3067_2: Uraṃ sīsañca ghaṭṭemāti avakujjā hutvā patitā uṭṭhātuṃ asakkontā vedhantā vedanāppattā attano attano uraṃ sīsañca paṭighaṃsāma.
atk-s0507a0:3068_1: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:3068_2: Taṃ sutvā mahājano maccheramalaṃ pahāya dānādisucaritanirato ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:3071_0: Diṭṭhā tayā nirayā tiracchānayonīti idaṃ satthari jetavane viharante aññataraṃ vimānapetaṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3071_1: Sāvatthivāsino kira pāṭaliputtavāsino ca bahū vāṇijā nāvāya suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:3071_2: Tattheko upāsako ābādhiko mātugāme paṭibaddhacitto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0507a0:3071_3: So katakusalopi devalokaṃ anupapajjitvā itthiyā paṭibaddhacittatāya samuddamajjhe vimānapeto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:3071_5: sā itthī suvaṇṇabhūmigāminiṃ nāvaṃ abhiruyha gacchati.
atk-s0507a0:3071_6: Atha kho so peto taṃ itthiṃ gahetukāmo nāvāya gamanaṃ uparundhi.
atk-s0507a0:3071_7: Atha vāṇijā “kena nu kho kāraṇena ayaṃ nāvā na gacchatī”ti vīmaṃsantā kāḷakaṇṇisalākaṃ vicāresuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3071_8: Amanussiddhiyā yāvatatiyaṃ tassā eva itthiyā pāpuṇi,
atk-s0507a0:3071_10: Taṃ disvā vāṇijā veḷukalāpaṃ samudde otāretvā tassa upari taṃ itthiṃ otāresuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3071_11: Itthiyā otāritamattāya nāvā vegena suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ abhimukhā pāyāsi.
atk-s0507a0:3071_12: Amanusso taṃ itthiṃ attano vimānaṃ āropetvā tāya saddhiṃ abhirami.
atk-s0507a0:3072_0: Sā ekaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ atikkamitvā nibbinnarūpā taṃ petaṃ yācantī āha –
atk-s0507a0:3072_1: “ahaṃ idha vasantī mayhaṃ samparāyikaṃ atthaṃ kātuṃ na labhāmi, sādhu, mārisa,
atk-s0507a0:3074_0: “Diṭṭhā tayā nirayā tiracchānayoni, petā asurā athavāpi mānusā devā;
atk-s0507a0:3077_1: Tattha diṭṭhā tayā nirayāti ekacce paccekanirayāpi tayā diṭṭhā.
atk-s0507a0:3077_2: Tiracchānayonīti mahānubhāvā nāgasupaṇṇāditiracchānāpi diṭṭhā tayāti yojanā.
atk-s0507a0:3077_6: So kira attano ānubhāvena antarantarā taṃ gahetvā paccekanirayādike dassento vicarati,
atk-s0507a0:3077_8: Sayamaddasa kammavipākamattanoti nirayādike visesato gantvā passantī sayameva attanā katakammānaṃ vipākaṃ paccakkhato addasa adakkhi.
atk-s0507a0:3077_9: Nessāmi taṃ pāṭaliputtamakkhatanti idānāhaṃ taṃ akkhataṃ kenaci aparikkhataṃ manussarūpeneva pāṭaliputtaṃ nayissāmi.
atk-s0507a0:3077_10: Tvaṃ pana tattha gantvā kusalaṃ karohi kammaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:3077_11: kammavipākassa paccakkhato diṭṭhattā yuttapayuttā puññaniratā hohīti attho.
atk-s0507a0:3078_0: Atha sā itthī tassa vacanaṃ sutvā attamanā –
atk-s0507a0:3081_0: Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mama.
atk-s0507a0:3083_0: “Diṭṭhā mayā nirayā tiracchānayoni, petā asurā athavāpi mānusā devā;
atk-s0507a0:3086_0: Atha so peto taṃ itthiṃ gahetvā ākāsena gantvā pāṭaliputtanagarassa majjhe ṭhapetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0507a0:3086_1: Athassā ñātimittādayo taṃ disvā “mayaṃ pubbe samudde pakkhittā matāti assumha.
atk-s0507a0:3086_3: sotthinā āgatā”ti abhinandamānā samāgantvā tassā pavattiṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:3086_4: Sā tesaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya attanā diṭṭhaṃ anubhūtañca sabbaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:3086_5: Sāvatthivāsinopi kho te vāṇijā anukkamena sāvatthiṃ upagatakāle satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0507a0:3086_6: ekamantaṃ nisinnā taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3086_7: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā catunnaṃ parisānaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:3086_8: Taṃ sutvā mahājano saṃvegajāto dānādikusaladhammanirato ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:3089_0: Ayañca te pokkharaṇī surammāti idaṃ satthari sāvatthiyaṃ viharante ambapetaṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3089_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññataro gahapati parikkhīṇabhogo ahosi.
atk-s0507a0:3089_4: So taṃ attano mittassa gehe ṭhapetvā iṇavasena gahitena kahāpaṇasatena bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā satthena saddhiṃ vaṇijjāya gato,
atk-s0507a0:3089_5: na cireneva mūlena saha udayabhūtāni pañca kahāpaṇasatāni labhitvā satthena saha paṭinivatti.
atk-s0507a0:3089_8: So pana gahapati aññatarasmiṃ gacche kahāpaṇe nikkhipitvā avidūre nilīyi.
atk-s0507a0:3089_10: So dhanalobhena tattheva peto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:3090_0: Vāṇijā sāvatthiṃ gantvā tassa dhītuyā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3090_1: Sā pitu maraṇena ājīvikābhayena ca ativiya sañjātadomanassā bāḷhaṃ paridevi.
atk-s0507a0:3090_2: Atha naṃ so pitu sahāyo kuṭumbiko “yathā nāma kulālabhājanaṃ sabbaṃ bhedanapariyantaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:3090_5: tasmā mā tvaṃ pitari atibāḷhaṃ soci,
atk-s0507a0:3090_10: tvaṃ pituno gehe viya imasmiṃ gehe avimanā abhiramassū”ti vatvā samassāsesi.
atk-s0507a0:3090_11: Sā tassa vacanena paṭippassaddhasokā pitari viya tasmiṃ sañjātagāravabahumānā attano kapaṇabhāvena tassa
atk-s0507a0:3090_12: veyyāvaccakārinī hutvā vattamānā pitaraṃ uddissa matakiccaṃ kātukāmā yāguṃ pacitvā manosilāvaṇṇāni suparipakkāni
atk-s0507a0:3090_13: madhurāni ambaphalāni kaṃsapātiyaṃ ṭhapetvā yāguṃ ambaphalāni ca dāsiyā gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0507a0:3090_16: Satthā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso tassā manorathaṃ pūrento nisajjākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:3090_17: Sā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā paññattavarabuddhāsane attanā upanītaṃ suvisuddhavatthaṃ attharitvā adāsi,
atk-s0507a0:3091_2: Atha saṅghaṃ uddissa bhikkhūnampi yāguṃ datvā puna dhotahatthā ambaphalāni bhagavato upanāmesi,
atk-s0507a0:3091_4: Sā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā evamāha – “yā me, bhante,
atk-s0507a0:3091_8: Sā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0507a0:3091_9: Tāya dakkhiṇāya samuddiṭṭhamattāya so peto ambavanauyyānavimānakapparukkhapokkharaṇiyo mahatiñca dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0507a0:3092_0: Atha te vāṇijā aparena samayena vaṇijjāya gacchantā tameva maggaṃ paṭipannā pubbe vasitaṭṭhāne ekarattiṃ vāsaṃ kappesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3092_1: Te disvā so vimānapeto uyyānavimānādīhi saddhiṃ tesaṃ attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0507a0:3092_2: Te vāṇijā taṃ disvā tena laddhasampattiṃ pucchantā –
atk-s0507a0:3094_0: “Ayañca te pokkharaṇī surammā, samā sutitthā ca mahodakā ca;
atk-s0507a0:3095_0: Supupphitā bhamaragaṇānukiṇṇā, kathaṃ tayā laddhā ayaṃ manuññā.
atk-s0507a0:3097_0: “Idañca te ambavanaṃ surammaṃ, sabbotukaṃ dhārayate phalāni;
atk-s0507a0:3098_0: Supupphitaṃ bhamaragaṇānukiṇṇaṃ, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:3102_0: Taṃ sutvā peto pokkharaṇiādīnaṃ paṭilābhakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0507a0:3105_0: Dhītāya dinnadānena, tena me idha labbhatī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:3106_1: Tattha tena me idha labbhatīti yaṃ taṃ bhagavato bhikkhūnañca ambapakkaṃ udakaṃ yāguñca mamaṃ uddissa dentiyā mayhaṃ dhītāya dinnaṃ dānaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:3106_2: tena me dhītāya dinnadānena idha imasmiṃ dibbe ambavane sabbotukaṃ ambapakkaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:3106_3: imissā dibbāya manuññāya pokkharaṇiyā dibbaṃ udakaṃ,
atk-s0507a0:3106_4: yāguyā attharaṇassa ca dānena uyyānavimānakapparukkhādīsu sītacchāyā manoramā idha labbhati,
atk-s0507a0:3107_0: Evañca pana vatvā so peto te vāṇije netvā tāni pañca kahāpaṇasatāni dassetvā “ito upaḍḍhaṃ tumhe gaṇhatha,
atk-s0507a0:3107_1: upaḍḍhaṃ mayā gahitaṃ iṇaṃ sodhetvā sukhena jīvatūti mayhaṃ dhītāya dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0507a0:3107_2: Vāṇijā anukkamena sāvatthiṃ patvā tassa dhītāya kathetvā tena attano dinnabhāgampi tassā eva adaṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:3107_3: Sā kahāpaṇasataṃ dhanikānaṃ datvā itaraṃ attano pitu sahāyassa tassa kuṭumbikassa datvā sayaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karonti nivasati.
atk-s0507a0:3107_4: So “idaṃ sabbaṃ tuyhaṃyeva hotū”ti tassāyeva paṭidatvā taṃ attano jeṭṭhaputtassa gharasāminiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0507a0:3108_0: Sā gacchante kāle ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā taṃ upalālentī –
atk-s0507a0:3110_0: “Sandiṭṭhikaṃ kammaṃ evaṃ passatha, dānassa damassa saṃyamassa vipākaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:3111_0: Dāsī ahaṃ ayyakulesu hutvā, suṇisā homi agārassa issarā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:3113_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā tassā ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā sammukhe ṭhito viya attānaṃ dassetvā –
atk-s0507a0:3116_2: Sā dutiyadivase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:3116_3: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:3119_0: Yaṃ dadāti na taṃ hotīti idaṃ akkhadāyakapetavatthu.
atk-s0507a0:3119_2: Bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ viharante aññataro sāvatthivāsī upāsako sakaṭehi bhaṇḍassa pūretvā vaṇijjāya videsaṃ
atk-s0507a0:3119_3: gantvā tattha attano bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā paṭibhaṇḍaṃ sakaṭesu āropetvā sāvatthiṃ uddissa maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0507a0:3119_4: Tassa maggaṃ gacchantassa aṭaviyaṃ ekassa sakaṭassa akkho bhijji.
atk-s0507a0:3119_5: Atha aññataro puriso rukkhagahaṇatthaṃ kuṭhāripharasuṃ gāhāpetvā attano gāmato nikkhamitvā araññe vicaranto
atk-s0507a0:3119_6: taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā taṃ upāsakaṃ akkhabhañjanena domanassappattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ vāṇijo akkhabhañjanena aṭaviyaṃ
atk-s0507a0:3119_7: kilamatī”ti anukampaṃ upādāya rukkhadaṇḍaṃ chinditvā daḷhaṃ akkhaṃ katvā sakaṭe yojetvā adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:3120_0: So aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva aṭavipadese bhummadevatā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0507a0:3120_1: Attano kammaṃ paccavekkhitvā rattiyaṃ tassa upāsakassa gehaṃ gantvā gehadvāre ṭhatvā –
atk-s0507a0:3122_0: “Yaṃ dadāti na taṃ hoti, detheva dānaṃ datvā ubhayaṃ tarati;
atk-s0507a0:3123_0: Ubhayaṃ tena dānena gacchati, jāgaratha mā pamajjathā”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:3124_1: Tattha yaṃ dadāti na taṃ hotīti yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dāyako deti,
atk-s0507a0:3124_2: na tadeva paraloke tassa dānassa phalabhāvena hoti,
atk-s0507a0:3124_3: atha kho aññaṃ bahuṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ phalaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-s0507a0:3124_4: Tasmā detheva dānanti yathā tathā dānaṃ detha eva.
atk-s0507a0:3124_6: dānaṃ datvā diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi dukkhaṃ anatthañca atikkamati.
atk-s0507a0:3124_7: Ubhayaṃ tena dānena gacchatīti diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañcāti ubhayampi sukhaṃ tena dānena upagacchati pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0507a0:3124_9: Jāgaratha mā pamajjathāti evaṃ ubhayānatthanivāraṇaṃ ubhayahitasādhanaṃ dānaṃ sampādetuṃ jāgaratha,
atk-s0507a0:3124_10: dānūpakaraṇāni sajjetvā tattha ca appamattā hothāti attho.
atk-s0507a0:3125_0: Vāṇijo attano kiccaṃ tīretvā paṭinivattitvā anukkamena sāvatthiṃ patvā dutiyadivase satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0507a0:3125_1: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:3125_2: Satthā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0507a0:3128_2: Bhagavati veḷuvane viharante rājagahe kira catasso itthiyo mānakūṭādivasena sappimadhuteladhaññādīhi vohāraṃ katvā ayoniso bhoge saṃharitvā jīvanti.
atk-s0507a0:3128_3: Tā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā bahinagare parikhāpiṭṭhe petiyo hutvā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:3131_0: Te aññe paribhuñjanti, mayaṃ dukkhassa bhāginī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:3132_1: Manussā taṃ sutvā bhītatasitā vibhātāya rattiyā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ sajjetvā
atk-s0507a0:3132_2: satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca nimantetvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisitvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ
atk-s0507a0:3132_4: Bhagavā “upāsakā tena vo saddena koci antarāyo natthi,
atk-s0507a0:3132_5: catasso pana petiyo dukkhābhibhūtā attanā dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ kathetvā paridevanavasena vissarena viravantiyo –
atk-s0507a0:3134_0: Te aññe paribhuñjanti, mayaṃ dukkhassa bhāginī”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:3136_0: Tattha bhogeti paribhuñjitabbaṭṭhena “bhogā”ti laddhanāme vatthābharaṇādike vittūpakaraṇavisese.
atk-s0507a0:3136_1: Saṃharimhāti maccheramalena pariyādinnacittā kassaci kiñci adatvā sañcinimha.
atk-s0507a0:3136_2: Samena visamena cāti ñāyena ca aññāyena ca,
atk-s0507a0:3136_3: ñāyapatirūpakena vā aññāyena te bhoge amhehi saṃharite idāni aññe paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0507a0:3136_4: Mayaṃ dukkhassa bhāginīti mayaṃ pana kassacipi sucaritassa akatattā duccaritassa ca katattā etarahi petayonipariyāpannassa
atk-s0507a0:3137_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tāhi petīhi vuttaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā tāsaṃ pavattiṃ kathetvā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desetvā upari saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0507a0:3140_3: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo alaṅkatappaṭiyatto hatthikkhandhavaragato mahatiyā rājiddhiyā
atk-s0507a0:3140_4: mahantena rājānubhāvena nagaraṃ anusañcaranto aññatarasmiṃ gehe uparipāsāde vātapānaṃ vivaritvā taṃ rājavibhūtiṃ
atk-s0507a0:3140_5: olokentiṃ rūpasampattiyā devaccharāpaṭibhāgaṃ ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā adiṭṭhapubbe ārammaṇe sahasā samuppannena
atk-s0507a0:3140_6: kilesasamudācārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto satipi kularūpācārādiguṇavisesasampanne antepurajane sabhāvalahukassa
atk-s0507a0:3140_7: pana duddamassa cittassa vasena tassaṃ itthiyaṃ paṭibaddhamānaso hutvā pacchāsane nisinnassa purisassa
atk-s0507a0:3140_8: “imaṃ pāsādaṃ imañca itthiṃ upadhārehī”ti saññaṃ datvā rājagehaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0507a0:3141_1: idha puriso sūriye anatthaṅgateyeva āgantvā nagaradvāre thakite attanā ānītaṃ aruṇavaṇṇamattikaṃ uppalāni
atk-s0507a0:3141_2: ca nagaradvārakavāṭe laggetvā nipajjituṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0507a0:3141_3: Rājā pana sirisayane vāsūpagato majjhimayāme sa- iti na- iti du- iti so-
atk-s0507a0:3141_4: iti ca imāni cattāri akkharāni mahatā kaṇṭhena uccāritāni viya vissaravasena assosi.
atk-s0507a0:3141_5: Tāni kira atīte kāle sāvatthivāsīhi catūhi seṭṭhiputtehi bhogamadamattehi yobbanakāle pāradārikakammavasena
atk-s0507a0:3141_6: bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavetvā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tasseva nagarassa samīpe lohakumbhiyaṃ nibbattitvā paccamānehi
atk-s0507a0:3141_7: lohakumbhiyā mukhavaṭṭiṃ patvā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ vatthukāmehi uccāritānaṃ tāsaṃ gāthānaṃ ādiakkharāni,
atk-s0507a0:3141_8: te paṭhamakkharameva vatvā vedanāppattā hutvā lohakumbhiṃ otariṃsu.
atk-s0507a0:3142_0: Rājā pana taṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhītatasito saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto taṃ rattāvasesaṃ dukkhena vītināmetvā
atk-s0507a0:3142_1: vibhātāya rattiyā purohitaṃ pakkosāpetvā taṃ pavattiṃ kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:3142_2: Purohito rājānaṃ bhītatasitaṃ ñatvā lābhagiddho “uppanno kho ayaṃ mayhaṃ brāhmaṇānañca lābhuppādanupāyo”ti cintetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0507a0:3142_5: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā amacce āṇāpesi “sabbacatukkayaññassa upakaraṇāni sajjethā”ti.

atk-s0507a0:3147_0: “Natthi anto kuto anto, na anto paṭidissati;
atk-s0507a0:3148_0: Tathā hi pakataṃ pāpaṃ, tuyhaṃ mayhañca mārisā.
atk-s0507a0:3153_0: “Sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
atk-s0507a0:3156_2: Tasmiṃ kira lohakumbhiniraye nibbattasatto adho ogacchanto tiṃsāya vassasahassehi heṭṭhimatalaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0507a0:3156_3: tato uddhaṃ uggacchantopi tiṃsāya eva vassasahassehi mukhavaṭṭipadesaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0507a0:3156_6: iti vatvā adhimattavedanāppatto hutvā adhomukho pati.
atk-s0507a0:3156_7: Bhagavā pana taṃ rañño paripuṇṇaṃ katvā kathesi.
atk-s0507a0:3156_9: Tattha kadā anto bhavissatīti lohakumbhiniraye paccamānānaṃ amhākaṃ kadā nu kho imassa dukkhassa anto pariyosānaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0507a0:3157_1: Tathā hīti yathā tuyhaṃ mayhañca imassa dukkhassa natthi anto,
atk-s0507a0:3157_3: tathā tena pakārena pāpakaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ tayā mayā cāti vibhattiṃ vipariṇāmetvā vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3158_2: Ye santeti ye mayaṃ sante vijjamāne deyyadhamme.
atk-s0507a0:3159_5: Yoniṃ laddhāna mānusinti manussayoniṃ manussattabhāvaṃ labhitvā.
atk-s0507a0:3159_9: Kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahunti pubbe viya pamādaṃ anāpajjitvā bahuṃ pahūtaṃ kusalaṃ puññakammaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0507a0:3160_0: Satthā imā gāthāyo vatvā vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:3160_2: Rājā sañjātasaṃvego parapariggahe abhijjhaṃ pahāya sadārasantuṭṭho ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:3163_0: Kiṃ nu ummattarūpovāti idaṃ satthari veḷuvane viharante aññataraṃ petaṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3163_1: Atīte kira bārāṇasinagare aññataro pīṭhasappī sālittakapayoge kusalo,
atk-s0507a0:3163_2: tahiṃ sakkharakhipanasippe nipphattiṃ gato nagaradvāre nigrodharukkhamūle nisīditvā sakkharapahārehi
atk-s0507a0:3163_4: Nagaradārakā attano kīḷanatthāya māyakaḍḍhamāsakādīni datvā yathāruci tāni sippāni kārāpenti.
atk-s0507a0:3164_0: Athekadivasaṃ bārāṇasirājā nagarato nikkhamitvā taṃ nigrodhamūlaṃ upagato nigrodhapattesu hatthirūpādivasena
atk-s0507a0:3164_2: “kena nu kho imesu nigrodhapattesu evaṃ nānāvidharūpavibhattiyo katā”ti?
atk-s0507a0:3164_7: mayā dassitassa ekassa purisassa kathentassa ajānantasseva kucchiyaṃ ajalaṇḍikāhi pūretu”nti? “Sakkā, devā”ti.
atk-s0507a0:3164_8: Rājā taṃ attano rājabhavanaṃ netvā bahubhāṇike purohite nibbinnarūpo purohitaṃ pakkosāpetvā tena saha
atk-s0507a0:3164_9: vivitte okāse sāṇipākāraparikkhitte nisīditvā mantayamāno pīṭhasappiṃ pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:3164_10: Pīṭhasappī nāḷimattā ajalaṇḍikā ādāyāgantvā rañño ākāraṃ ñatvā purohitābhimukho nisinno tena mukhe vivaṭe
atk-s0507a0:3164_11: sāṇipākāravivarena ekekaṃ ajalaṇḍikaṃ tassa galamūle patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:3164_12: So lajjāya uggilituṃ asakkonto sabbā ajjhohari.
atk-s0507a0:3164_13: Atha naṃ rājā ajalaṇḍikāhi pūritodaraṃ vissajji – “gaccha, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0507a0:3164_17: Tassa ca pīṭhasappissa tena kammena attamano hutvā cuddasa gāme adāsi.
atk-s0507a0:3164_18: So gāme labhitvā attānaṃ sukhento pīṇento parijanampi sukhento pīṇento samaṇabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ

atk-s0507a0:3165_0: Atheko puriso tassa santikaṃ upagantvā evamāha – “sādhu, ācariya,
atk-s0507a0:3165_3: So taṃ purisaṃ taṃ sippaṃ sikkhāpesi.
atk-s0507a0:3165_4: So sikkhitasippo sippaṃ vīmaṃsitukāmo gantvā gaṅgātīre nisinnassa sunettassa nāma paccekabuddhassa sakkharābhighātena sīsaṃ bhindi.
atk-s0507a0:3165_6: Manussā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā taṃ purisaṃ tattheva leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharitvā jīvitā voropesuṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3165_7: So kālakato avīcimahāniraye nibbattitvā bahūni vassasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena
atk-s0507a0:3165_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagarassa avidūre peto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:3165_9: Tassa kammassa sarikkhakena vipākena bhavitabbanti kammavegukkhittāni pubbaṇhasamayaṃ majjhanhikasamayaṃ
atk-s0507a0:3166_0: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭapabbatā otaranto taṃ disvā –
atk-s0507a0:3169_0: Nissaṃsayaṃ pāpakammanto, kiṃ nu saddāyase tuva”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:3170_1: Tattha ummattarūpovāti ummattakasabhāvo viya ummādappatto viya.
atk-s0507a0:3170_2: Migo bhantova dhāvasīti bhantamigo viya ito cito ca dhāvasi.
atk-s0507a0:3170_3: So hi tesu ayokūṭesu nipatantesu parittāṇaṃ apassanto “na siyā nu kho evaṃ pahāro”ti itopi ettopi palāyati.
atk-s0507a0:3170_4: Te pana kammavegukkhittā yattha katthaci ṭhitassa matthakeyeva nipatanti.
atk-s0507a0:3170_5: Kiṃ nu saddāyase tuvanti kiṃ nu kho tuvaṃ saddaṃ karosi,
atk-s0507a0:3177_0: Sīse mayhaṃ nipatanti, te bhindanti ca matthaka”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:3178_4: Tassa kira saṭṭhiyā ayokūṭasahassānaṃ patanappahonakaṃ mahantaṃ pabbatakūṭappamāṇaṃ sīsaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0507a0:3178_5: Taṃ tassa vālaggakoṭinitudanamattampi ṭhānaṃ asesetvā tāni kūṭāni patantāni matthakaṃ bhindanti,
atk-s0507a0:3181_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0507a0:3185_0: Sīse tuyhaṃ nipatanti, te bhindanti ca matthaka”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:3196_0: Sīse mayhaṃ nipatanti, te bhindanti ca matthaka”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:3199_3: Tathā hi sakkharāya pahārenāti vā pāṭho.
atk-s0507a0:3200_0: Taṃ sutvā thero “attano katakammānurūpameva idāni purāṇakammassa idaṃ phalaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti dassento –
atk-s0507a0:3204_0: Sīse tuyhaṃ nipatanti, te bhindanti ca matthaka”nti. –
atk-s0507a0:3205_3: tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe aparajjhantena tayā katassa pāpakammassa anucchavikamevetaṃ phalaṃ tuyhaṃ upanītaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3205_4: Tasmā kenaci devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā api sammāsambuddhenapi appaṭibāhanīyametanti dasseti.
atk-s0507a0:3206_0: Evañca pana vatvā tato nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco sāyanhasamaye satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0507a0:3206_1: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desento paccekabuddhānaṃ guṇānubhāvaṃ kammānañca avañjhataṃ pakāsesi,
atk-s0507a0:3206_2: mahājano saṃvegajāto hutvā pāpaṃ pahāya dānādipuññanirato ahosīti.
atk-s0507a0:3213_0: Ye te petesu nibbattā, sattā dukkaṭakārino;
atk-s0507a0:3214_0: Yehi kammehi tesaṃ taṃ, pāpakaṃ kaṭukapphalaṃ.
atk-s0507a0:3221_0: Yā tattha paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
atk-s0507a0:3225_0: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0507a0:3230_0: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
